text: A carbon tax is paid by businesses and industries WDT produce carbon dioxide through their operations . DT tax is designed to reduce DT output of greenhouse gases and carbon dioxide , a colorless and odorless incombustible gas , into DT atmosphere . DT tax is imposed with DT goal of environmental protection . A tax designed to mitigate or remove DT negative externalities of carbon emission , a carbon tax is a type of Pigovian tax . Carbon is found in every kind of hydrocarbon fuel ( including coal , petroleum , and natural gas ) and is released as DT harmful toxin carbon dioxide ( CO ) when this kind of fuel is burned . CO is DT compound primarily responsible for DT " greenhouse " effect of trapping heat within DT NNP 's atmosphere , and is , therefore , CD of DT primary causes of JJ NN . A carbon tax is RB referred to as a form of carbon pricing on greenhouse gas NNS where a fixed price is set by DT NN for carbon NNS in certain sectors . DT price is passed through from businesses to consumers . By increasing DT cost of greenhouse NNS , governments hope to curb consumption , reduce DT demand for fossil fuels , and push more companies toward creating environmentally - friendly substitutes . A carbon tax is a way for a NN to exert some control over carbon NNS without resorting to DT levers of a command economy , by which DT NN MD control DT means of production and manually halt carbon NNS . Any carbon found in manufactured products IN plastics WDT is not burned is not taxed . DT same applies to any CO WDT is permanently isolated from production and is not released into DT atmosphere . But DT tax is paid during DT upstream process , or when DT fuel or gas is extracted from DT NNP . Producers can then pass on DT tax to DT market by as much as PRP can . This , in turn , gives consumers a chance to reduce their own carbon footprints . Carbon taxes have been implemented in a number of NNS around DT NN . PRP take several different forms , but most amount to a straightforward rate of taxation per ton of hydrocarbon fuel used . DT first country to implement a carbon tax was Finland , in 1990 . DT levy currently stands at $ 24.39 dollars per ton of carbon . DT Finns were quickly followed by other Nordic NNS — Sweden and Norway both implemented their own carbon taxes in 1991 . Starting at a rate of $ 51 per ton of CO used in gasoline ( DT tax MD later decrease considerably ) , DT Norwegian tax is among DT most stringent in DT NN . Most forms of carbon taxation have been deployed successfully , but Australia 's failed attempt from 2012 - 2014 stands in stark contrast . DT minority Green party was able to broker DT carbon tax during a period of political stagnation in 2011 , but DT tax never garnered DT support of either of DT main parties in Australia , DT left - leaning Labor Party ( which reluctantly agreed to DT tax to form a NN with DT Greens ) and DT center - right Liberals , whose leader Tony Abbott spearheaded DT 2014 repeal . IN most JJ initiatives to combat NN NN , carbon taxes remain highly controversial .

text: Can DT Weather Affect My Child 's Asthma ? Yes . Weather conditions can bring on asthma symptoms . Some kids ' asthma symptoms VBP worse at certain times of DT NN . For others , a severe storm or sudden weather NN can trigger a flare - up . Cold , dry air is a common asthma trigger and can cause bad flare - ups . DT 's especially true for NNS who play winter sports and have exercise - induced asthma . Hot , humid air RB can be a problem . In some places , heat and sunlight combine with pollutants to create ground - level ozone . This kind of ozone can be a strong asthma trigger . Wet weather and windy weather can cause problems too . Wet weather encourages mold growth , and wind can blow mold and pollen through DT air . If PRP VBP weather plays a role in your child 's asthma , keep a diary of asthma symptoms and possible triggers and discuss them with your doctor . If pollen , mold , or other allergens make asthma symptoms worse , ask about allergy testing . How Can PRP Avoid Weather Triggers ? Once PRP VBP what kind of weather triggers asthma symptoms , try these tips to protect your child : • Watch DT forecast for pollen and mold counts plus other conditions ( extreme cold or heat ) WDT might affect your child 's asthma . • Make sure your child wears a scarf over DT mouth and nose when outside in very cold weather . • Keep windows closed at night to keep pollen and molds out . If PRP 's hot , use air conditioning , which cleans , cools , and dries DT air . • Keep your child indoors early in DT morning ( before 10 a.m. ) when pollen is at its highest . • Your child should n't mow DT lawn or rake leaves , and should be kept away from freshly cut grass and leaf piles . • Dry clothes in DT dryer ( hanging clothes or sheets to dry can allow mold or pollen to collect on them ) . • Make sure your child always has quick - relief medicine ( RB called rescue or fast - acting medicine ) on hand . Your child 's written asthma action plan should list weather triggers and ways to manage them , including any seasonal changes in medicine .

text: NN wo n't be DT last outbreak . NN NN , waning habitat will drive NN Researchers are n't clear yet about how DT novel NN began infecting NNS , but say PRP seems to have originated in bats , making PRP DT latest in a string of emerging human NN WDT spread from animals . NN and wildlife experts say PRP expect to see a rise in diseases transmitted among animals , plants and humans , and in particular , more frequent outbreaks in humans of diseases WDT come from animals . Such " zoonotic " diseases already make up DT majority of JJ infections in humans . But animals are n't to blame for DT increase in JJ outbreaks , according to Arizona NNP University virologist Arvind Varsani . Humans are . Varsani researches DT emergence of diseases around DT globe and he VBD two major factors likely to impact DT dynamics of NN spread are NN NN and changes in land use due to urbanization or agriculture . Both factors put animals under strain , forcing them to compete for resources in shrinking habitats and making them opportune hosts for zoonotic diseases , which more easily infect stressed animals . Shrinking suitable habitat amid urbanization and DT rapid expansion of agriculture RB cluster animals closer together with humans and domestic animals . DT allows DT viruses to jump from CD host to DT next . “ PRP stress these animals and DT means PRP ’re creating an environment for viruses to succeed , where in most NNS DT viruses MD ’ve been put to check , " he VBD . " And with DT , everyone is in very , very close proximity to each other , so what PRP ’ve got is CD event — and PRP only need CD event to take off — and DT next thing PRP VBP , PRP 's spilling over . ” And sometimes , DT viruses spill over into humans . According to a 2016 report from DT NNP Nations Environment Programme , around 60 percent of all infectious diseases in humans are zoonotic , as well as 75 percent of all emerging infectious diseases . Researchers RB detected an increase in DT rate of JJ , emerging infectious diseases , according to DT report . In DT case of DT novel NN , DT source is believed to be a market in Wuhan , NNP , WDT sold both dead and live animals . Arizona Game and Fish wildlife veterinarian Anne Justice - Allen VBD IN veterinarians and NN experts strongly recommend against having markets IN these , which can be densely packed , difficult to keep clean , and pose a higher risk of viruses jumping from animals into humans . She VBD DT current NN - CD outbreak is an example of how human actions to mix together animals WDT were n't normally together can cause diseases to jump into JJ hosts . " DT more PRP increase DT interaction between NNS and animals , especially wildlife and especially livestock as well , or animals WDT are raised for food , DT more likely PRP are to see DT kind of situation crop up , " she VBD . DT NNP - CD outbreak is an example of DT risk zoonotic diseases pose . Other well - known examples of zoonotic diseases WDT impact humans are West Nile NN , HIV , Ebola , Zika , bird NN , Middle East respiratory syndrome , or MERS , Rift Valley fever , and sudden acute respiratory syndrome , or SARS . On average , CD JJ infectious NN emerges in humans every four months , according to DT UNEP report , but not all are this severe . “ While PRP is very uncommon for diseases in animals to suddenly jump and become so transmissible between NNS as this NN did , DT more PRP do DT sort of thing , mixing animals together ... then DT more likely IN NN is VBG to be able to jump into NNS and become transmissible between NNS , " Justice - Allen VBD . With NN NN effects such as drought , increasing temperatures and wildfires , Justice - Allen VBD animals will be forced to move to JJ areas . DT MD lead to DT same type of crowding and mixing seen in live animal markets and possibly expose animals to JJ diseases . FIGHTING NN : Using robots to speed up testing , ASU hopes to open drive - thru NN testing VBG JJ temperatures are increasing DT habitat ranges of some insects WDT transmit diseases from CD organism to another , such as mosquitoes or ticks . NN is RB lengthening DT season in which these insects can survive in some areas , leading to a boom in their population . In certain areas , these insects , RB known as NN vectors , are now able to survive NN - round where PRP were n't able to before . DT increased range and abundance of vectors MD lead to more widespread NNS of mosquito - and tick - borne diseases such as malaria , West Nile NN , dengue fever , chikungunya , Zika , and Lyme NN , according to Heidi Brown , an ASU researcher who studies vector - borne diseases . Brown is CD of DT researchers who works with DT Arizona Department of NNP Services on a Building Resilience Against NNP Effects plan , which investigates DT impacts of NN NN on human NN , projects future scenarios and suggests solutions to mitigate those effects . Arizona is CD of 16 NN grant recipients creating a BRACE plan as part of DT CDC's NNP - Ready NNPS and Cities Initiative . " PRP have to be prepared for DT known , which is increases in DT stuff WDT PRP 're already seeing , but PRP RB have to be prepared for DT unknown , which is novel introductions , " she VBD . In Arizona , known diseases such as West Nile NNP are likely to become a bigger concern , and MD spread into JJ areas of DT NN outside of Maricopa County , Brown VBD . " Flagstaff does n't typically VB about or worry too much about West Nile NNP , and PRP do n't usually have a lot of NNS up RB , but EX 's evidence WDT suggests IN PRP might need to start making sure IN PRP 're watching for PRP , " she VBD . Arizona is RB worried about other mosquito - born diseases IN chikungunya and dengue fever , which are n't currently part of Arizona 's ecosystem but MD become permanently established in DT future . Factors IN drought can RB cause vectors to cluster around NN sources alongside of animals , leading to further mixing and further possibilities for JJ diseases spread in vectors . Another bridge between humans and animal diseases is domestic animals , according to Bernard Bett , a scientist at International Livestock Research Institute . Around DT NN , Bett VBD agriculture is increasingly encroaching on wild lands , bringing humans and domestic animals closer to wild ones and disturbing DT natural ecosystem . But domestic animals have been bred in such a way IN PRP lack DT genetic diversity needed for NN resilience and can then pass DT infection on to humans . Urbanization RB can encroach on wild lands , Varsani VBD , and DT means humans are coming into increased contact with animals — creating another potential avenue for NN transmission . As seen with DT NN - CD outbreak , NNS for JJ diseases take NN to develop , as do tests to screen for them . " PRP 's a long process to be able to come up with tests and identify JJ pathogens , especially when PRP 're not DT ones PRP 're used to looking for . ” DT Arizona Game and Fish Department monitors for JJ NN emergences by surveilling animal populations and investigating animal deaths to ensure IN DT cause of death was n't an unknown NN , according to Justice - Allen . Bett VBD NN care officials can take other measures to ensure IN EX is a structured , strong NN system in place with contingency plans for NN outbreaks and centers where patients can be isolated or receive supportive treatment . “ I wonder to what extent DT U.S. anticipated this spread . If PRP have good anticipation , DT ’s a good first line of defense , " Bett VBD . Even with further NN of NN effects on NN , EX can be unpredicted challenges in trying to anticipate and address JJ diseases , VBD Ben Beard , DT deputy director of DT CDC ’s Division of Vector - Borne Diseases in Fort Collins , Colorado . " While long term trends in NN NN can be modeled , specific weather events or disasters such as hurricanes , floods , or fires are very difficult to predict and MD have a big impact on NN outbreaks , " he wrote in an email to DT Republic . To prepare and respond to future outbreaks , he VBD , a strong JJ NN framework WDT prioritizes JJ NN surveillance , NN and local preparedness , and long - term research MD be necessary . In addition to being more conscious of how NNS affect DT environment and existing ecosystems , Varsani VBD identifying and understanding DT viruses present in DT NN currently can help society better prepare to control them . This is no small feat , considering IN viruses are among DT most abundant entities on DT NN . " Viruses are understudied , " he VBD . “ PRP have no idea what DT next entity will be , nobody expected this outbreak to take place and it's now consumed most of DT NN in a very short period . ” Amanda Morris covers all things bioscience , which includes NN care , technology , JJ research and DT environment . text: DT National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration released its 2019 Arctic Report Card on Tuesday , and folks , DT results are n’t great . DT report details a rapidly changing Arctic environment featuring melting NN , a greener landscape , and , alarmingly , greenhouse - gas NNS on par with some large nations . DT Arctic MD be releasing upwards of 600 million tons of net carbon per NN , DT report finds , potentially putting DT region alongside Mexico , Canada , and South Korea as CD of DT NN ’s largest contributors to atmospheric CO2 . Though DT carbon emitted from such industrialized nations is DT result of burning fossil fuels , DT hundreds of millions of metric tons pumping out of DT Arctic is DT result of thawing permafrost . Permafrost being permafrost , PRP takes more than DT seasons changing for PRP to actually melt PRP . DT increasingly rapid thawing of frozen Arctic NN is DT result of NN NN , and DT NOAA ’s report card reveals IN temperatures are continuing to rise in DT NN ’s nether - regions , which are n’t as icy as PRP used to be . In August , for instance , DT average NN surface temperatures in several highlighted Arctic bodies of NN were 1 - 7 degrees Celsius warmer than DT average from 1982 - 2010 . Just as frightening : DT average land surface temperature north of 60 degrees N was DT second - warmest since 1900 . PRP ’s not just permafrost IN rising temperatures are affecting . DT report RB found : • None DT Greenland NNP Sheet is losing 267 billion metric tons of NN per NN . • None Two of DT five lowest months for North American Arctic snow cover in DT 53 NNS records have been kept occurred this summer . • None NNP NN extent this summer was tied for DT second - lowest since satellite imagery recorded coverage in 1979 . NN NN extent in DT winter was RB second - lowest , narrowly falling short of DT lowest - ever total , which occurred in …2018 . These changes are threatening indigenous Arctic communities and Arctic wildlife directly , as well as DT rest of DT NN , on a profound scale . DT deteriorating Greenland NNP Sheet is causing DT JJ NN level to rise 0.7 millimeters per NN , and Arctic carbon NNS are helping cook DT NN at a rate WDT will soon be irreversible unless dramatic steps are taken . DT need for urgent action was stressed Wednesday by teenage NN activist Greta Thunberg , who spoke to delegates at a NNP Nations NN summit in Madrid . “ Our leaders are not behaving as though PRP were in an emergency , ” VBD Thunberg , who DT same day was named NNP magazine ’s Person of NNP . “ If EX ’s a child standing in DT middle of DT road and cars are coming at full speed , PRP do n’t look away because PRP is too uncomfortable . PRP immediately run out and rescue DT child . And without DT sense of urgency , how can PRP , DT NNS , understand IN PRP are facing a real crisis . ” Some governing bodies are at least trying . DT European Commission on Wednesday revealed plans for a European Green Deal WDT MD reimagine DT continent ’s economy in accordance with DT NN crisis . Meanwhile , DT NN of DT NN ’s second - largest carbon emitter is dismantling efforts to fight DT problem and struggling to even feign concern . “ NN NN is very important to me , ” NNP NNP managed last week in London despite his penchant for slashing environmental regulations . “ I ’ve done JJ environmental impact statements over my life and I believe very strongly in very , very crystal clear , clean NN and clean air . DT ’s a big part of NN NN . ” This post has been updated .

text: DT NNP - CD lockdown has cut NN NN NNS - for now . But some governments VBP to VB further by harnessing their JJ recovery plans to boost low - carbon industries . Their slogan is " Build Back Better " , but can PRP succeed ? I 've just had a light bulb moment . DT feisty little wren chirping loudly in DT matted ivy outside my back door is telling PRP something important about JJ NN NN . DT 's because , intertwined with DT melodious notes of a robin , I can actually hear its song clearly . Normally , both birds are muffled by DT insistent rumble of traffic , but DT din has been all but extinguished in DT peace of lockdown . DT drop in traffic is a major contributor to DT fall in NN - NN CO2 NNS PRP 've witnessed globally . Before DT NNP - CD crisis , PRP accepted DT dominance of traffic noise as an inevitable consequence of city living . Now , PRP have sampled an alternative urban ambience . Governments currently face a stark choice : bail out polluting businesses , using DT as leverage to impose environmentally - minded reforms , or let them return to their carbon - intensive activities as an JJ quick fix . But JJ members of DT NN have little desire to return to DT NN of affairs before lockdown . In a poll , a fifth of members of DT motoring group DT AA , VBD PRP MD work more from home in future . This has implications for DT UK NN 's £ 28bn road - building programme which assumes IN traffic will rise by 1 % per NN - a conjecture WDT now looks unlikely . DT AA , which for NNS was seen as DT voice of motorists , has asked DT NN to VB again about its £ 28bn road expansion . Its NN , Edmund King , has suggested DT money MD be better spent on improving broadband Another likely winner from DT crisis is DT movement fighting to turn city streets over to pedestrians and cyclists . DT determination to seize DT moment for environmental NN stretches further than DT transport sector . DT UK is CD of several nations looking to reboot its environmental strategy by calling in favours from private industry . After all , PRP was NN which bailed out employers when DT crunch came in March . DT catchphrase is " Build Back Better " . But PRP MD seem to face a direct challenge in DT shape of NNP and DT NNP . DT economies of both these superpowers have been savaged by DT effects of NN . PRP are desperate to VB back to pre-virus levels of output , so their leaders MD VB DT surest means of doing so is through tried and trusted NN NN fossil fuels . For those seeking a greener way out of DT NNP - CD slump , renewable NN will help , along with electric vehicle charging points and broadband . Frans Timmermans , vice NN of DT European Commission , is on DT same track . He is leading work on a Green Deal to make DT EU 's economy sustainable and says IN not a single Euro should be spent propping up old , dirty industries . All NNP - CD recovery investment should VB towards commerce WDT either helps reduce carbon NNS or promotes digital business , he insists . But some MEPs from parties on DT right warn IN DT pandemic will have " far - reaching " JJ and social consequences . PRP insist DT EU must scale back its pre-crisis NN ambitions . DT 's led some governments , IN Germany and DT UK , to offer hand - outs to polluting industries without imposing green conditions . In DT UK , DT issue is causing contortions among politicians torn between saving existing jobs and conserving DT NN . MPs from DT Liberal Democrats - thought of as CD of DT " greenest " UK parties - have joined other parliamentarians in demanding a conditional rescue for DT airline industry . PRP say IN if ministers do n't step in , tens of thousands of jobs will be lost . But DT firms should promise to off - set their NNS by , for example , planting trees . Off - setting is hugely contentious . Doug Parr , chief scientist at Greenpeace , argues : " Any NN bailout should focus on workers , not DT industry itself . " PRP should be conditional on DT industry agreeing to shrink until - if ever - low - carbon technology is available - which is n't now . " DT begs a question : which industries should qualify for support ? Should cash VB exclusively to self - evidently green sectors IN solar power - or to dirty firms trying to clean up ? Take DT fossil fuel firms WDT pay our pension dividends by drilling for DT stuff WDT 's over - heating DT NN . DT UK's oil and gas industry warns IN 30,000 jobs MD be lost because of DT pandemic and DT current low oil price . But why MD governments support a commodity WDT 's fuelling DT NN crisis , which is judged by DT UN to be deeper than DT NNP - CD crisis ? Perhaps PRP 's not RB simple . DT bright red line ( source data ) shows monthly average carbon dioxide at NOAA 's Mauna Loa Observatory on Hawai'i in parts per million ( ppm ) : DT number of carbon dioxide molecules per million molecules of dry air . Over DT course of DT NN , values are higher in Northern Hemisphere winter and lower in summer . DT dark red line shows DT annual trend , calculated as a 12 - month rolling average . According to DT NN of DT NNP in 2018 report from NOAA and DT American Meteorological Society , JJ atmospheric carbon dioxide was 407.4 ± 0.1 ppm in 2018 , a JJ record high . DT is an increase of 2.5 ± 0.1 ppm from 2017 , similar to DT increase of 2.2 ± 0.1 ppm between 2016 and 2017 . In DT 1960s , DT JJ growth rate of atmospheric carbon dioxide was roughly 0.6 ± 0.1 ppm per NN . Over DT past decade , however , DT growth rate has been closer to 2.3 ppm per NN . DT annual rate of increase in atmospheric carbon dioxide over DT past 60 NNS is about 100 times faster than previous natural increases , such as those WDT occurred at DT end of DT last NN age 11,000 - 17,000 NNS ago . Carbon dioxide is a greenhouse gas : a gas WDT absorbs and radiates heat . Warmed by sunlight , NNP ’s land and ocean surfaces continuously radiate thermal infrared NN ( heat ) . Unlike oxygen or nitrogen ( which make up most of our atmosphere ) , greenhouse gases absorb DT heat and release PRP gradually over NN , IN bricks in a fireplace after DT fire goes out . Without this natural greenhouse effect , NNP ’s average annual temperature MD be below freezing instead of close to 60 °F . But increases in greenhouse gases have tipped DT NNP 's NN budget out of balance , trapping additional heat and raising NNP 's average temperature . Carbon dioxide is DT most important of NNP ’s long - lived greenhouse gases . PRP absorbs less heat per molecule than DT greenhouse gases methane or nitrous oxide , but PRP ’s more abundant and PRP stays in DT atmosphere much longer . And while carbon dioxide is less abundant and less powerful than NN vapor on a molecule per molecule basis , PRP absorbs wavelengths of thermal NN WDT NN vapor does not , which means PRP adds to DT greenhouse effect in a unique way . Increases in atmospheric carbon dioxide are responsible for about two - thirds of DT total NN imbalance WDT is causing NNP 's temperature to rise . Another reason carbon dioxide is important in DT NNP system is IN PRP dissolves into DT ocean IN DT fizz in a can of soda . PRP reacts with NN molecules , producing carbonic acid and lowering DT ocean 's pH . Since DT start of DT Industrial Revolution , DT pH of DT ocean 's surface waters has dropped from 8.21 to 8.10 . This drop in pH is called ocean acidification . A drop of 0.1 MD not seem IN a lot , but DT pH scale is logarithmic ; a 1 - unit drop in pH means a tenfold increase in acidity . A NN of 0.1 means a roughly 30 % increase in acidity . Increasing acidity interferes with DT ability of marine life to extract calcium from DT NN to build their shells and skeletons . Natural increases in carbon dioxide concentrations have periodically warmed NNP ’s temperature during NN age cycles over DT past million NNS or more . DT warm episodes ( interglacials ) began with a small increase in sunlight due to a tiny wobble in NNP ’s axis of rotation or in DT path of its orbit around DT Sun . DT little bit of extra sunlight caused a little bit of NN . As DT oceans warmed , PRP outgassed carbon dioxide — IN a can of soda VBG flat in DT heat of a summer day . DT extra carbon dioxide in DT atmosphere amplified DT initial NN . Based on air bubbles trapped in mile - thick NN cores ( and other paleoclimate evidence ) , PRP VBP IN during DT NN age cycles of DT past million NNS or so , carbon dioxide never exceeded 300 ppm . Before DT Industrial Revolution started in DT mid-1700s , DT JJ average amount of carbon dioxide was about 280 ppm . By DT NN continuous observations began at Mauna Loa Volcanic Observatory in 1958 , JJ atmospheric carbon dioxide was already 315 ppm . On NNP 9 , 2013 , DT daily average carbon dioxide measured at Mauna Loa surpassed 400 ppm for DT first NN on record . Less than two NNS later , in 2015 , DT JJ amount went over 400 ppm for DT first NN . If JJ NN demand continues to grow and to be met mostly with fossil fuels , atmospheric carbon dioxide is projected to exceed 900 ppm by DT end of this century . Collins , M. , R. Knutti , J. text: Melbourne , 25 June 2012 : Australian infectious NN therapy and NN development company BioDiem Ltd ( ASX : BDM ) announced today DT signing of a licensing agreement with Australian National University ( ANU ) . This agreement is for an exclusive JJ license to commercialise a novel NN technology from DT John Curtin School of NNP Research at ANU . Dengue Fever is DT lead indication , but DT technology MD RB facilitate DT design of NNS against a number of other infectious diseases including Murray River encephalitis and Japanese encephalitis . DT increasing incidence of mosquito - borne NN is a major NN concern worldwide as NN NN expands DT range of DT carrier mosquitoes , exposing larger human populations . DT agreement includes provision for BioDiem to sublicense DT technology . Industry standard royalties apply , but apart from a small contribution towards patent registration costs EX is no up - front outlay for BioDiem . DT agreement follows DT signing of a term sheet announced to DT ASX on 6 June 2012 . Dengue Fever is a NN caused by a mosquito - borne NN WDT affects between 50 and 100 million NNS a NN , and according to DT NNP NNP Organization DT incidence is increasing significantly . Although only a small percentage of NNS are fatal , non-fatal NNS can be extremely debilitating . Dengue Fever currently has no existing NN , and control methods currently include attempts to address mosquito populations with varying effectiveness . DT technology is complementary to DT BioDiem portfolio as well as DT company 's strategic focus on NNS and therapies for infectious diseases and related cancers . " PRP are delighted to announce DT completion of this licensing agreement , which sees BioDiem 's commercial expertise in DT area of NNS fittingly partnered with DT exciting research developed by ANU . Our focus on infectious diseases is an excellent fit for this JJ technology which has strong potential as an asset for outlicensing " VBD BioDiem CEO Julie Phillips . BioDiem 's current strategy for DT ANU technology includes leveraging DT company 's JJ partnering network to deliver an outlicensing partner for development of DT technology , providing an opportunity to secure a royalties stream without significant development costs on DT part of BioDiem . BioDiem is an ASX - listed company based in Melbourne with an international focus on discovering , developing and commercialising NN - class research and technology targeting cancers and infectious diseases . BioDiem 's core technologies include DT Live Attenuated Influenza NNP ( LAIV ) , DT SAVINE platform and DT BDM - I antimicrobial compound . DT LAIV influenza NN is an intranasal NN to prevent infection from seasonal and pandemic influenza . DT LAIV influenza NN can be produced using both egg - based and cell - based manufacturing methods . DT cell - based LAIV NN has completed a Phase II clinical trial in Europe . DT egg - based LAIV NN technology is licensed to DT NNP NNP Organization as part of DT NNP Pandemic Influenza Action Plan to Increase NNP Supply . DT LAIV influenza NN is marketed as Nasovac™ in India by DT Serum Institute of India , and has been licensed to NNP - based Changchun BCHT Biotechnology Co . DT LAIV NN was in - licensed from DT Institute of Experimental Medicine in St Petersburg , Russia where PRP has been used for over a decade in JJ millions of NNS - NNS , adults and DT elderly . DT LAIV is administered by nasal spray and induces a rapid immune response in DT mucosal lining of DT nose and pharynx . DT LAIV is RB being developed as a viral vector for making novel non-influenza NNS for different diseases including cancers . Viruses have DT ability to generate proteins prolifically and can be programmed to produce NN - specific proteins . As part of a NN , NN - specific proteins can help generate a beneficial immune response . SAVINE ( patented Scrambled Antigen NNP ) is a platform technology for DT design of antigens for incorporation into NNS targeting an immune response to a range of different diseases . SAVINE antigens are encoded as synthetic genes which , together with a delivery technology such as BioDiem 's LAIV - based NN vector technology , can be used to develop novel NNS . BDM - I is a synthetic compound targeted at DT treatment of serious human infections . BDM - I is in DT preclinical stage with outlicensing as DT intended outcome . BDM - I is active against a range of pathogenic micro-organisms including gram - positive and gram - negative bacteria , fungi and protozoa . Key patents have been filed around BDM - I 's antimicrobial activity , including for activity against Plasmodium falciparum , responsible for causing DT most commonly severe form of malaria , and Trichomonas vaginalis , DT protozoan responsible for causing a common sexually transmitted NN named trichomoniasis . BioDiem is RB developing BDM-E , a tetra peptide synthetic compound , as a treatment for ophthalmic disorders . DT NNP Food & Drug Administration ( USFDA ) has granted Orphan Drug designation to BDM-E for DT treatment of retinitis pigmentosa , a serious degenerative NN of DT retina . BioDiem 's research is ongoing in partnership with internationally recognised laboratories . For additional information , please visit www.biodiem.com

text: In addition to DT already existing pressure on our freshwater resources , NN NN MD further decrease NN availability . In this NN , projections of future NN resources , due to NN NN , land use NN and changes in NN consumption have been assessed using JRC ’s LISFLOOD NN resources model . DT results presented are based on 11 NN models which project current and future NN under two Representative Concentration Pathways ( RCPs ) : RCP4.5 and RCP 8.5 emission scenario . RCP4.5 MD be viewed as a moderate - NNS - mitigation - policy scenario and RCP8.5 as a high - end NNS scenario . A 30 - NN window around DT NN IN JJ NN reaches 1.5 oC , 2 oC and 3 oC above preindustrial temperature has been analysed and compared to DT 1981 - 2010 control NN window ( baseline ) . DT 1.5 °C and 2 °C NN scenarios are explicitly considered in DT Paris Agreement , while a 3 °C JJ NN is a scenario WDT MD be expected by DT end of DT 21st century if adequate mitigation strategies are not taken . First , PRP performed future projections without socio-economic developments to show DT effect of NN NN only . Next , an integrated assessment is performed including future changes in land use , NN demand and population . This allows PRP to disentangle DT effects of NN and socio-economic changes . In general , DT NN projections reveal a typically North - South pattern across Europe for NN availability . Overall , Southern European NNS are projected to face decreasing NN availability , particularly Spain , Portugal , Greece , Cyprus , Malta , Italy and Turkey . Central and Northern European NNS show an increasing annual NN availability .

John Quincy Adams was DT eldest son of NNP John Adams and DT sixth NN of DT NNP NNPS . In his pre-presidential NNS , Adams was CD of America 's greatest diplomats ( formulating , among other things , what became DT Monroe Doctrine ) ; in his post - presidential NNS , he conducted a consistent and often dramatic fight against DT expansion of slavery . Though full of promise , his presidential NNS were difficult . He died in 1848 in Washington , D.C . Born on July 11 , 1767 , in Braintree , Massachusetts , John Quincy was DT son of John Adams , a prodigy of DT American Revolution who MD become DT second U.S. NN just before his John Quincy 's 30th birthday , and his wife , future first lady Abigail Adams . As a child , Adams witnessed firsthand DT birth of DT nation . From DT family farm , he and his mother watched DT Battle of Bunker Hill in 1775 . At age 10 , he traveled to France with his father , who was securing aid during DT Revolution . By age 14 , Adams was receiving " on - DT - job " training in DT diplomatic corps and VBG to school . In 1781 , he accompanied diplomat Francis Dana to Russia , serving as his secretary and translator . In 1783 , he traveled to Paris to serve as secretary to his father , negotiating DT Treaty of Paris . During this NN , Adams attended schools in Europe and became fluent in French , Dutch and German . Returning home in 1785 , he entered Harvard College and graduated in 1787 . In 1790 , Adams became a practicing attorney in Boston . As tensions mounted between Britain and France , he supported NNP George Washington 's neutrality policy of 1793 . In 1802 , Adams was elected to DT Massachusetts legislature , and CD NN later , he was elected DT U.S. Senate . During his NN in DT Senate , he supported DT Louisiana Purchase and NNP Thomas Jefferson 's Embargo Act—actions WDT made him very unpopular with other Federalists . In June 1808 , Adams broke with DT Federalists , resigned from his Senate seat and became a Democratic - Republican . DT following NN , Adams served as minister to England , a position his father had held 30 NNS earlier . During this NN , he negotiated DT Adams - Onis Treaty , acquiring Florida for DT NNP NNPS . Running against Adams were Southerners John C. Calhoun and William Crawford , and Westerners Henry Clay and Andrew Jackson . In addition , by DT 1824 election , 18 of 24 NNS had moved to choose electors to DT Electoral College by popular vote instead of to NN legislatures . In DT Electoral College vote , no CD candidate had a clear majority and , subsequently , DT election was sent to DT House of Representatives . Clay threw his support to Adams , who was elected on DT first ballot . Adams 's victory shocked Jackson , who had won DT popular vote and fully expected to be NN . When Adams later appointed Clay secretary of NN , Jackson Democrats cried " corrupt bargain , " and were enraged at DT seemingly quid pro quo arrangement . Adams entered DT presidency with several debilitating political liabilities . He possessed DT temperament of his father : Aloof , stubborn and ferociously independent in his convictions . As NN , Adams failed to develop DT political relationships needed — even among members of his own party — to effect significant NN . PRP did n't help IN his political opponents were set on making him a CD - term NN . text: NNS often confuse DT concepts of JJ NN and NN NN , and PRP does n’t help IN NN companies often substitute CD for DT other in TV , newspaper , and social NN reporting . This is somewhat understandable since DT two concepts overlap a great deal . In fact , EX is a causal relationship between DT two . However , EX are some subtle and some not - so - subtle differences between JJ NN and NN NN . DT phrase JJ NN is used by NNS to mean a long - term increase in NNP ’s average air temperature . PRP can refer specifically to such NN WDT is due to DT influence of rising concentrations of greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere . NNP ’s surface gets most of its heat from DT NN associated with DT Sun ’s rays , which strike DT NN ’s surface during DT day . At night most of this NN is radiated back into space . Greenhouse gases ( such as carbon dioxide , methane , nitrous oxides , and chlorofluorocarbons [ CFCs ] ) absorb infrared radiation ( net heat NN ) emitted from NNP ’s surface and radiate PRP back to DT surface , thus contributing to DT greenhouse effect . Though DT recent rise in greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere is arguably DT main factor affecting JJ NN , other factors are involved ( such as variations in NNP ’s orbit , DT angle of DT NN ’s axis , and variations in DT Sun ’s NN output ) . Nevertheless , as higher concentrations of greenhouse gases allow NNP ’s atmosphere to hold on to greater amounts of heat WDT MD normally escape into space at night , NNP ’s average temperature rises . NN NN is a bit different . Before PRP look into what NN NN is , PRP MD be helpful to VB a bit about NN with respect to weather . Weather , which is often confused with NN , is DT set of conditions in DT atmosphere in CD location for a limited period of NN , such as throughout DT day , at night , or at any particular point during DT day . NN , on DT other hand , is DT average condition of DT atmosphere in a given location over a long period of NN , such as 30 NNS or more . Thus , NN NN is a longer - term NN in DT average condition of DT atmosphere . Human beings most certainly contribute to NN NN by adding greenhouse gases to DT atmosphere , but this is only part of DT equation . NNP ’s NN can VB over NN not only because of changes in DT atmosphere but RB because of interactions between DT atmosphere and various geologic , chemical , biological , and geographic factors . For example , regional climates ( as well as NNP ’s JJ NN ) can VB in response to a sustained period of heavy volcanic activity . Much of DT activity is related in turn to DT movement of NNP ’s tectonic plates , which drives DT continents across DT surface of DT NN . Over hundreds of thousands to millions of NNS , DT continents collide with other continents or break apart , changing DT paths of ocean currents and local winds . This affects DT transport of heat from DT tropics to DT poles . NNP ’s JJ NN has RB changed in response to drastic changes in atmospheric chemistry — notably DT rise in oxygen concentrations billions of NNS ago when plants , algae , and other forms of life capable of photosynthesis began to spread across DT NN . As DT NN continues to come to grips with how human activities influence NNP ’s NN , DT tangible effects of NN NN WDT is caused by JJ NN — such as melting glaciers and NN caps , rising NN levels , and changes in seasonal temperature and rainfall patterns — are becoming DT focus . With such disruptions becoming more and more apparent , JJ NNS are discussing them increasingly in terms of real long - term climatic changes rather than simply remarking about NNP ’s average temperature . text: PRP turns out IN DT opposite of dystopia is not utopia , but rather a goofily charming Australian actor armed with a camera and a mission . His goal : present Velvet and her generation a positive path for battling NN NN utilizing only solutions WDT are presently available . Gameau initiated this vision of DT future by asking 100 NNS from around DT NN what PRP MD VB 2040 to look IN . He was startled by how aware DT kids ( ages 6 - 11 ) are of DT challenges DT NN is facing and weaves their voices into DT film as an unjaded chorus of boundless potential ( “ Clean NN ! ” “ End deforestation ! ” “ Rocket boots ! ” “ National hot dog day ! ” ) . Turning to experts in various fields , Gameau learns about solar - powered microgrids , localized economies , electric self - driving cars , urban food farms , regenerative agriculture , marine permaculture , resource awareness and increased educational opportunities for girls ( perhaps DT most surprising element presented ) . Every solution is then dramatized as to how PRP might affect DT NN of a 20 - something Velvet . DT effect is inspiring and empowering . Powered by unbridled optimism , Gameau defies skeptics by doing his homework and bringing receipts . Working on DT film in 2019 , Gameau had no idea what 2020 MD look IN . text: How To Discuss “ NN NN ” With A ‘ Woke ’ Teenager After our daughter of fifteen NNS of age was moved to tears by DT speech of Greta Thunberg at DT UN DT other day , she became angry with our generation “ who had been doing nothing for thirty NNS . ” So , PRP decided to help her prevent what DT girl on TV announced of “ massive eradication and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . ” PRP are now committed to give our daughter a future again , by doing our part to help cool DT NN four degrees . From now on she will VB to school on a bicycle , because driving her by car costs fuel , and fuel puts NNS into DT atmosphere . Of course PRP will be winter soon and then she will VB to VB by bus , but cycling through DT freezing builds resilience . Of course , she is now asking for an electric bicycle , but PRP have shown her DT devastation caused to DT areas of DT NN as a result of mining for DT extraction of Lithium and other minerals used to make batteries for electric bicycles , so she will be pedaling , or walking . Which will not harm her , or DT NN . PRP used to cycle and walk to school too . Since DT girl on TV demanded “ PRP need to VB rid of our dependency on fossil fuels ” and our daughter agreed with her , PRP have disconnected DT heat vent in her room . DT temperature is now dropping to twelve degrees in DT evening , and will drop below freezing in DT winter , PRP have promised to buy her an extra sweater , hat , tights , gloves and a blanket . For DT same reason PRP have decided IN from now on she only takes a cold shower . She will wash her clothes by hand , with a wooden washboard , because DT washing machine is simply a power consumer and since DT dryer uses natural gas , she will hang her clothes on DT clothes line to dry , just IN my parents and grandparents used to do . Speaking of clothes , DT ones WDT she currently has are all synthetic , so made from petroleum . Therefore on Monday , PRP will bring all her designer clothing to DT secondhand shop . PRP have found an eco store where DT only clothing PRP sell is made from undyed and unbleached linen and jute . RB ca n’t have clothes made on wool , because DT NNS from farting sheep are supposedly causing bad weather . PRP should n’t matter IN PRP looks good on her , or IN she is VBG to be laughed at , dressing in colorless , bland clothes and without a wireless bra , but DT is DT price she has to pay for DT benefit of DT NNP . Cotton is out of DT question , as PRP comes from distant lands and pesticides are used for PRP . Very bad for DT environment . PRP just saw on her Instagram IN she ’s pretty angry with PRP . This was not our intention . From now on , at 7 p.m. PRP will turn off DT WiFi and PRP will only switch PRP on again DT next day after dinner for two hours . In this way PRP will save on electricity , so she is not bothered by electro - stress and will be totally isolated from DT outside NN . This way , she can concentrate solely on her homework . At eleven o’clock in DT evening PRP will pull DT breaker to shut DT power off to her room , so she knows IN dark is really dark . DT will save a lot of CO2 . She will no longer be participating in winter sports to ski lodges and resorts , nor will she be VBG on anymore vacations with PRP , because our vacation destinations are practically inaccessible by bicycle . Since our daughter fully agrees with DT girl on TV IN DT CO2 NNS and footprints of her great - grandparents are to blame for ‘ killing our NN ’ , what all this simply means , is IN she RB has to live IN her great - grandparents and PRP never had a holiday , a car or even a bicycle . PRP have n’t talked about DT carbon footprint of food yet . Zero CO2 footprint means no meat , no fish and no poultry , but RB no meat substitutes WDT are based on soy ( after all , WDT grows in farmers fields , WDT use machinery to harvest DT beans , trucks to transport to DT processing plants , where more NN is used , then trucked to DT packaging / canning plants , and trucked once again to DT stores ) and RB no imported food , because DT has a negative ecological effect . And absolutely no chocolate from Africa , no coffee from South America and no tea from Asia . Only homegrown potatoes , vegetables and fruit WDT have been grown in local cold soil , because greenhouses run on boilers , piped in CO2 and artificial light . Apparently , these things are RB bad for DT NNP . PRP will teach her how to grow her own food . Bread is still possible , but butter , milk , cheese and yogurt , cottage cheese and cream come from cows and PRP emit CO2 . No more margarine and no oils will be used for DT frying pan , because DT fat is palm oil from plantations in Borneo where rain forests first grew . No NN cream in DT summer . No soft drinks and no NN drinks , as DT bubbles are CO2 . PRP will RB ban all plastic , because PRP comes from chemical factories . Everything made of steel and aluminum must RB be removed . Have PRP ever seen DT amount of NN a blast furnace consumes or an aluminum smelter ? All bad for DT NN ! PRP will replace her memory foam pillow top mattress , with a jute bag filled with straw , with a horse hair pillow . And finally , she will no longer be using makeup , soap , shampoo , cream , lotion , conditioner , toothpaste and medication . Facewashers will all be linen , IN she can wash by hand , with her wooden washboard , just IN her female ancestors did before NN NN made her angry at PRP for destroying her future . In this way PRP will help her to do her part to prevent mass extinction , NN levels rising and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . If she truly believes she wants to walk DT talk of DT girl on TV , she will gladly accept and happily embrace her JJ way of life . This article was posted : Wednesday , December 4 , 2019 at 5:24 am

text: BIR SALAH , TUNISIA - Samira Sghaier and a group of friends prune moringa trees under a searing sun , dropping fistfuls of leafy branches into plastic tubs . Prickly acacias edge DT plot of land , protecting bone - dry soil from further erosion . Sghaier ’s father once grew olive and fruit trees — varieties WDT mostly shriveled and died under her watch . “ EX has n’t been enough rain in recent NNS , ” says DT 52 - NN - old farmer . Her tiny farm in eastern Tunisia is a bellwether for DT dramatic environmental changes already reshaping North Africa , which threaten to intensify with NN NN . Sandwiched between an encroaching Sahara and a VBG Mediterranean NNP , DT region has seen a sharp drop in rainfall over DT past half century — a trend experts say will likely intensify in DT coming decades . Indeed , over DT course of this century parts of North Africa as well as DT Middle East might become uninhabitable , according to DT German research and policy organization , DT Max Planck Institute . “ PRP ’re seeing higher temperatures and increasing NN stress , ” says Essia Guezzi , NN and NN project officer for conservation group WWF North Africa , summing up some of DT regional challenges . Meanwhile , rising NN levels threaten DT region ’s largely coastal populations , she and others note . These and other issues will come into sharp focus during next month ’s NN summit in Spain , a fellow member of DT Mediterranean region WDT is considered a NN hotspot — more vulnerable to DT effects of NN NN than other parts of DT NN . While Morocco has earned praise as a NN - NN leader , DT North African region overall needs to do much more to counter an otherwise grim future , experts say . RB hampering efforts : some NNS are buffeted by conflict and civil unrest , while fossil fuels continue to drive Algerian and Libyan economies . Trying to turn DT tide In Tunisia , fresh groundwater reserves are shrinking rapidly . Roughly two - thirds of DT land is threatened by desertification . DT effects of NN NN are likely to slow DT country ’s growth , hitting two major revenue drivers — tourism and agriculture — according to a 2018 report by DT Netherlands Foreign Ministry . While Tunisian authorities have outlined ambitious targets — including cutting NNS 41 percent by 2030 compared to 2010 levels — PRP have been slow to match words with action , critics say . Nor did DT issue figure high on candidates ’ priorities in recent legislative and presidential elections . “ PRP seems IN DT environment and DT impact of NN NN is DT last concern of JJ Tunisian politicians , ” says Hamadi Gharbi , WWF North Africa NNP and NNP project manager , who says DT country RB needs more NN financing and expertise . In DT village of Bir Salah , Sghaier is trying , at least locally , to turn DT tide . She and other area farmers began planting hardy acacia trees to help reduce erosion , along with moringa , a fast - growing plant prized for its nutritional and medicinal properties . DT idea was to help fight NN NN and earn a profit doing so . DT reality has not been so easy . “ Everyone likes JJ products , ” Sghaier says , showing a visitor her storeroom packed with moringa oils and powders , along with bags of moringa - based bsissa , a Tunisian breakfast drink , which a group of growers have made and packaged . “ DT problem is selling them , ” she says . “ PRP ’s hard to find a market . ” Across DT Sahara , DT African Union has spearheaded an ambitious ‘ Great Green Wall ’ initiative aimed to restore degraded land across a swathe of DT Sahel , while RB offering income - generating opportunities for communities living RB . “ DT goal is to replant trees , to return DT Sahel to what PRP was about 60 NNS ago , when EX was a lot more forest cover , ” says anthropologist Gilles Boetsch , director of a French scientific team working with Senegalese researchers in DT region . EX are plenty of setbacks he says . JJ trees die and need to be replaced , while conflict in some Sahel NNS makes areas inaccessible . “ PRP does n’t work 100 percent , but PRP works , ” Boetsch says , adding a similar regional initiative MD RB work north of DT Sahara . “ DT first problem is NN . DT second is getting communities to accept DT projects . ” In North Africa , some national projects to fight NN NN are making a difference , and Tunisia will reportedly present a regional oases protection project at DT Madrid NN conference . Local farmers in northern Algeria are getting Mexican expertise to plant prickly pear , a cactus WDT offers a raft of nutritional and money - generating benefits and needs little rainfall . Algeria is RB trying to revive a massive ‘ Green Dam ’ reforestation project WDT previously had disappointing results . In Tunisia ’s southeastern Gabes region , Dhafer Guezguez worked with DT local NN in European Union - financed projects WDT included restoring oases and reintroduce native date palm species . DT plants are hardy and nutritious , he says , but not as sweet as popular commercial varieties . Attracting consumers will need serious marketing . “ PRP need to be showcased as a product WDT ’s rare and good for PRP , ” Guezguez says . “ DT same kind of effort PRP saw in Europe and DT NNP NNPS to VB NNS to eat organic products . ” DT oases preservation initiatives have helped to boost local economies and restore depleted soil , he says . Women dominate DT workforce . DT projects have continued even after EU financing ended . Participants are RB making tourist handicrafts IN palm leaf bags and hats , to earn extra revenue . “ I VBP this is how , little by little , PRP can save DT oases , ” Guezguez says . “ When local communities realize PRP ’s in their interest to do so .

text: With all of DT discouraging NN about JJ deforestation and DT destruction of DT Amazon rainforest , PRP ’s good to VB IN NNS in JJ parts of DT NN are having great success at re-foresting NN NN . • A NN in crisis : Here ’s how PRP can help In Bhutan , for example , when DT nation was celebrating DT birth of a JJ prince in 2016 , NNS came together to plant 108,000 trees , which will become a JJ forest within a couple of decades . Ecuador set a NN record in 2017 for planting a whopping 647,250 trees in a single day . RB in 2017 , more than 1.5 million volunteers came together to plant 66 million trees in just 12 hours , setting another NN record . • WWF : NNP Has Lost 50 % of its Wildlife in DT Past 40 NNS Now , NASA is reporting IN in DT findings of a 20 - NN NN of DT NN , EX are actually more trees today than EX were two decades ago , thanks in large part to DT efforts of NNS and communities in India and NNP . DT findings are DT result of 20 NNS of data collection from NASA instruments onboard two satellites orbiting NN . A more detailed explanation from DT NN : “ Satellite data show increasing leaf area of vegetation due to direct factors ( human land - use management ) and indirect factors ( such as NN NN , CO2 fertilization , nitrogen deposition and recovery from natural disturbances ) . Among these , NN NN and CO2 fertilization effects seem to be DT dominant drivers . However , recent satellite data ( 2000 – 2017 ) reveal a greening pattern WDT is strikingly prominent in NNP and India and overlaps with croplands NN - wide . NNP alone accounts for 25 % of DT JJ net increase in leaf area with only 6.6 % of JJ vegetated area . DT greening in NNP is from forests ( 42 % ) and croplands ( 32 % ) , but in India is mostly from croplands ( 82 % ) with minor contribution from forests ( 4.4 % ) . “ [ Source ] Furthermore , DT NN serves as a positive counter to DT trend of pollution and environmental degradation PRP see today in Asia : DT satellites have recorded photos of DT NN every day for 20 NNS , creating a massive data set WDT is allowing researchers and biologists to better understand how to preserve DT NN ’s forests . “ This long - term data lets PRP dig deeper , ” VBD Rama Nemani , a research scientist at NASA ’s Ames Research Center and a co-author of DT JJ work . “ When DT greening of DT NNP was first observed , PRP thought PRP was due to a warmer , wetter NN and fertilization from DT added carbon dioxide in DT atmosphere , leading to more leaf growth in northern forests , for instance . Now , with DT MODIS data WDT lets PRP understand DT phenomenon at really small scales , PRP see IN humans are RB contributing . ” DT message is clear : if PRP come together PRP can easily remedy DT ecological problems PRP have created here on NN . Let this good NN serve as an inspiration to participate in DT re-greening of NN . PRP RB demonstrates how humans can address serious problems once PRP become aware of what ’s really VBG on . text: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos on Monday committed $ 10 billion of his fortune to set up a fund aimed at tackling DT NN crisis , weeks after hundreds of his employees signed a blog demanding DT online retail giant take drastic steps to reduce its carbon footprint . DT fund , named Bezos NNP Fund , will begin issuing grants to NNS and activists this summer , DT NN 's richest man announced in an Instagram post . " NN NN is DT biggest threat to our NN . I VBP to work alongside others both to amplify known ways and to explore JJ ways of fighting DT devastating impact of NN NN on this NN PRP all share , " VBD Bezos , whose net worth is estimated to be $ 130 billion . " This JJ initiative will fund NNS , activists , NGOs — any effort WDT offers a real possibility to help preserve and protect DT natural NN . PRP can save NNP . PRP 's VBG to take collective action from big companies , small companies , nation NNS , JJ organizations , and individuals , " he VBD . Read more : Amazon wins court order to suspend $ 10 billion NNP military contract with Microsoft Bezos ' personal donation follows Amazon 's " NNP Pledge " last NN which aims to make DT company carbon neutral by 2040 . As part of DT pledge , he had VBN Amazon MD meet DT goals of DT Paris Agreement by DT same NN , 10 NNS ahead of schedule — RB promising to buy 100,000 electric delivery vans . DT task of reducing its carbon footprint will be a challenging NN for DT NN 's largest e-commerce company which delivers 10 billion items annually . DT huge NN consumption of server farms used by Amazon 's cloud computing business further adds to its greenhouse NNS . An advocacy group , Amazon Employees for NNP Justice , VBD PRP applauded Bezos ' initiative but added IN " CD hand cannot give what DT other is taking away . " DT group RB questioned DT company 's support for oil and gas businesses . " DT NNS of NNP need to VB : When is Amazon VBG to stop helping oil & gas companies ravage NNP with still more oil and gas wells ... Will Jeff Bezos show PRP true leadership or will he continue to be complicit in DT acceleration of DT NN crisis , while supposedly trying to help ? " DT group VBD in a statement . text: PRP can no longer ignore DT damage our natural environment is experiencing . In 2018 , NNS and leaders from across DT NN published a report showing how a 1.5 °C increase in JJ temperatures from pre-industrial levels is devastating our environment . PRP are facing more extreme weather , food shortages , rising NN levels and mass extinction of plants and animals , to name a few impacts . DT report below explains DT undeniable link between human activities and this temperature increase . DT report RB calls for drastic changes in policy to prevent further damage to our environment . Read DT special report ' JJ NN of 1.5 ºC ' IPCC on DT IPCC website . In response , our NN has recommended a ‘ net zero ’ target for greenhouse gases . CO2 ( carbon dioxide ) is DT main gas produced by human activities . Find out more on DT causes of NN NN on DT European Commission website . Our NN recognises IN , to reduce CO2 and other greenhouse gas NNS , PRP all need to VB . DT good thing is PRP already have DT answers PRP need to tackle NN NN and environmental degradation . All PRP takes is DT will to act now . Across DT NN DT impacts of NN NN are being felt in various ways . In some NNS , PRP are seeing shifting weather patterns WDT threaten food production . Elsewhere , rapid glacier melt threatens NN level rise WDT risks catastrophic flooding . Currently DT impacts of NN NN are worse in poorer NNS . Nonetheless , PRP is likely IN NN NN will increasingly affect DT UK in NNS to come . Impacts PRP is likely PRP will see include : • Very cold winters will be rare . • Winters will be wetter and summers will be hotter and more prolonged . • NN level MD rise by 40 cm , leading to coastal erosion and flood risks . • Temperature increase will VB DT crops PRP grow , impacting our diets . • Changes in temperature will cause different illnesses , creating more problems for NNS and DT elderly . • Foreign diseases associated with hot weather migrating north , for example , Malaria . • Cost of living to increase due to food , fuel and NN shortages . • Homes potentially damaged and insurance will increase due to severe weather . • Domestic crops will begin to struggle due to weather NN . • Soil will be less fertile as PRP struggle to grow crops WDT no longer thrive . • Some species cannot adapt to changes . • DT plants and trees WDT can grow will VB . • Dubbed as DT “ evil twin of NN NN " . • DT ongoing decrease in ocean pH , 30 % decrease so far . • Predicted 150 % by 2100 which has not been experienced for 400,000 NNS . • Wide implications for ocean life , particularly animals with shells or skeletons . While NN NN is JJ in scale , Eden is no stranger to DT impacts . DT 2005 , 2009 and 2016 floods had damaging impacts across DT district . PRP have suffered social , JJ and environmental losses . PRP is predicted similar flooding MD become more common as temperatures increase . In December 2015 , Storm Desmond caused disruptions across Eden and Cumbria . PRP impacted homes and businesses for months after DT event . DT NNP NNP Act of 2008 was passed by our NN to ensure IN PRP keep greenhouse gas NNS at least 80 % lower than DT 1990 baseline by 2050 , to avoid dangerous NN NN . DT Act made DT UK DT first country with a legally binding framework to cut carbon NNS . Alongside this Act , DT Committee on NNP NNP was set up to advise DT NN on legislation and progress on reducing NNS . DT UK has struggled to meet carbon targets set in this act , even though DT need is getting stronger . NN NN effects are being experienced in our country , which PRP now must adapt to . Our experience of NN NN has already created costs to our economy , society and environment . PRP must work to mitigate against NN NN , as well as adapt to DT impacts WDT PRP already experience . Mitigation : reducing NN NN Reducing greenhouse gas NNS : NN efficiency , renewable NN , lower consumption rates , electric cars . text: Decades of schizophrenic warnings about JJ NN and NN ages are bogus . With non -stop coverage of DT latest doomsday doyenne DT powers - who - should - not - be have strutted out on DT stage , PRP ’s easy to forget just how JJ times dire warnings have been issued about how DT NNP ’s NN was on DT verge of wiping out all life on DT NN . A few months after DT Wizard of Oz had its theatrical premiere in Green Bay , Wisc. in 1939 , a newspaper headline appeared as follows : “ Greenland ’s Glaciers Melting , Says Scientist . ” “ All DT glaciers in Eastern Greenland are rapidly melting , declared Prof. Hans Ahlmann , Swedish geologist , ” DT article screamed . “ PRP MD without exaggeration be VBN IN DT glaciers , IN those in Norway , face DT possibility of a catastrophic collapse , ” Ahlmann crowed . A mysterious NN of DT NN was slowly manifesting itself in DT Arctic , ” stated Ahlmann , who warned IN “ oceanic surfaces MD rise to catastrophic proportions and NNS living in DT [ Greenland ] lowlands . . . MD be inundated . ” PRP ’s no mystery , Hans ; PRP ’s nature . “ Polar NN Thaw Increasing : Glaciers VBD To Be Melting , ” VBD DT headline . This NN , Arctic expert Dr. William S. Carlson VBD IN “ DT Polar icecaps were melting at an astonishing and unexplained rate and were threatening to swamp seaports by raising DT ocean levels . ” PRP ’re still waiting , Bill . Arctic explorer Adm. Donald McMillan was next to warn , stating , “ EX are now 6 million square miles of NN in DT Arctic . EX once were 12 million square miles . ” Perhaps realizing their dire predictions were not panning out , DT “ experts ” were no longer warning of JJ NN , but had switched to JJ cooling , and a coming NN age ! PRP ca n’t make this stuff up . DT next expert trotted out was James P. Lodge Jr. , a scientist at DT National Center for Atmospheric Research . In an article titled “ Scientist Predicts a NNP NNP Age by 21st century , ” Lodge warned IN “ [ a ] ir pollution MD obliterate DT Sun and cause a JJ NN age in DT first third of DT JJ century . ” Uh , Jim , can PRP pass me those sunglasses ? Things were so dire in DT 1970s IN two of DT nation ’s top geologists found PRP necessary to alert NNP Richard Nixon of DT impending doom . “ [ A ] JJ deterioration of NN , by order of magnitude larger than any hitherto experienced by civilized mankind , is a very real possibility and indeed MD be due very soon . EX is a real possibility IN some NNS now in their infancy will live to a NN when DT NN at DT North Pole will have melted , a NN WDT MD cause swift and perhaps catastrophic changes in NN . ” EX ’s DT word “ catastrophic ’ again . Not yet synched to spew identical nonsense , DT Chicago Tribune still thought JJ cooling was DT way to VB , and “ reported ” some more unfounded , dire warnings about a freezing NN . Toward DT end of DT 1980s , however , DT JJ NN playbook was adopted by all in DT fake NN NN , who have been constantly predicting polar icecap “ melting on a catastrophic scale . ” And of course , our good friends in DT fake NN NN MD never put DT below in their fine papers or networks : In a Sept. 24 , Breitbart NNP Network headline , “ 500 NNS Write UN : ‘ EX Is No NN Emergency , ’ ” DT only NN platform with some heft reported on DT letter sent from DT oft - overlooked “ NNS and professionals in NN and related fields ” to DT NNP Nations , “ asking for a long - overdue , high - level , open debate on NN NN . ” DT two - page letter should have been splattered across DT pages and screens of all DT major NN , but here ’s why PRP was n’t , as revealed by its main points : • EX is no NN emergency . • NN is far slower than predicted . • CO2 is plant food , DT basis of all life on NNP . • Natural as well as anthropogenic factors cause NN of DT NNP . A wise man once VBD , “ If PRP tell a lie big enough and keep repeating PRP , NNS will eventually come to believe PRP . ” Another wise man once VBD , “ Freedom of DT press is guaranteed only to those who own CD . ” Thank God EX are honest alternative NN outlets IN American Free Press still publishing DT truth about contentious topics . text: Jane Fonda is an American actress best known for her acting career , political activism and aerobic - exercise videos . DT daughter of acclaimed actor Henry Fonda , DT actress has won two Oscars . Born Lady Jayne Seymour Fonda on December 21 , 1937 , in NNP York City , Jane Fonda has enjoyed a tremendous career as an actress . She comes from a Hollywood dynasty of sorts . Her father Henry was CD of DT top actors of DT 20th century . Her brother Peter and her niece Bridget have RB had their share of success on DT big screen . Fonda faced some challenges growing up . Her father MD be cold and distant . Her mother , socialite Frances Seymour Brokaw , committed suicide when Fonda was 12 NNS old . Not long after her mother 's death , Fonda developed an eating disorder , which she struggled with for NNS . She attended boarding school and then went to Vassar College . Leaving college , Fonda went to Paris to VB art . Fonda returned to NNP York and did a bit of modeling for a NN . Before long , she decided to follow in her father 's footsteps . In 1954 , she co-starred with her father in a production of DT Country Girl . Fonda began to VB her craft with Lee Strasberg at DT famed Actors Studio a few NNS later . Fonda 's career seemed to really take off in 1960 . She made her film debut in Tall Story ( 1960 ) with Anthony Perkins . On Broadway , Fonda netted a Tony Award nomination for EX Was a Little Girl . She continued to juggle theatrical and film work over DT next few NNS . Working with director George Cukor , Fonda starred in DT romantic comedy DT Chapman Report ( 1962 ) . She shared DT Broadway stage with Celeste Holm in Invitation to a March and Dyan Cannon in DT Fun Couple around this NN . In DT late 1960s , Fonda recreated herself as a type of sex kitten under DT direction of her French filmmaker husband Roger Vadim . This JJ look was most evident in DT 1968 NN fiction tale Barbarella . She soon shed this image for more serious dramatic roles . She scored her first Academy Award nomination for 1969's PRP Shoot Horses , Do n't PRP ? Two NNS later , Fonda took home her first Academy Award for her work on Alan J. Pakula 's thriller Klute , which co-starred Donald Sutherland . On DT big screen , Fonda continued to deliver strong performances . She starred as playwright Lillian Hellman in Julia ( 1977 ) with Vanessa Redgrave . DT following NN , Fonda won her second Academy Award for DT Vietnam War drama Coming Home with Jon Voight . She RB starred in DT hit thriller DT NNP Syndrome ( 1979 ) with Jack Lemmon and Michael Douglas around this NN . Another significant role for Fonda came a few NNS later . She co-starred with her father Henry in On Golden Pond ( 1982 ) . DT film explores DT dynamics of a family during a visit to their summer home . Art mirrored life in this case , with Fonda playing daughter to her real - life father . Katharine Hepburn RB starred as Fonda 's mother . DT film gave her father his first and only Academy Award win as Best Actor . Around this NN , Fonda RB found herself spearheading a national NN craze . She launched an immensely successful series of aerobic - exercise videos . In 2005 , Fonda made a dramatic return to DT JJ eye . She appeared in her first film in almost 15 NNS with Monster - in - Law , which RB starred Jennifer Lopez and Michael Vartan . DT same NN , Fonda published an autobiography , My Life So Far . More film roles followed , including playing DT title character in DT 2007 film Georgia Rule with Lindsay Lohan . Working on DT small screen , Fonda landed a recurring role on DT NN - focused dramatic series DT Newsroom in 2012 . She RB played former First Lady Nancy Reagan in DT 2013 film DT Butler . DT following NN , Fonda played DT matriarch in DT family dramatic comedy This Is Where I Leave PRP with Jason Bateman and Tina Fey . In 2015 , Fonda teamed up with longtime friend Lily Tomlin for DT series Grace and Frankie . DT show looks at two women who work to rebuild their lives after their husbands fall in love with each other and leave them . Martin Sheen plays Fonda 's husband , Robert , and Sam Waterston plays Tomlin 's husband , Sol . DT NN Fonda RB delivered a standout performance alongside Michael Caine and Harvey Keitel in Youth , earning a Golden Globe nomination for Supporting Actress . In addition to her acting , Fonda became an outspoken critic of DT Vietnam War . She traveled to North Vietnam in 1972 — a visit WDT caused an uproar back at home . JJ were particularly upset by Fonda 's decision to pose for photos while sitting on an antiaircraft gun , CD used to shoot at American troops . She was given DT nickname " Hanoi Jane " and seen as a traitor for her support of DT North Vietnamese . Fonda RB fought for social causes , serving as a spokesperson on issues of civil rights and women 's rights . Rededicating herself to activism , Fonda moved to Washington , D.C. , in September 2019 to embark on a series of JJ protests to highlight DT urgency of NN NN . She was arrested multiple times as a result , often alongside famous friends IN Waterston , Ted Danson and Catherine Keener . Fonda has been married three times — all of these unions ended in divorce . Her marriage to filmmaker Roger Vadim lasted from 1965 to 1973 , and PRP had a daughter named Vanessa together . Then she married activist and politician Tom Hayden in 1973 . PRP welcomed their son Troy Garity DT same NN . When Troy was a teenager , Fonda RB unofficially adopted a young African - American girl named Mary Williams . Williams later wrote about her life with Fonda in DT 2013 memoir DT Lost Daughter . After divorcing Hayden in 1990 , Fonda soon found love with NN mogul Ted Turner . Married in 1991 , DT pair stayed together for a decade . DT couple divorced in 2001 , reportedly over Fonda 's newfound Christian faith . She went on to date music producer Richard Perry for nearly a decade , until PRP split in 2017 .

DT biologists need months to nurture enough corals to restore a couple of square meters . Reef restoration seems IN an impossible task , but PRP are relentless .
