text: ( from Wikipedia ) Dr. J. Marvin Herndon is an American interdisciplinary scientist , who earned his BA degree in physics in 1970 from DT University of California , San Diego and his Ph.D. degree in nuclear chemistry in 1974 from Texas A&M University . For three NNS , J. Marvin Herndon was a post - doctoral assistant to Hans Suess and Harold C. Urey in geochemistry and cosmochemistry at DT University of California , San Diego . He is DT NNP of Transdyne Corporation in San Diego , California . He has been profiled in Current Biography , and dubbed a “ maverick geophysicist ” by DT Washington Post . He suggested IN DT composition of DT inner core of NNP is nickel silicide . DT conventional view is IN PRP is an iron–nickel alloy . More recently , he has suggested " georeactor " planetocentric nuclear fission reactors as NN sources for DT gas giant outer planets as DT NN source and production mechanism for DT geomagnetic field and stellar ignition by nuclear fission . ( paper ) Deadly Ultraviolet UV-C and UV - B Penetration to NNP ’s Surface : Human and Environmental NN Implications ( paper ) Contamination of DT Biosphere with Mercury : Another Potential Consequence of On-going NNP Manipulation Using Aerosolized Coal Fly Ash ( paper ) An Open Letter to Members of AGU , EGU , and IPCC Alleging Promotion of Fake NNP at DT Expense of Human and Environmental NNP and Comments on AGU Draft Geoengineering Position Statement ( paper ) Evidence of Variable NN - heat Production , JJ Non-anthropogenic NN NN , and Geoengineered JJ NN and Polar Melting ( video ) Evidence of Coal Fly Ash Toxic Chemical Geoengineering on DT Troposphere : Consequences for NNP NNP Deadly Ultraviolet UV-C and UV - B Penetration to NNP ’s Surface : Human and Environmental NN Implications This work was a joint effort between DT authors WDT is part of an ongoing collaboration aimed at providing scientific , JJ , JJ NN implications and evidence related to aerosolized coal fly ash including its use in DT near - daily , near - JJ covert geoengineering activity . Author JMH was primary responsible for mineralogical and geophysical considerations . Author RDH was responsible for solar spectral irradiance measurements . Author MW was primarily responsible for JJ and JJ NN considerations . All authors read and approved DT final manuscript . Contamination of DT Biosphere with Mercury : Another Potential Consequence of On- VBG NN Manipulation Using Aerosolized Coal Fly Ash This work was a joint effort between DT authors WDT is part of an ongoing collaboration aimed at providing scientific , JJ , JJ NN implications and evidence related to DT near - daily , nearglobal covert geoengineering activity . Author JMH was primary responsible for geophysical considerations . Author MW was primarily responsible for JJ and JJ NN considerations . Both authors read and approved DT final manuscript . An Open Letter to Members of AGU , EGU , and IPCC Alleging Promotion of Fake NNP at DT Expense of Human and Environmental NNP and Comments on AGU Draft Geoengineering Position Statement In september 2017 , Dr. J Marvin Herndon published a critical expose of DT AGU , EGU , and IPCC alleging DT promotion of falsified NN to promote certain globalist causes . This paper can be founin its entirety at this location : An Open Letter to Members of AGU , EGU , and IPCC Alleging Promotion of Fake NNP Evidence of Variable NN - heat Production , JJ Non-anthropogenic NN NN , and Geoengineered JJ NN and Polar Melting DT publication has been announced in PR Newswire . PRP can view DT paper RB or use DT link at DT bottom of this section : Quote From DT Announcement Either directly or indirectly , Dr. Herndon is exposing DT propaganda WDT is being spread by governments claiming IN jet trails are " contrails " . NNP Skywatch has been actively working to open DT NN 's eyes to this very harmful aerosol injection for NNS . In DT announcement , Dr. Herndon says : NN models evaluated by DT IPCC are based on DT assumptions WDT : ( 1 ) Heat derived from DT Sun is constant ; ( 2 ) Heat derived from within DT NNP is constant ; and , ( 3 ) Anthropogenic contributions to atmospheric NN stem mainly from heat retention by CO2 and other greenhouse gases . Geophysical evidence of variable earthquake activity and geological evidence of variable submarine volcanism presented here indicate IN heat added to DT oceans is variable . DT increasing occurrences of earthquakes of magnitudes ≥ 6 and ≥ 7 during 1973 - 2015 indicate volcanic activity is increasing and therefore NNP - heat , as well as volcanic CO2 additions , is increasing . Moreover , increased heat additions to DT ocean act to decrease seawater solubility of CO2 , ultimately releasing additional CO2 to DT atmosphere . Furthermore , increasing submarine volcanic activity implies increasing ocean acidification , but data are insufficient to make quantitative estimates . DT validity of IPCC evaluations and assessments depends critically upon due consideration being given to all processes WDT potentially affect NNP ’s heat balance . In addition to DT geological and geophysical processes discussed , DT scientific community , including IPCC NNS , has turned a blind eye to ongoing tropospheric geoengineering WDT in recent NNS has been occurring on a near - daily , near - JJ basis . Tropospheric aerosolized particulates , evidenced as coal fly ash , inhibit rainfall , heat DT atmosphere , and cause JJ NN . Evidence obtained from an accidental air - drop release indicates efforts to melt glacial NN and enhance JJ NN . By ignoring ongoing tropospheric geoengineering , IPCC assessments are compromised , as is DT moral authority of DT NNP Nations . Evidence of Coal Fly Ash Toxic Chemical Geoengineering on DT Troposphere : Consequences for NNP NNP In this video , Dr. J Marvin Herndon exposes DT evidence demonstrating IN toxic substances are being sprayed into DT atmosphere , and IN at least some of these substances match DT chemical footprint for toxic coal fly ash , which is known to contain heavy metals such as mercury , aluminum , lead , arsenic , cadmium , selenium , thallium , boron , antimony , barium , strontium , vanadium , beryllium , chromium , and cobalt . Paper : Obtaining Evidence of Coal Fly Ash Content in Weather Modification ( Geoengineering ) Through Analysis of Post - Aerosol - Spraying Rainwater and Solid Substances In January 2015 , Dr. Herndon wrote a letter to DT San Diego city council expressing his concern about chemtrails . This letter has been reprinted below . January 16 , 2015 To : Mayor Kevin L. Faulconer , and San Diego City Council Members From : J. Marvin Herndon , Ph.D . Subject : Pervasive Toxic Aerosol Spraying of San Diego Residents I am a scientist ( PhD in nuclear chemistry , Post - Doctoral in Geochemistry and Cosmochemistry ) and businessman , and have lived in Scripps Ranch for thirty seven NNS . Over DT past NN DT skies above San Diego have changed drastically in plain sight . PRP ’ve been robbed of DT beautiful blue skies PRP associate with our city . Almost every day jet airliners are spraying innumerable so - called “ chemtrails ” and PRP persist after release behind DT jets to gradually form clouds . Chemical clouds . Toxic clouds . PRP eventually diffuse and form a white haze in DT sky . Sometimes , DT artificial clouds are laid so thickly as to make DT otherwise blue San Diego sky fully overcast with toxic chemical aerosols . Sometimes , depending on chemical mix , DT transition from spray to white haze is rapid . Please see a few examples , attached , IN I photographed from my front yard . Chemicals sprayed into DT atmosphere do not remain suspended ; PRP fall to contaminate DT air PRP breathe , our rainwater , and our agricultural soil . This ongoing massive spraying taking place over San Diego represents a grave threat to me and my family , my neighbors , and all my fellow San Diegans . Rainwater collected after intensive aerosol spraying now reportedly contains elevated levels of aluminum , barium , and strontium and likely other toxins . Aluminum is implicated in diseases such as Alzheimer ’s , Parkinson ’s , and NN , whose rising incidence is causing alarm to JJ Americans . How JJ additional NNS will be doomed to suffer a lifetime of NN ? How JJ additional San Diegans will suffer premature brain degeneration or cancer ? What horrors lie in store for our NNS and grandchildren who unknowingly play outdoors , or DT pregnant women with their unborn offspring , or DT runners and other outdoor recreationists ? What about those of PRP who suffer asthma or who have compromised immune systems ? What about DT elderly ? What about your own family ? Are PRP San Diegans no longer free to breathe uncontaminated air ? Why are San Diego ’s Mayor and members of San Diego City Council silent about this imminent JJ NN threat ? Were PRP duped into believing IN toxic chemical clouds will keep NNP from VBG ? Clouds might reflect sunlight back into space but those same artificial clouds RB keep NNP from cooling by not letting NNP ’s heat escape during DT night . Clouds , artificial or natural , trap heat ! Why DT silence ? Are PRP afraid EX will be demonstrations or riots in DT streets if DT truth were told about DT ongoing activity WDT poisons DT air San Diegans are now breathing ? Deception by acquiescence and silence is fundamentally wrong , unless PRP are a willing participant in activities WDT will likely come to be characterized as crimes against humanity . As elected officials PRP have DT responsibility to advise and protect all San Diegans . Please speak DT truth and stop this spraying over our homes . DT following links provide information PRP MD find of benefit . Chemtrail websites : http://www.geoengineeringwatch.org/ http://stopsprayingcalifornia.com/ http://www.endgeoengineering.com/index.html Interview with a neurosurgeon : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3lW-TGGlk0 Please advise me of your intensions to make JJ disclosure of DT chemical spraying over San Diego . Kindly respond before DT close of business on January 23 , 2015 , or I will assume PRP have no intention of responding . Sincerely , J. Although DT individual algae are microscopic , when PRP grow at scale , DT green snow can even be seen from space . For DT NN , DT team combined on - DT - ground research from two summers in DT Antarctic Peninsula with images from DT European Space Agency 's Sentinel 2 satellite taken between 2017 and 2019 . Over 60 % of blooms were found near penguin colonies , and others were found near birds ' nesting sites . text: In recent NNS , NN NN has loomed IN a dark specter over DT globe , contributing to everything from gentrification in Miami to refugees fleeing drought and crop shortages in Guatemala . But DT urgency around DT issue reached JJ heights in 2018 when DT NNP Nations ' Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) stated IN rapid , " far - reaching and unprecedented changes in all aspects of society " MD be needed in order to drop carbon dioxide levels by 2030 and prevent catastrophic JJ NN . NNS have indeed proposed drastic measures — just not in DT way WDT PRP might VB . In DT same IPCC report , DT U.N. suggests IN adding 2.5 billion acres ( 1 billion hectares ) of forest to DT NN MD limit JJ NN to 2.7 degrees Fahrenheit ( 1.5 degrees Celsius ) by 2050 . In other words : Responding to NN NN will require planting JJ trees . A lot of them . And now , DT U.N. might just have DT data to back up their proposal . In a recent NN , unveiled July 5 , 2019 in DT journal NNP , a group of researchers associated with DT Crowther Lab in Switzerland found IN JJ tree restoration to DT tune of 223 million acres ( 900 million hectares ) of canopy cover — an area WDT 's approximately DT size of DT U.S. — is " our most effective NN NN solution to date . " These trees MD store 205 billion tons ( 186 metric tons ) of carbon , or roughly two thirds of DT carbon WDT has been emitted " as a result of human activity since DT Industrial Revolution , " according to a press release . Although some NN reports have VBN this much forest restoration is DT equivalent of roughly 1 trillion trees , this statistic is actually linked to an estimate from an older 2015 NN . Jean - François Bastin , DT Crowther Lab 's NN lead author , breaks down their 2019 analysis by email . " DT idea was to estimate what tree cover MD be expected when PRP removed DT ' human factor , ' i.e. what specific types of forest MD naturally occur in DT absence of other development , and where , " he says . Bastin and his team used a form of artificial intelligence known as " machine learning " to build " a model to link tree cover with NN / soil / topography , based on 78,000 observations of tree cover in protected areas . " DT researchers then projected DT data further to estimate DT " total potential tree cover of DT NN , " Bastin explains . Afterward , DT team excluded land currently being used for urban settlements , croplands and existing forests , which yielded DT total amount of land available for restoration . DT NN includes a map showing how much tree coverage different parts of DT globe can support ; DT top three areas include Russia , Canada and DT U.S . In JJ ways , DT NN 's timing MD n't be more perfect , as PRP aligns with current JJ efforts around ecological restoration . CD example is DT Trillion Trees Vision , which seeks to restore 1 trillion trees by 2050 . Another is DT Bonn Challenge , which is a partnership between DT NN of Germany and DT U.N. 's International Union for Conservation of Nature WDT aims to restore 371 million acres ( 150 million hectares ) of deforested land by 2020 . PRP might be thinking , well , DT sounds pretty easy . Let 's all roll up our sleeves and save DT NN by planting CD tree at a NN — right ? But some experts say DT situation is actually a little more complicated than DT rosy picture . Especially if most nations do n't chip in to help . " Implementation of forest restoration on DT scale discussed in this paper is not as straightforward as PRP might seem , " says Jim Hallett , chair of DT board of directors for DT Society for Ecological Restoration . " By 2018 , EX were commitments of over 420 million acres ( 170 million hectares ) by 58 nations , which exceeds DT Bonn Challenge goal . Current estimates indicate IN around 29 percent of DT committed lands are now under restoration , but most of this work has been done by a few NNS . " Hallett cites major challenges to implementing restoration on such a JJ scale , " including financing , governance , land tenure and ownership , [ and ] capacity to do DT work . " Hallett concludes , " EX is ample evidence IN , in some contexts , if DT benefits of restoration are not equally shared , DT project will fail . So incentive programs have to be carefully developed . " Although Hallett agrees IN forest restoration is important to addressing NN NN , restoration alone will likely not be enough . PRP takes NN , after all , to implement such big restoration projects and RB for these trees to store carbon . And Hallett stresses IN " DT possibility of future restoration should not be used as an excuse for degrading intact lands . " Other NNS question not only DT practicality of DT NN 's claims , but RB DT NN 's very methodology . " JJ of DT allegedly available restoration areas are clearly unsuitable for more trees than PRP currently support . If PRP look closely at DT map , a large proportion of these areas are in regions where soils are permanently frozen , " says Eike Luedeling , a NN NN researcher and professor of horticultural sciences at DT University of Bonn . Luedeling continues , " DT methodology implicitly ( probably not on purpose ) implies IN carbon stock is proportional to canopy cover , i.e. ecosystems without trees contain no carbon . This is clearly false and strongly inflates DT JJ estimate [ of restoration ] . " Jan Börner , Luedeling 's colleague and a professor for economics of sustainable land use at DT University of Bonn , is similarly skeptical . Börner says IN some areas being proposed for restoration under DT current NN are already in use for other purposes . Börner considers DT NN to be an " interesting academic exercise ... but as a [ NN NN ] mitigation strategy proposal ( and PRP is being advertised as such ! ) , PRP sends a misleading signal to DT international NN policy debate . " But do n't fret just yet . Both Bastin and Hallett emphasize IN DT U.N. has declared 2021 to 2030 DT " Decade on Ecosystem Restoration , " which MD spur nations to act quickly — and some NNS are already tackling DT initiative head on . And , according to Hallett , forest restoration boasts far more perks than just impacting NN NN , including maintaining — or even increasing — biodiversity and preserving DT ecosystem WDT PRP humans rely upon for our food and NN . But even DT NN 's authors acknowledge IN PRP 's VBG to take a lot of goodwill to make this grand vision a reality . " What PRP need is universal action : international agencies , NGOs , governments , all citizens — anyone can be involved , " says Bastian . " Local communities and small organizations MD be especially effective . While PRP do not have DT same reach as national agencies , PRP have DT benefit of knowing what works best in their own backyards . text: Scenario in which human civilization experiences catastrophic events due to NN NN A NN apocalypse ( RB called a NN dystopia and a NN - induced collapse , among other names ) is a hypothetical scenario involving DT JJ collapse of human civilization and potential human extinction as either a direct or indirect result of anthropogenic NN NN and ecological breakdown . Under a JJ catastrophe of this scale , some or all of DT NNP MD be rendered uninhabitable as a result of extreme temperatures , severe weather events , an inability to grow crops , and an altered composition of DT NNP 's atmosphere . [ 1 ] Although EX is consensus on DT attribution of recent NN NN to human activity , [ 2 ] and concern about future tipping points and feedback loops , EX is no consensus on DT likelihood of NN - induced collapse .[ citation needed ] Rhetoric and belief centered on apocalypticism has deep roots in religious contexts , and similar rhetorical approaches undergird secular apocalyptic interpretations of NN . [ 3 ] Historical interpretations fall into two visions of apocalypse : DT tragic and DT comic . Tragic apocalypticism frames a clearly divided good and evil , with preordained events . text: NN policy is dangling between DT cynicism of Donald NNP and DT radicalism of Greta Thunberg . DT NNP NN has just pulled DT NN ’s second - largest emitter of greenhouse gases out of DT Paris NN accord . Ms Thunberg demands significantly more than a 50 per cent cut in JJ net NNS by 2030 . DT former is certainly irresponsible . But DT latter seems inconceivable . DT exasperation of radical NN activists is understandable . Despite decades of talk , NNS of greenhouse gases and JJ temperatures continue to rise . If DT trend does not alter soon , DT chances of avoiding an increase in JJ average temperatures of more than 1.5C above pre-industrial levels will be zero and those of avoiding a 2C increase will be tiny . As DT IMF notes in its latest Fiscal Monitor , meeting DT latter goal requires reducing NNS of greenhouse gases by a third below DT baseline , by 2030 . To keep below a 1.5C increase , NNS need to be half of DT baseline . DT longer DT delay in acting , DT larger DT required action becomes , until nothing can be done because PRP will be too late . PRP is already almost too late to avoid what experts view as destructive and irreversible changes in NN . For DT reason , dramatic policies are needed . Yet PRP are feasible , argues DT NNP Transitions Commission , if PRP are firmly implemented over DT next three decades . Unfortunately , DT outright opposition of NNS such as Mr NNP , and DT indifference of much of DT population , are not DT sole obstacles to success . Even some who favour action are a problem , because DT NN cause is for them part of a wider campaign against DT market . Thus , JJ supporters of DT Green NNP Deal view NN as a justification for DT planned economy . As British journalist Paul Mason argues : “ Labour wants to combat NN NN through three mechanisms : NN spending , NN lending and DT NN direction of private finance . ” This approach allows opponents to argue IN DT left is more concerned with destroying market economies than saving DT NN . DT mess created by trying to plan an economy into zero net NNS in a decade might bring all attempts at mitigation into disrepute . In any case , NN NN will not be solved by CD country . To succeed , policy must be effective , legitimate and JJ . To be effective , policy must combine planning , regulation , research and incentives . EX is strong justification for NN actions in research , spatial planning and finance . But EX is RB a need for incentives aimed at shifting behaviour . Command and control are rarely as effective all on their own . DT IMF report suggests $ 75 a tonne of carbon might be DT price in 2030 consistent with keeping DT temperature increase below 2C . Today , while EX are a host of pricing arrangements , DT prices themselves are mostly far too low and variable over NN and across NNS to be useful . Yet , in principle , a carbon tax , or an NNS trading system with a price floor , is DT most effective ( because most comprehensive ) way to influence NNS . Schemes WDT generate fiscal revenue ought RB to be attractive to politicians , because DT money can be used for other valuable purposes . Taxing a “ bad ” ( a form of pollution , in this case ) always offers an opportunity to improve taxation or raise valuable spending . An important point made by DT IMF report is IN such NNS as NNP and India MD benefit especially from a reduction in local environmental pollution , because of DT benefits of reduced use of coal . PRP is RB vital IN these NNS do see such benefits from use of carbon taxes , because PRP are VBG to have to play a big part in bringing about DT needed reductions in JJ NNS ( relative to DT baseline ) . PRP is in these NNS , too , IN a huge part of DT needed investment in JJ NN systems must be made . So incentives matter greatly . To make policy legitimate , PRP is essential to compensate losers . PRP is not true IN DT poor are always proportionately most adversely affected by higher NN prices . But protests by DT rest of DT population matter , too . Compensation for higher fuel prices needs to be visible . As important , a convincing vision of a better future must be offered . Otherwise , DT necessary changes in policy will never be accepted . Finally , policy has to be JJ , with all DT bigger economies involved . This creates huge problems of equity . Clearly PRP are never VBG to reach a perfect solution . But some solution will have to be found in generous assistance from high - income NNS to emerging and developing NNS , especially with DT introduction of JJ technologies . This RB raises an important question : what is to be done with free - riders and , above all , DT biggest free - rider of all , DT rogue NNP ? DT answer in principle is clear : PRP will have to be penalised quite heavily . If PRP accept , as PRP should , DT urgency of DT challenge , this follows quite naturally . What , then , is to be done ? DT answers include a programme of action over three decades , starting now ; pragmatic resort to all policy tools , including market - based incentives ; use of DT revenue raised from carbon pricing to compensate losers and make DT tax system and NN mitigation more efficient ; a stress on DT local environment benefits of eliminating DT use of fossil fuels ; and , above all , a commitment to NN as a shared JJ challenge . In an era of populism and nationalism , is EX any chance of all this ? Not obviously , alas . If so , PRP will indeed have failed . But DT young are surely right to expect better . text: With No Visitors , Australian Scuba Companies Are Planting Coral On Great Barrier Reef While DT Australian tourism industry MD have dried up in DT NN lockdown , dive tour operators have decided to put their NN to good use by planting coral along DT Great Barrier Reef . Family - owned Cairns - based company Passions of Paradise have provided a catamaran and fuel . Other businesses involved include Wavelength , Ocean Freedom , Sailaway and Quicksilver Cruises . PRP are working alongside a team from DT University of Technology Sydney led by Dr. David Suggett . DT initiative is called DT Coral Nurture Program . Similar projects in DT area were already in place , such as DT Crown - of - Thorns ( a coral destroying starfish ) eradication and DT Eye on Reef monitoring program . But what makes this latest project unique is IN PRP ’s DT first NN tour companies have worked together with researchers . DT technique being used to restore DT coral – using ‘ coral clips ’ , is RB a first . Lorna Howlett , project coordinator and PhD student , explains how PRP works : “ PRP involves finding fragments of opportunity – coral fragments WDT have naturally broken off , ” she VBD . “ And attaching them back on to DT reef using a coral clip . PRP can only use fragments of opportunity found at DT site , so Passions of Paradise has installed six frames at DT site which can be used as a nursery to grow more corals . ” Approximately 1000 pieces of coral have been planted on Hastings Reef so far . DT Great Barrier Reef is home to an incredibly diverse array of sea-life and was declared a NNP Heritage Area in 1981 . Situated off DT northeast coast of Australia , PRP stretches for around 2300 km . PRP is DT biggest coral reef system in DT NN , comprising around 2900 individual reefs and 900 islands . A 2014 report by DT Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority found IN NN NN and JJ heating is DT biggest threat to DT reef . Polluted land NN quality running into DT NN , coastal development , fishing , ocean acidification and coral bleaching are other major issues . According to a 2012 report , DT Great Barrier Reef has lost half PRP ’s coral since 1985 . In 2015 , DT Reef 2050 Plan came into place . This is a 35 - NN plan for DT long - term management of pollution and NN NN . Anthony McLennan is an experienced journalist who has written for some of South Africa ’s biggest publications . RB a photographer , soccer coach , dog- lover and surfer , enjoys spending NN outdoors in beautiful Cape Town . He believes IN a JJ approach is needed to sustain our NN and IN PRP is important to put this message out .

text: Pharma hack Paul Offit accidentally admits IN DT FDA ’s process for licensing NNS is fraudulent In a failed attempt at trying to dissuade educated parents against choosing to not have their NNS vaccinated based on antibody blood tests , Big Pharma hack Paul Offit has inadvertently admitted , on DT record , IN DT federal NN ’s official NN policies are fundamentally flawed , at best , and very likely scientifically fraudulent . In a recent video published by DT “ NNP Education Center ” at DT NNP ’s Hospital of Philadelphia ( CHOP ) where he works , Offit tries to make DT case IN antibody blood tests , which measure antibody levels as an indicator of immunity against NN , are n’t medically useful . If this is DT case , then everything WDT DT Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) and Centers for NNP Control and Prevention ( CDC ) rely upon to create NN policy is RB not medically useful , or accurate . Using antibody blood tests to try to measure a protective immune response , in Offit ’s own words , is “ not as easily done as PRP MD VB . ” And yet , DT presence of antibodies in DT blood has long been what NN officials claim is , in fact , a valid indicator IN a person is immune to NN – so which is PRP ? DT answer is neither and both , depending upon what ’s trying to be accomplished . In Offit ’s case , DT goal is to keep as JJ parents as possible on DT NN train , which will ensure IN NN manufacturers VBP himself continue to rake in massive profits . At DT same NN , Offit ’s very argument is invalidated by his own admissions towards this end , as he clearly VBZ in DT video IN antibody titer does not necessarily correlate with immunity . Similarly , a lack of antibodies is not necessarily an indicator of a lack of immunity . Using a measles outbreak WDT occurred during DT late 1980s and early 1990s to try to make his point , Offit VBZ in DT video IN , when looking back on this particular outbreak , PRP was discovered IN “ EX were JJ NNS who had been vaccinated , but who did n’t have antibodies against measles who were still protected . ” In other words , antibody tests are n’t , in fact , a valid indicator of immunity , even though this is what DT NN uses as “ evidence ” WDT NNS somehow work . “ DT reason PRP were still protected is PRP had something called memory cells , ” Offit further explains . “ Memory immunological cells , IN B - and T - cells , which then , when PRP were exposed to DT NN , became activated , differentiated , made antibodies , which then protected them . So even though PRP did n’t have circulating antibodies in their bloodstream , PRP still have these memory cells in their immune system WDT MD then respond when PRP were exposed . So , if PRP looked at those NNS and saw PRP did n’t have antibodies , PRP MD have falsely concluded PRP were n’t protected when PRP were . ” For more NN about DT NN ’s NN fraud , be sure to check out Vaccines.news . Thank PRP , Paul Offit , for once again illustrating why parents should n’t vaccinate their NNS Offit goes on in DT video to admit IN sometimes PRP can have antibodies in your bloodstream “ and not be protected ” – again , his own words . As PRP turns out , PRP appears to be some combination of antibody levels , cell - mediated immunity , and mucosal immunity WDT provides true protection against NN , depending on DT NN , meaning NN NN as PRP ’s currently being propagated by JJ NN officials is wholly inaccurate and unreliable . PRP remains unclear whether or not Offit truly realizes what he ’s confessed to , here , seeing as how DT video in question is still available for viewing on DT CHOP website . Or perhaps Offit is too dense to even realize what he ’s now publicly admitted , which only goes to show how deluded these NN - pushers are when PRP comes to their methods of persuasion . Hilariously , Offit ’s conclusion in DT video is n’t IN DT entirety of NN NN needs to be reevaluated due to these inherent flaws . Instead , he says DT , because “ titers are difficult , ” and “ not a perfect indicator ” of immunity , IN “ DT best way of knowing IN PRP ’re protected is to VB DT NNS WDT are recommended at DT NN PRP are recommended . ” In other words , nothing DT NN lobby has been saying for decades makes an ounce of sense , and DT whole thing is obviously a fraud . But keep on getting your NNS , NNS , because DT ’s DT only way to keep yourself safe and healthy ! CD wonders : Who is actually buying this tripe anymore and subjecting their family to its illogical provisions ? “ Far from providing parents with a convincing argument for why PRP should strictly comply with DT CDC ’s childhood NN schedule , what Paul Offit and DT CHOP have provided PRP with in this video is a strong argument for why DT very process by which NNS obtain licensure by DT FDA is scientifically invalid , ” writes Jeremy R. Hammond , a contributing writer for NNP ’s NNP Defense ( CHD ) . “ Indeed , DT conclusion seems inescapable IN DT FDA ’s use of antibody titers as a surrogate measure of immunity for DT purposes of NN licensure amounts to scientific fraud . ” Be sure to read Hammond ’s full , in - depth analysis of Offit ’s video at NNP ’s NNP Defense .

text: Here ’s DT bad : DT ship , Kapitan Dranitsyn , burned so much fuel IN now PRP , too , has to be resupplied . Another icebreaker is on its way to bring PRP more fuel . Such are DT logistical complexities of DT expedition , known as Mosaic , in which a German research ship , Polarstern , has been drifting with DT NN NN in DT Arctic Ocean since October with a revolving complement of NNS . DT ship is expected to come out of DT NN east of Greenland in September after gathering a NN ’s worth of data on conditions in DT remote Central Arctic . DT Kapitan Dranitsyn left Tromso , Norway , on Jan. 29 with 43 tons of food , fuel and other supplies for DT Polarstern , as well as a replacement team of researchers and technicians for what is DT third two - month leg of DT expedition . DT resupply trip was expected to take about two weeks , but DT icebreaker ran into trouble from DT start , when a storm in DT Barents NNP forced PRP to anchor off Tromso for DT better part of a week . Once underway , DT ship encountered NN NN WDT had gotten much thicker as DT winter progressed — doubling to more than 5 feet , or 1.5 meters , in places . DT Kapitan Dranitsyn finally arrived at DT Polarstern on Feb. 28 . After several days unloading DT supplies and transferring personnel across about a half - mile of NN in dangerous conditions ( a wind chill of minus 72 degrees Fahrenheit , or about minus 58 Celsius ) , DT Kapitan Dranitsyn left for DT return trip to Tromso . But calculations showed IN PRP MD not have enough diesel fuel for DT journey . So on March 3 , another icebreaker , DT Admiral Makarov , left Murmansk , Russia , with a load of extra fuel to intercept DT Kapitan Dranitsyn on its way . Early this week , DT two ships were about 350 miles , or roughly 560 kilometers , apart . Markus Rex , an atmospheric scientist who is Mosaic ’s leader , wrote in a blog post IN DT delay in resupplying DT Polarstern was “ absolutely in keeping with what had to be expected ” given DT NN conditions .

text: veryone faces choices every day WDT carry a NN cost . Do PRP turn DT lights on in DT morning , or is DT light of daybreak sufficient for finding matching socks ? Do PRP feast on bacon and eggs for breakfast , or will a bowl of oatmeal suffice ? EX is a lot of talk these days about DT need to lead lower - carbon lifestyles . EX is RB a lot of finger - pointing VBG on and , some argue , virtue signaling . But who is truly walking DT NN walk ? DT carnivore who does n’t fly ? DT vegan who travels to see family abroad ? If nobody is without carbon sin , who gets to cast DT first lump of coal ? If all NN advocates were expected to live off DT grid , eating only what PRP MD grow themselves and wearing only DT clothes PRP ’d knitted from scratch , EX MD n’t be much of a NN movement . DT level of sacrifice is unacceptable to most . PRP do n’t need to ban cars ; PRP need to electrify them ( and PRP need DT electricity to come from clean NN ) . PRP do n’t need to ban burgers ; PRP need NN - friendly beef . To spur these changes , PRP need to put a price on carbon , to incentivize polluters to invest in these solutions . Though air travel accounts for only a paltry 2 % of JJ NNS , whether or not NN NNS should fly consumes far more than 2 % of my Twitter timeline . Unfortunately , sometimes doing NN means traveling great distances , and PRP do n’t always have DT NN or luxury to take slower low - carbon options . PRP have a job to do , after all . But even still , a single scientist , or even hundreds of NNS , choosing to never fly again is not VBG to VB DT system . Purchasing carbon offsets for flights is a viable means of decarbonizing your air travel , for now . However , DT true solution , pricing carbon , requires policy NN . EX is a long history of industry - funded “ deflection campaigns ” aimed to divert attention from big polluters and place DT burden on individuals . Individual action is important and something PRP should all champion . But appearing to force Americans to give up meat , or travel , or other things central to DT lifestyle PRP ’ve chosen to live is politically dangerous : PRP plays right into DT hands of NN - NN deniers whose strategy tends to be to portray NN champions as freedom - hating totalitarians . DT bigger issue is IN focusing on individual choices around air travel and beef consumption heightens DT risk of losing sight of DT gorilla in DT room : civilization ’s reliance on fossil fuels for NN and transport overall , which accounts for roughly two - thirds of JJ carbon NNS . PRP need systemic changes WDT will reduce everyone ’s carbon footprint , whether or not PRP care . DT good NN is PRP have tactics to bring environmentally friendly ( and non-lifestyle - disrupting ) options to fruition­ : pricing carbon NNS and creating incentives for renewable NN and reduced consumption . By putting a price on carbon , NNS can actually make money by reducing NNS , selling their services to corporations WDT are always looking for ways to cut costs . Never underestimate DT resourcefulness of Americans when EX ’s a dime to be made ! But a price on carbon needs to be designed such IN marginalized communities most at risk from NN impacts are n’t adversely impacted economically as well . This is why PRP really need political NN at every level , from local leaders to federal legislators all DT way up to DT NNP . PRP need NN not just at DT breakfast table , but at DT ballot box as well . This is CD article in a series on DT NN of DT NN ’s response to NN NN . Read DT rest of DT stories and sign up for CD . text: Ban Ki-moon gives up fight against NN NN In November 2009 , DT ClimateGate erupted and JJ of PRP were convinced IN DT establishment of NN fear MD quickly collapse . I was imagining IN PRP MD be as fast as DT Velvet Revolution WDT began exactly 20 NNS earlier . So JJ NN skeptics were disillusioned by DT speed . Now , 14 months later , things are beginning to move at DT top places . Barack Obama has n’t mentioned any NN , NN , disruption , carbon , or fossil fuels in his key annual talk – even though he was talking for a whole hour . DT Guardian just brought PRP another dose of good NN : DT boss of DT NNP Nations will stop his personal involvement in DT battle to regulate DT NN NN . Instead , he will try to achieve “ immediate gains ” in DT field of clean NN and sustainable development . Even his U.N. colleagues have apparently understood IN EX ca n’t be any “ deal ” . Now , obviously , I have nothing whatsoever against clean or renewable NN sources . My only complaint is against huge subsidies of such things WDT used to be justified ideologically – by DT deluded propaganda about NN disruption . Stock up with Fresh Food WDT lasts with eFoodsDirect ( AD ) If this propaganda really goes away , as Obama and Ki-moon indicate by their shifted attitudes , EX is a hope IN common sense and rational costs - and - benefits analysis will return to DT NN industry and beyond . In DT 2011 NN of DT Union address , Obama RB mentioned oil and biofuels WDT MD replace PRP . DT ’s surprising because even Al Gore has admitted IN their support of biofuels was a big blunder . On DT other hand , I can imagine IN EX will exist biofuels WDT actually make JJ sense . What I find important is IN politicians will no longer promote nonsensical solutions by general slogans WDT are based on bad NN , fearmongering , and intimidation referring to insane planetary emergencies . PRP , DT NN skeptics , have been warning against such irrational attitudes and PRP have been proved right pretty much in all NNS . First - generation biofuels as well as carbon trading has been showed to be a disaster while solar and wind power turned out to be significant JJ problems in JJ NNS such as my homeland . Well , of course , I do n’t believe IN DT politicians will completely stop doing irrational things . But DT amount of this bad policymaking MD simply decrease as DT rats are gradually leaving DT rotten and sinking bandwagon . Let PRP hope IN JJ other politicians will follow in Obama ’s and Ki-moon ’s footsteps . As JJ more NNS regain their common sense and all plans to regulate carbon evaporate , almost everyone will see IN DT NNP is doing just fine and DT NN skeptics have saved trillions of dollars . Will PRP be rewarded or will PRP remain DT silent heroes who have just saved DT civilization without any greed ? ;-) This article was posted : Friday , January 28 , 2011 at 5:37 am

text: Humans need to adapt to DT impacts of NN NN , for instance through technological solutions such as coastal defences and changes in consumption habits . Humans are already adapting to NN NN , and further adaptation efforts will be necessary during coming decades . However , adaptation alone is not expected to be able to cope will all projected effects since DT options diminish and DT costs increase with rising temperatures . Vulnerability of human populations to NN NN and its consequences can be affected by other factors , such as pollution , conflicts , or epidemics such as AIDS . An emphasis on sustainable development can help human societies reduce their vulnerability to NN NN . However , NN NN itself can become an impediment to their development . Mitigation measures WDT aim to reduce greenhouse gases NNS can help avoid , reduce or delay impacts , and should be implemented in order to ensure IN adaptation capacity is not exceeded .

text: LONDON ( Thomson Reuters Foundation ) - Russia ’s first plan to adapt to NN NN is a tardy but much - needed acknowledgement of DT risks and opportunities presented by JJ NN , although PRP lacks concrete action to address DT increasingly evident threats , analysts VBD . DT document , published this month on a NN website , VBD NN NN MD have a significant and growing influence on Russia ’s “ socio-economic development , living conditions and human NN , as well as on DT NN of JJ infrastructure ” . Alexey Kokorin , head of DT NN and NN program at green group WWF - Russia , told DT Thomson Reuters Foundation adaptation to a VBG NN was “ so evidently a necessity ” . DT negative consequences of NN NN were “ already quite strong ” for Russia but PRP had yet to work out how “ to take advantage of DT positive ones ” , he added . Moscow ’s authorities were even forced to bring in artificial snow for NNP NNP celebrations during DT Russian capital ’s warmest December since 1886 . And in early January , NN melted on DT Yenisei River in Siberia ’s Krasnoyarsk region , flooding several villages . DT document outlines a framework for national adaptation , mainly through legislative amendments and drafting of plans for regions and JJ sectors over DT next three NNS . text: DT whole situation is intractable . Adversaries have locked horns and PRP is impossible to have a civilized debate . PRP are either for or against , right or wrong , good or evil . EX is no room for anything in between . EX is simply no NN to talk , DT end is nigh . Now is DT NN for action , not words . Alarm bells are ringing everywhere . EX is no doubt , DT NN is important : This is about melting glaciers , withering landscapes , rising NN levels and starving polar bears . What always gets left out , however , are DT steps already being taken to make sure less CO2 is released into DT atmosphere . DT things WDT make factories cleaner , lower automobile NNS or even cut them altogether by VBG electric . In most NNS , such measures are brushed off by critics as " greenwashing . " Here are a couple of randomly chosen examples of steps already being taken : 10 NNS ago , DT German steel manufacturer Salzgitter started something PRP called its EnergyEfficiency project . Since then , PRP has saved a million tons of CO2 , as well as consuming 3,300 Terajoule less NN each NN — enough to power some 55,000 households . Another example is Washington NNP Ferries , DT NN 's second - largest ferry operator . DT company is currently in DT process of converting its fleet — which had consumed some 75 million liters ( 20 million gallons ) of diesel fuel annually — to battery power . But why ? Because Governor Jay Inslee signed a law mandating PRP . But DT head of DT company has RB VBN DT NN is n't just about conforming to DT JJ law . He says PRP 's a good idea , adding IN PRP do n't have to be an environmental activist to appreciate DT fact IN PRP means quieter boats , less pollution and more financial savings . More and more companies are VBG green Just recently , during DT latest COP25 JJ NN conference in Madrid , some 180 companies RB committed themselves to ambitious environmental goals , pledging to cut NNS continuously with DT aim of being carbon neutral by 2050 at DT latest . And these are n't small , niche companies , but rather big JJ corporations IN DT consumer goods producer Beiersdorf ; DT NN 's largest beer producer , Ambev ; and DT International Airline Group , Europe 's third - largest airline holding company ( British Airways and Iberia ) . Such commitments have practically doubled DT number of companies now in DT " Business Ambition for 1.5˚C : Our Only Future " alliance since PRP was founded in September of last NN . Admittedly , other things are RB happening , things WDT bewilder activists and realists alike . CD need only look to DT disaster WDT is DT German NN transition . True , DT percentage of NN produced by renewables has gone up , but — according to DT Federal Audit Office – — some € 160 billion ( $ 179 billion ) has RB devoured in DT process . Despite such efforts , DT German solar industry is practically nonexistent and things do n't look much better for DT wind industry . In Germany , NNS prefer to argue about minimum distances between wind turbines and DT next closest village , while our French neighbors negotiate DT construction of six JJ nuclear power plants . Read more : Germany shuts down atomic plant as nuclear phase - out enters final stretch What NN activists really VBP Either way : Is PRP — as NN activists ceaselessly tell PRP — true IN nothing is really happening ? Or have DT topics of sustainability and environmental compatibility finally struck a note with companies ? And if DT latter , is PRP because PRP provide a good sales strategy ? And what MD be wrong with DT if PRP did ? Might PRP not RB make sense to look closer at just what NN activists VBP ? Take Luisa Neubauer , for instance , known here as DT German Greta Thunberg , despite being a few NNS older than DT Swedish teen ; or Carola Rackete , who is internationally known as DT refugee - saving captain of DT ship NNP Watch 3 , but MD prefer to be part of DT Extinction Rebellion movement . Both women have now written books : Rackete called hers " Act : A Call to DT Last Generation , " and Neubauer titled hers " DT End of DT NNP Crisis . " Both books VBP straight to DT heart of DT matter — PRP are full of ideas for bans and penalties . DT authors call for those who destroy nature to be tried for crimes against humanity . Yet , neither wastes words defending individual rights , arguing IN individuals cannot be trusted to decide whether PRP are for or against NN protection . In interviews given after her book was published , Carola Rackete went further still : " Everything PRP do , or do n't do , props up DT current system . " DT 's why civil disobedience is so " extremely urgent . " PRP quickly becomes clear IN what these women are after is something much bigger than NN protection : PRP are at war with DT existing JJ system , with free - market economies , and with capitalism . And anyone who is opposed to DT fight , or is of a different opinion , simply can not be right . Only those who are for radical NN protection are among DT good , and only PRP own DT truth . But anyone who so vehemently clamors for an environmental planned economy should take a quick look into DT recent past . PRP MD seem IN DT disastrous NN of DT environment in former East Germany MD be enough to illustrate just how ineffective planned systems are when PRP comes to sustainability and NN protection . So what now ? In such a heated environment — sorry for DT pun — PRP seems EX is no chance of having a rational debate . But PRP have to talk about how PRP are VBG to tackle this challenge , and PRP is becoming increasingly clear IN DT discussion has to take place between different generations — CD WDT has experienced life , and another WDT is impatient . But apocalyptic scenarios prophesying DT end of DT NN wo n't lead anywhere . At DT most , PRP will simply harden opposition among those of a different opinion . DT MD be a shame , because PRP need DT ideas WDT young NNS have to offer . PRP need their youthful nonchalance , their openness and their curiosity . DT young need to show PRP IN PRP can do things better than PRP — but PRP should RB let PRP come along on DT journey , at least for a while .

text: Since DT Paris Agreement of 2015 , in which signatories agreed to holding DT increase in JJ - average temperature to well below 2 °C above pre-industrial levels and to pursue efforts to limit DT temperature increase to 1.5 °C above pre-industrial levels , EX have been JJ analyses WDT examined DT implications of 1.5 °C and 2 °C of JJ NN , some of which are summarized in DT IPCC Special Report on 1.5 °C ( IPCC SR1.5 ) 5 . JJ different methods6 and experiments have been used to better understand DT differences between 1.5 °C and 2 °C of JJ NN above pre-industrial levels including timeslice extraction from coupled NN model ensembles 7,8 , use of single coupled model ensembles3,9 , multi- model atmosphere - only ensembles2 and pattern scaling 10,11 . PRP is not explicitly stated in DT Paris Agreement text whether DT NN levels refer to equilibrium or transient levels of JJ NN ; however , PRP is generally inferred IN these targets refer to stabilized climate12 . Most of DT analyses WDT were designed to understand DT consequences of these JJ NN targets , especially those focused on atmospheric variables , used transient - model experiments ( analyses of NN - level rise13 and other oceanic variables often use longer coupled - model experiments ) . For example , timeslice extractions under high GHG NNS scenarios from DT fifth phase of DT Coupled Model Intercomparison Project experiment ( CMIP5 ) 1 sample a NN rapidly VBG through DT Paris Agreement limits . Specially designed experiments , such as DT Community NNP System Model ensemble3 , are run to emulate 1.5 °C and 2 °C warmer worlds with evolving radiative forcings for two centuries to generate climates WDT are , in a globally averaged sense for surface air temperature , in a quasi-equilibrium NN . DT atmosphere - only simulations WDT form DT 1.5 °C and 2 °C climates in DT half a degree additional NN , prognosis and projected impacts2 ( HAPPI ) experiment are forced by NN recently observed NN surface temperatures using transient CMIP5 simulations . These different experiments and methods each have differing degrees of transience and none of which are in full equilibrium . Although these experiments all have value , a robust comparison between transient and equilibrium climates has not been possible owing to fundamental differences in model design . Previous research comparing transient and equilibrium climates typically used single JJ NN models 14,15 or a small ensemble of models , such IN agreement and consistency between models MD be investigated 16 . As a result , some differences between transient and equilibrium climates MD be inherent to DT model , or models , WDT were used in these previous analyses . Furthermore , JJ transient simulations of a single model are needed to adequately sample across phases of internal variability to make a robust comparison . Here PRP demonstrate IN transient and quasi-equilibrium climates can be compared using extended medium - NNS simulations and short - term high - NNS simulations from DT CMIP5 multi-model ensemble1 . Our ‘ timeshift technique ’17 enabled PRP to analyse multiple models concurrently , such IN large samples of model NNS were generated for both DT transient and quasi-equilibrium NN NNS . PRP demonstrate IN , for projections of mean and extreme temperatures , DT use of transient or quasi-equilibrium NN NNS has a substantial effect on DT outcomes . PRP used DT extended mid-range GHG NNS simulations to 2300 ( ECP4.5 ) from DT CMIP5 ensemble1 ( Supplementary Table 1 ) to generate a quasi-equilibrium ensemble ( noting IN DT NN of DT twenty - third century is not in full equilibrium ) WDT can be directly compared to transient NN through DT equivalent model ’s level of JJ NN under a high - NNS scenario ( RCP 8.5 ) . DT model - simulated JJ mean NN was subtracted from DT distribution of JJ - average temperatures of each model to generate ensembles for DT comparison of transient and quasi-equilibrium NN NNS ( Fig. 1 ) ; regional average and extreme temperatures were subsequently investigated . DT robustness of this method — particularly DT efficacy of comparing transient and quasi-equilibrium climates derived from a selection of models across JJ NN levels — and associated sensitivity tests are discussed in DT Methods and DT Supplementary Information . Specifically , PRP demonstrate IN DT difference between transient and quasi-equilibrium NN patterns shows little dependence on DT level of JJ NN itself ( Supplementary Information ) , which differs by almost 2 °C across DT models analysed here ( Supplementary Table 1 ) . PRP use this result to enable a comparison of DT difference between transient and quasi-equilibrium climates with DT 0.5 °C increment of NN between DT Paris Agreement NN levels . From DT ensembles of transient and equivalent quasi-equilibrium climates , PRP can infer differences between these NN NNS . For most land areas of DT NN , DT average boreal summer ( June–August ( JJA ) ) and winter ( December–February ( DJF ) ) temperatures are substantially higher in DT transient NN relative to DT equivalent quasi-equilibrium NN with strong model agreement . This is especially true in boreal summer over continental NN zones in DT Northern Hemisphere ( Fig. 2a , b ) . By contrast , over DT Southern Ocean and DT North Atlantic , EX are large areas where a quasi-equilibrium NN is on average at least 0.5 °C warmer than DT equivalent transient NN . In DT quasi-equilibrium NN , DT passage of NN has resulted in heat redistribution such IN DT land regions are cooler and DT extratropical oceans are warmer 14,18 . This result aligns with previous research showing IN ocean NN lags behind NN over DT land surface19 . DT quantification of these differences is important , especially given DT recent focus on inferring differences in future warmer climates . As land regions are warmer in DT transient NN NN , most NNS in DT NN MD experience higher average local temperatures than in a quasi-equilibrium NN . In boreal summer , 91 % of DT NN ’s population20 ( 90 % confidence interval ( CI ) : 76–97 % ) MD experience warmer average temperatures in DT transient NN NN . JJ NNS in North America and Eurasia MD experience at least a 0.5 °C warmer local NN in a transient NN than in DT quasi-equilibrium equivalent NN . In boreal winter , 85 % of DT JJ population ( 90 % CI : 70 –92 % ) are in locations where DT transient NN is warmer than DT quasi-equilibrium NN . In total , more than 600 million NNS in boreal summer and more than 200 million in boreal winter live in locations where a rapidly VBG NN is at least 0.5 °C warmer than DT equivalent equilibrium NN . By contrast , fewer than 20 million NNS live in locations where an equilibrium NN is on average more than 0.5 °C warmer than DT transient equivalent for either boreal summer or winter . DT difference between transient and quasi-equilibrium NN NNS is substantial relative to DT difference between DT projected 1.5 °C and 2 °C warmer worlds 8,11 ( Fig. 3 ) . Over DT Southern Ocean and North Atlantic , where DT regional projected NN from 1.5 °C to 2 °C of JJ NN is lower than elsewhere , DT difference between transient and quasi-equilibrium climates exceeds DT difference in regional temperatures between DT Paris Agreement levels . Both of these regions play major roles in DT uptake and transport of carbon and heat21 , as PRP warm at much slower rates compared with other parts of DT NN . Overall , around 15 % of NNP ’s surface area has a bigger difference between DT transient and quasi-equilibrium climates than between DT Paris Agreement NN levels . This includes both slow - NN ocean areas , where DT quasi-equilibrium 1.5 °C NN is warmer than a transient 2 °C NN , and continental land regions , where DT transient 1.5 °C NN is warmer than a quasi-equilibrium 2 °C NN . For a typical location on NNP ’s surface , DT absolute difference between transient and quasi-equilibrium climates is around 40 % of DT absolute difference between DT Paris NN limits . DT difference between transient and equilibrium climates extends to temperature extremes . DT probability ratio of moderate heat extremes 22 , such as CD - in - ten hot seasons ( Fig. 4a , b ) , shows broad regions where a heat event is twice as likely in DT transient NN ( DT is , a CD - in - five NN event instead ) compared with a quasi-equilibrium NN NN . This is particularly true in boreal summer where , for almost all land regions of DT NN , DT likelihood of a hot season is significantly higher in a transient NN compared with DT equivalent quasi-equilibrium NN . Regions with at least a doubling in DT probability of hot summers in a transient NN compared with a quasi-equilibrium NN of equivalent JJ NN encompass major cities including NNP York City , Istanbul , Baghdad , Seoul and Tokyo . Although this is a JJ - scale analysis , PRP MD infer IN for these densely populated locations , DT heat - related impacts of human - induced NN NN MD be lessened in a stabilized NN compared with a rapidly VBG NN at DT same level of JJ NN . A similar pattern of results was found when examining cold extremes , with far fewer cold seasons ( below DT 10th percentile extracted from DT quasi- equilibrium NN ) in DT transient NN NN in Northern Hemisphere land areas ( Supplementary Fig. 5 ) . Overlaying estimates of gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita20 show IN poorer areas of DT NN tend to experience greater probability of hot seasons in a transient NN than a quasi-equilibrium equivalent ( in DJF DT correlation is − 0.39 , although in JJA PRP is negligible ) . EX is a large benefit of NN stabilization in terms of reduced frequency of hot extremes relative to a rapidly VBG NN at DT same JJ NN level , and this is particularly true for DT developing NN , in which DT likelihood of hot seasons is reduced NN - round . JJ analyses written for DT IPCC SR1.5 have focused on understanding changes in hot and cold extremes between DT Paris Agreement JJ NN limits 8,23 , 24 . DT results presented in this NN demonstrate IN DT difference in DT frequency of hot and cold extremes between a transient and quasi-equilibrium NN NN at a given level of JJ NN is RB large for JJ populated regions of DT NN . DT frequency of hot summers in a NN where JJ - average temperature rapidly passes through a JJ NN level relative to equilibrating at DT level is substantially greater in DT Middle East , much of Eurasia and northern Africa , and North America . Results from some studies of future extremes , such as ref. 23 , MD apply to transient 1.5 °C and 2 °C warmer worlds , but MD probably represent substantial overestimates for changes in DT frequency of heat extremes for equilibrium 1.5 °C and 2 °C climates relative to DT present . DT comparison of RCP 8.5 and ECP4.5 simulations from a multi- model ensemble enabled PRP to isolate DT effects of DT transient and quasi-equilibrium nature of DT different model experiments . This enabled PRP to address a fundamental question about DT nature of DT NNP ’s NN system : what differences in NN MD PRP expect between transient and equilibrium warmer worlds for a given level of JJ NN ? This is a vitally important question in DT context of international agreements such as DT Paris Agreement , for which analyses using transient and equilibrium NN model experiments MD yield different results and lead to DT formation of different conclusions and policy pathways . PRP is worth noting IN some of DT largest differences between transient and quasi-equilibrium NN NNS are identified for regions WDT are poorly observed and where model biases exist , such as DT Southern Ocean25 . As a result , projections for DT Southern Ocean should be treated with caution , although PRP generally align with our understanding of DT NN system19 . Further discussion of DT results for DT Southern Ocean is provided in DT Supplementary Information . DT differences between transient and equilibrium NN NNS have important implications in impact modelling . For example , some empirical impact models , such as damage functions 26 , are based on JJ - average NN , but in reality PRP MD expect different JJ costs to occur between transient and equilibrium warmer worlds for both DT globe as a whole26 and individual NNS 27 , especially developing NNS in DT tropics , due to DT different patterns of regional NN . Differences in methods used to simulate future climates and their impacts have DT potential to lead to decision - makers receiving inadequate information about DT nature of possible future climates for their region of interest . This MD result in DT development of ineffective policy , especially in building resilience for future extreme heat events , which is already more challenging in DT developing world28 . JJ of our results suggest IN DT differences between transient and quasi-equilibrium climates are substantial . A future 1.5 °C or 2 °C quasi-equilibrium warmer NN reached after an overshoot ( DT is , in NNS in which JJ NN has exceeded these limits but then fallen ) MD probably look very different to DT equivalent transient 1.5 °C or 2 °C NN WDT DT NN is likely to experience in DT coming decades 29,30 . Indeed , a transient warmer NN represents a poor predictor for an equivalent equilibrium NN in JJ populated land regions where DT difference in average seasonal temperatures is at least 0.5 °C and DT likelihood of hot extremes is at least twice as high in some places under DT transient NN . Studies of DT implications of future JJ NN must therefore be very clear in their framing of results with respect to DT transience of DT experiments used for their conclusions to be relevant for policy development . Current multi-model projection efforts , such as CMIP5 ( ref. 1 ) and DT subsequent CMIP6 ( ref. 4 ) projects , do not incorporate experiments WDT explicitly address DT needs of policy - makers following DT Paris Agreement . Multi - model experiments WDT can be used to examine NN NN at stabilized 1.5 °C and 2 °C warmer climates MD be invaluable in meeting DT needs of decision - makers given IN DT Paris Agreement is implicitly targeting stabilized JJ NN levels12 and IN PRP have demonstrated here IN DT rate of JJ NN has a large effect on DT NN pattern across DT globe . Although single - model experiments have been performed previously3 , these are not a substitute for multi- model projections WDT can more comprehensively examine DT impacts of DT Paris Agreement JJ NN levels . Our NN highlights DT notable differences in model - simulated transient and quasi-equilibrium NN NNS . PRP find IN these differences are significant and substantial across JJ regions of DT NN , such IN PRP must be considered in DT design of both model studies on DT implications of future JJ NN , and in DT design of future multi- model experiments following CMIP5 and CMIP6 . Studies must be clear in DT precise definition of temperature targets and DT framework given DT differing implications of a given level of JJ NN depending on DT transience of DT NN NN .

text: Back in 1989 , Californians received a sobering warning : DT accumulation of heat - trapping gases in DT atmosphere MD likely bring more droughts , floods , fires , and heat waves to DT NN . In DT thirty NNS since , those projections of what MD happen in a VBG NN have proven to be remarkably prescient . “ PRP ’ve already observed some of DT things PRP expected in 1989 , ” VBD Susan Fischer Wilhelm , a research manager at DT California NNP Commission , DT agency WDT compiled DT report . But to JJ who worked on DT report , looking back on PRP now only underscores how long PRP ’ve waited to act — and how much NN has been wasted . “ I felt a sense of pride of being able to participate in something IN this , but RB a sense of regret for PRP as a society , ” VBD Les Baxter , who worked on DT report as a policy analyst at DT CEC and is now vice NN of program strategy for DT Pew Charitable Trusts . “ PRP ’ve known what PRP need to do and PRP just keep refusing to do PRP . ” DT report might have remained lost to history if Gary Estes had n’t been VBG through boxes in his garage last NN and stumbled upon a copy . For decades , Estes has organized DT annual California Extreme Precipitation Symposium . And he decided to use this NN ’s meeting as an opportunity to look back at DT 185 - page report . “ I thought PRP MD be an appropriate thing to do 30 NNS later , ” VBD Estes , a citizen activist and self - described “ NN nut . ” DT symposium , held this week at UC Davis , brought together university and NN NNS to discuss report ’s findings . DT report explained IN doubling DT concentration of carbon dioxide in DT atmosphere MD raise temperatures in California by roughly 3 degrees Celsius — which will happen by mid-century if NNS continue to rise , according to DT most recent California NNP NNP Assessment . Then , as now , NN models showed no clear NN in DT NN ’s average annual precipitation . But DT authors noted IN 3 degrees of NN MD reduce DT area of mountain snow cover by half . And PRP MD increase DT frequency and severity of winter floods , as more NN fell as rain instead of snow . ( Both changes have already started to occur , Wilhelm VBD . ) In contrast , spring runoff MD drop by a third . ( PRP ’ve already fallen over DT last century , Wilhelm VBD . ) DT authors added IN , although EX was still debate among NNS at DT NN , NN NN MD RB bring more variable weather . DT report outlined DT ways in which changes in DT seasonal pattern of precipitation MD pose problems for DT NN ’s reservoirs , which MD have to release NN during DT rainy season to avoid overflowing . ( DT ’s exactly what happened in DT DT 2017 Oroville Dam crisis . ) In DT summer , NN shortages MD impact ecosystems , farmers and hydropower production , DT authors wrote . Heat and drought MD stress forests , which MD likely “ experience lower growth and higher susceptibility to fires , insects , and NN . ” ( This , too , has come to pass . ) DT report RB warned IN NN NN MD raise NN level , increase electricity demand , worsen air quality , increase heat - related deaths and be a drain on DT NN ’s economy . “ PRP strikes me IN PRP were right on , ” VBD Kari Smith , now a division manager at DT San Jose Clean NNP department who helped oversee DT report when she worked at DT CEC . “ I do n’t VB EX was anything WDT PRP VBD WDT is radically off - base . ” If anything , she VBD , DT report underestimated DT degree to which NN impacts are interrelated . JJ NN had just begun to seep into DT JJ consciousness . Alarmed by signs of environmental NN and DT results of early NN models , NNS were VBG JJ with their concerns about what JJ then called DT “ greenhouse effect . ” Sher immediately saw DT threat to California . “ DT heat is on , ” he told DT Sacramento Bee in 1989 . “ DT NN can either ignore what NN is telling PRP or PRP can respond to this challenge in a responsible way . ” Sher ’s bill was part of a flurry of bipartisan political activity on NN NN across DT country . In his 1988 presidential campaign , George H.W. Bush vowed to combat DT greenhouse effect with “ DT White House effect . ” In Congress , Democrats and Republicans introduced more than a dozen bills to curb atmospheric pollution . Several called for reducing greenhouse gas NNS to 20 % below 1988 levels by DT NN 2000 . ( Around DT same NN , DT NN agreed to phase out ozone - destroying substances under an agreement WDT NNP Reagan helped negotiate . ) By comparison , AB 4420 was relatively modest , VBD Kip Lipper , who was Sher ’s chief of staff and helped draft DT bill . But AB 4420 had DT distinction of actually passing . ( DT assembly voted 58 to 13 in favor of DT bill ; DT senate voted 38-0 . “ PRP ’s DT first law enacted anywhere in DT NNP NNPS WDT used DT term ‘ JJ NN , ’ ” VBD Lipper , who still serves as DT chief policy advisor for NN and environment to DT NN pro tem of DT NN senate . Lipper VBD DT report did n’t make a big splash . But PRP did provide a basis for everything WDT came later , including DT NN ’s renewable NN portfolio standard and its cap - and - trade program . “ PRP tried to seed DT ground , if PRP will , by saying , ‘ Let ’s just VB a report . text: To avoid dangerous NN NN , DT 195 NNS WDT signed DT Paris Agreement of 2015 agreed ‘ to keep DT increase in JJ mean surface temperature to well below 2° C , and to limit DT increase to 1.5° C , since this MD significantly reduce DT risks and impacts of NN NN ’ . However , human activities release large amounts of other greenhouse gases , which increases their atmospheric concentration and enhances DT greenhouse effect , thus VBG DT NN . DT EU RB aims to support DT development of carbon capture and storage technologies to trap and store CO emitted by power stations and other large installations . text: PRP 's become as much a winter tradition as eggnog at Christmas and champagne on NNP NNP 's Eve  DT first major snowstorm of DT NN bringing out DT NN - VB skeptics . And DT bona fide blizzard WDT has frozen much of DT Northeast just a few days after winter officially began definitely qualifies as major . But while piles of snow blocking your driveway hardly conjure images of a dangerously VBG NN , PRP does n't mean IN NN NN is a myth . DT NNP Meteorological Organization recently reported IN 2010 is almost certainly VBG to be CD of DT three warmest NNS on record , while 2001 to 2010 is already DT hottest decade in recorded history . Indeed , according to some NNS , all of these events MD actually be connected . CD theory is IN a warmer Arctic MD actually lead to colder and snowier winters in DT northern mid-latitudes . Even as NNS IN Britain  suffering through DT coldest December on record  deal with low temperatures and unusual snow , DT Arctic has kept on NN , with Greenland and Arctic Canada experiencing DT hottest NN on record . Temperatures in DT region have been 5.4 °F to 7.2 °F ( 3 °C to 4 °C ) above normal in 2010 . As a result , DT Arctic sea-ice cover has continued to shrink ; this September , DT minimum summer sea-ice extent was more than 770,000 sq. mi. ( 2 million sq km ) below DT long - term average , and DT third - smallest on record . Snow MD be piling up in midtown Manhattan , but DT Arctic is continuing its long - term meltdown . DT loss of Arctic NN NN helps accelerate DT NN of DT atmosphere in DT far north , thanks to what 's known as DT albedo effect . White NN reflects sunlight into space , cooling DT air , but when NN melts and is replaced with dark ocean NN , DT effect is reversed and more of DT sun 's heat is absorbed . As DT Arctic air warms , PRP raises DT altitude of discrete areas of high pressure , which can then alter wind patterns . This , in turn , can weaken DT jet stream , allowing more cold air to seep out of DT Arctic and into Europe and DT eastern U.S. As DT authors of DT National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration 's recent " Arctic Report Card " put PRP , " EX is evidence IN DT effect of higher air temperatures in DT lower Arctic atmosphere in fall is contributing to changes in DT atmospheric circulation in both DT Arctic and northern mid-latitudes . Winter 2009 - 2010 showed a JJ connectivity between mid-latitude extreme cold and snowy weather events and changes in DT wind patterns of DT Arctic ; DT so - called Warm Arctic Cold Continents pattern . " DT theory seems counterintuitive , but as Jeff Masters , a meteorologist who writes DT great Wunder Blog at Weather Underground , put PRP in a recent post , PRP makes sense : " This pattern is kind of IN leaving DT refrigerator door ajar  DT refrigerator warms up , but all DT cold air spills out into DT house . " DT NN overall is still VBG  and DT Arctic fastest of all  but DT cold air from DT far north can result in biting winter weather and major storms , for a while at least . DT 's not DT only theory . Judah Cohen , DT director of seasonal forecasting at DT environmental research firm AER , has written IN increasing seasonal snow cover in Siberia MD drive extreme winter weather . Even as DT NN has continued to warm and DT Arctic has melted , seasonal snow cover has increased in Siberia , especially north of high Asian mountain ranges IN DT Himalayas . ( As DT NN warms overall , DT atmosphere can hold more moisture , which can lead to more precipitation  falling as snow in places IN Siberia WDT remain relatively cold . ) All IN Siberian snow creates a dome of cold air near DT mountains , which bends DT passing jet stream . Instead of flowing west to east , DT jet stream moves in a more north to south fashion , carrying cold air south from DT Arctic in DT eastern U.S. and in Europe . Cohen 's theory is n't accepted by all NN and weather NNS , but DT National NNP Foundation has VBN IN in past NNS his model has predicted winter weather more accurately than traditional forecasts . Of course , PRP 's important to remember IN weather is n't DT same as NN  a single storm , or even a single cold winter , can tell PRP little about DT overall NN . Anomalies do happen , and sometimes PRP dump 20 inches ( 50 cm ) of snow on Central Park . DT systems WDT govern weather on this NN are incredibly complex , and our ability to understand why individual events occur  and to forecast them for DT future  is still imperfect . DT more than anything is what drives  and distorts  so much of DT stubborn debate over NN NN . Just because NN models predict IN DT NN will continue to heat up in DT future as PRP continue to pour greenhouse - gas NNS into DT atmosphere does n't mean IN NN will be a steady , even process . Far from PRP  and as parts of DT NN warm far faster than others , extreme events , including winter ones , MD become more common . JJ Yorkers cursing Al Gore as PRP dig out their cars should recall this past July  DT second hottest month on record in DT city . Unfortunately , DT unpredictability is VBG to make adapting to a warmer NN even tougher . As NN NN appears to trigger harsher winter events in parts of DT NN , DT 's not an effect WDT will last forever . As DT NN warms , even cold air from DT Arctic or Siberia MD not be enough to offset DT greenhouse effect , and major snowstorms IN DT NN DT Northeast just experienced MD be a thing of DT past . DT might make for less snow shoveling  but on DT whole , PRP wo n't be a very pleasant NN to live on . See photos of how JJ NN threatens penguins .

NN NN MD not cause a particular storm , but rising NN levels can worsen its impact . Flooding destroyed neighborhoods and beaches in outer boroughs .
