text: DT federal NN is ill - prepared to shoulder what MD be a trillion - dollar fiscal crisis associated with extreme weather , floods , wildfires and other NN disasters through 2100 , federal investigators have found . In DT latest of a series of reports , DT NNP Accountability Office says IN costs of disaster assistance to taxpayers since 2005 have swelled to nearly $ 500 billion — and PRP keep getting higher . “ DT federal budget , however , does not generally account for disaster assistance provided by Congress or DT long - term impacts of NN NN on existing federal infrastructure and programs , ” GAO found in DT 16 - page report , which was presented as testimony to Congress by Alfredo Gómez , director of DT office ’s natural resources and environment team . Moreover , DT NN “ does not have certain information needed by policymakers to help understand DT budgetary impacts of such exposure , ” GAO found . DT findings follow a dramatic escalation in federal spending on disaster assistance since 2005 . Much of DT money — upward of $ 450 billion — has been appropriated under supplemental spending packages following disasters rather than through DT normal budgetary process . In 2018 , Congress approved $ 91 billion in disaster spending to help communities recover from hurricanes , floods , wildfire and drought . DT outflow of disaster dollars has continued into 2019 ; Congress has passed bills authorizing an additional $ 19.1 billion , according to federal figures . DT growing frequency and intensity of disasters is being felt in every region of DT country and across a broad cross-section of DT economy , from NN and real estate to farming and fisheries . DT report includes 21 examples of NN NN ’s JJ impacts , most of which will place additional strain on federal resources . PRP include infrastructure damage in coastal zones from NN - level rise and storm surges , increased heat - related mortality in DT Southeast and Midwest , changes in NN supply and demand in DT West , and decreased agricultural yields in DT southern Plains and Southwest . GAO RB identified two types of potential benefits from NN NN : fewer deaths from cold weather in DT Upper Midwest and improved agricultural yields in DT northern Great Plains and parts of DT Northwest , mainly associated with longer growing seasons . Financial exposure to NN disasters will be felt hardest in three pots of NN spending : disaster response , flood and crop insurance , and operation and management of federally owned property and JJ lands . Investigators noted IN DT National Flood Insurance Program , for example , owes DT U.S. Treasury $ 21 billion associated with massive payouts to flood victims dating back to 2005 . Similarly , DT Congressional Budget Office estimated in NNP 2019 IN federal crop insurance MD cost DT NN an average of about $ 8 billion annually from 2019 through 2029 due to worsening floods , droughts and other NN stressors . Federal properties , IN Tyndall Air Force Base on DT Florida Panhandle , are RB facing increased financial exposure from hurricanes and other extreme weather events , GAO VBD . Hurricane Michael virtually destroyed Tyndall in 2018 , and its reconstruction is estimated to cost more than $ 4 billion ( Climatewire , July 3 ) . Rob Moore , a senior policy analyst and expert on NN adaptation and resilience at DT Natural Resources Defense Council , VBD GAO ’s findings are consistent with previous warnings from financial experts IN DT costs of NN disasters are far exceeding DT NN ’s ability to pay . Federal agencies “ are still treating these disasters as random events . PRP just throw a bunch of money at them after DT fact and assume PRP wo n’t happen again . DT problem is PRP ’re having these types of disasters every NN now , ” Moore VBD . Spending hundreds of billions of dollars in disaster - specific supplemental relief cannot continue , he added . “ PRP need to both start accounting for DT growing need to respond to disasters within DT regular appropriations process , ” Moore VBD . “ More importantly , PRP need to start making investments WDT reduce our exposure and vulnerability to these types of damages . ” Reprinted from Climatewire with permission from E&E NNP . text: U.S. stocks and indices have lifted to JJ highs in a dramatic recovery from DT initial wave of NN fears but DT NN ’s NN markets have not , dropping DT WTI crude oil futures contract to DT lowest low since January 2019 . Worse yet , PRP ’s now testing psychological and technical support at 50 for DT fourth NN in 13 months , raising odds for a breakdown WDT brings DT deep December 2018 at 42.36 into play . As a consumer , PRP might VB IN cheap crude oil prices are great for DT economy and your family ’s bottom line . However , DT contract is a highly - cyclical instrument WDT tracks JJ expansion and contraction with surprising accuracy . Right now , DT selloff is waving a red flag , telling PRP IN NN traders are worried IN NN economies will enter recessionary waves as a result of NNP ’s isolation and DT potential escalation into other parts of DT NN . More importantly from a technical standpoint , a decline into DT 2018 low will mark DT next phase in a massive 17 - NN descending triangle pattern , with support at DT 2009 low in DT lower 30s . DT contract last tested DT critical level in early 2016 , breaking down into DT mid-20s before reversing gears and remounting broken support . PRP ’s failed to post a higher high in DT last 4 NNS , maintaining a secular downtrend WDT ’s now entered its 12th NN . NN activists MD view crude oil ’s decline as a positive development , with more industries moving away from fossil fuels and into carbon - neutral NN sources . However , PRP ’s unlikely IN paradigm shift has reached critical mass , given healthy demand as a result of DT multiyear JJ expansion . In addition , dwindling crude oil resources around DT NN in coming NNS is likely to generate a premium for DT commodity , with remaining users forced to pay up due to lower supply . Fortunately , DT evolution of crude oil prices has been moving at a snail ’s pace , telling market players EX ’s plenty of NN to take action if exposed to DT industry through NN stocks or DT futures markets . However , as PRP learned in 2008 , contract volatility can escalate rapidly in response to system shocks IN DT NN ’s JJ collapse , so PRP makes sense to keep a watch on price action at all times . DT contract soared from DT mid-teens into DT lower 40s in just 4 months in 1990 , driven higher by DT first Iraqi invasion . PRP settled back to NN a few months later , reentering a multiyear trading range WDT broke to DT upside once again in 2004 when NN economies were getting back on DT feet after DT burst Internet bubble . DT uptrend went parabolic in 2006 , driven by heavy speculation as a result of NNP ’s multi-trillion dollar industrial expansion . A vertical plunge followed 2008 ’s all - NN high at 147.47 , dropping DT contract into a test at breakout support in DT first quarter of 2009 . PRP made steady progress into 2011 , finally reversing a few points under DT .786 Fibonacci selloff retracement level . DT marked DT highest high in DT last 9 NNS , ahead of a broad trading range WDT broke to DT downside in 2014 . DT selloff printed DT first lower monthly high for DT contract in more than two decades . DT decline found support at DT 2009 low at DT start of 2016 , giving way to a healthy uptick WDT stalled after NNP NNP fired DT first shot of DT trade war in 2018 . PRP printed DT second lower high in 7 NNS at DT NN , turning south at DT .50 retracement of DT 2 - NN slide . This downturn found support in DT low 40s at DT end of DT NN but DT contract failed to make headway in 2019 and MD be headed into a critical test at DT 2016 low . DT WTI crude oil contract MD have entered DT next phase of a massive descending triangle pattern WDT forecasts much lower prices in coming decades . text: Regional Australian students were surveyed to explore their understanding and knowledge of DT greenhouse effect , ozone depletion and NN NN . Results were compared with a parallel NN undertaken in 1991 in a regional UK city . DT comparison was conducted to investigate whether more awareness and understanding of these issues is demonstrated by students as a result of over 16 NNS ’ accumulated knowledge , increased certainty among experts of greenhouse effects on NN , NN publicity and inclusion of DT greenhouse effect in DT Australian school curriculum . Data obtained from a combined sample of 740 NN 8/10 secondary students examined DT extent of student understanding and knowledge , models of explanation and sources of information of DT phenomena . A path analytic , Structural Equation Model ( SEM ) tested links between student understanding of DT greenhouse effect , knowledge of greenhouse gases and experience of being in a greenhouse , to conceptions of NN NN . Results show similarities between DT two groups , with knowledge and understanding of these important scientific literacy issues remaining unacceptably low in 2007 . Sociocultural influences are proposed in relation to results and implications for practice are suggested .

text: ouTube has been “ actively promoting ” videos containing misinformation about NN NN , a report released Thursday by campaign group Avaaz claims , despite recent policy changes by DT platform intended to drive users away from harmful content and NN theories . Avaaz examined 5,537 videos retrieved by DT search terms “ NN NN , ” JJ NN ” and “ NN manipulation , ” and then DT videos most likely to be suggested next by YouTube ’s “ up next ” sidebar . For each of those search terms respectively , 8 % , 16 % and 21 % of DT top 100 related videos included by YouTube in DT “ up - next ” feature contained information WDT goes against DT scientific consensus on NN NN – such as denying NN NN is taking place , or claiming IN human activity is not a cause of NN NN . Avaaz claims this promotion process means YouTube is helping to spread NN denialism . “ PRP ’ve found IN PRP ’s very likely IN at least CD in five users who search for a term IN JJ NN or NN NN MD be sent down this type of misinformation rabbit hole , ” says Fadi Quran , a campaigns director at Avaaz , and CD of DT report ’s authors . “ NNS are working so hard to educate NNS about DT existential threat PRP face and YouTube is allowing bad actors among PRP DT last word on this issue for JJ NNS . ” Smaller scale studies have previously suggested IN a majority of NN - related videos on YouTube oppose DT scientific consensus on NN NN . DT “ up next ” feature dictates what users watch for 70 % of DT NN PRP spend on YouTube . DT exact make - up of DT YouTube algorithm WDT drives recommendations , designed to keep users on DT platform for as long as possible , is a closely guarded secret . Experts say DT algorithm appears to have learned IN radical or outrageous content is more likely to engage viewers . When PRP comes to NN NN , Avaaz says , DT leads to DT promotion of controversial videos with titles such as “ JJ NN is a hoax ” and “ ACTUAL SCIENTIST : NNP NN is a Scam ! ” DT algorithm is RB personalized to each user , meaning IN after PRP watch CD video containing NN misinformation , PRP is more likely to recommend another for PRP . In January 2019 , responding to criticism over DT platform ’s tendency to drive NNS towards more radical political and social viewpoints , YouTube announced IN in DT U.S. PRP MD begin reducing recommendations of “ borderline ” content WDT pushed DT limits of Community Guidelines on areas IN hate speech , as well as “ content WDT MD misinform users in harmful ways — such as videos promoting a phony miracle cure for a serious illness , claiming DT NN is flat , or making blatantly false claims about historic events IN 9/11 ” . In December , YouTube VBD IN policy had been successful , driving down DT average NN spent by U.S. users watching recommended “ borderline ” content or harmful misinformation by 70 % . But Quran says PRP remains unclear if DT policy is effectively applied to NN denialist content . “ PRP say all scientifically inaccurate information WDT causes harm is included under DT policy — which should indicate IN NN denial is part of PRP , ” he says . “ However [ YouTube ’s parent company ] is not transparent and our research so far indicates IN NN denial videos are still being actively recommended . Either their downgrading tools are not working as PRP should , or PRP have decided to exclude NN denial from DT system . ” A YouTube spokesperson tells NN , “ PRP ca n’t speak to Avaaz ’s methodology or results , and our recommendations systems are not designed to filter or demote videos or channels based on specific perspectives . ” PRP add IN YouTube ’s systems “ prioritize authoritative voices for millions of NN and information queries , and surface information panels on topics prone to misinformation — including NN NN — to provide users with context alongside their content ” and IN DT systems appear to have done so “ in DT majority of NNS in this report ” . Ads for major brands appeared alongside DT videos containing NN misinformation seen by Avaaz . DT campaign group claims IN by promoting NN denial videos to drive more viewing NN , and by placing ads alongside these videos , YouTube is profiting from DT spread of misinformation . DT YouTube spokesperson says PRP have “ strict ad policies WDT govern where ads are allowed to appear and PRP give advertisers tools to opt out of content WDT does n’t align with their brand . ” Pressure from advertisers , some of whom Avaaz informed about their findings , MD potentially push YouTube to take more action on NN denial content . An advertising boycott in 2017 , when brands sought to prevent their ads appearing alongside extremist content , cost Google millions of dollars in revenue , and helped drive YouTube to strengthen efforts to limit how often its platform surfaced extremist content . ( As well as reducing DT promotion of borderline content , in June , DT platform began removing thousands of videos displaying white supremacism and other hateful ideologies . ) Stephan Lewandowsky , chair of DT cognitive psychology department at DT University of Bristol , who studies NN misinformation , says DT question is n’t whether YouTube MD deal with NN denialism on its platform , but whether RB DT company ’s leadership have DT political will to do so when EX is not yet “ political consensus ” in all NNS around NN NN . “ With DT radical Islamist and DT white supremacist material [ WDT YouTube has been successful in policing ] , PRP recognized DT was something PRP definitely MD n’t VB away with [ hosting ] , ” he says . “ With NN denial , even though PRP is a scientifically totally absurd position , EX are plenty of politicians in DT U.S. and Australia , for example , who are immersed in this stuff . ” Misinformation around NN NN and its impacts are still commonplace in some prominent mainstream NN . On Jan. 14 , James Murdoch , son of Australian NN mogul Rupert Murdoch , criticized DT “ ongoing denial ” of DT NN crisis displayed by his father ’s NN outlets , particularly in coverage of Australia ’s current bushfire crisis . For Lewandowsky , DT promotion of NN denialism , both in DT NN and to YouTube users searching for content about NN NN , creates a major stumbling block to political momentum on cutting greenhouse gas NNS . “ For JJ NNS who are not trained NNS , ” he says , “ DT moment PRP ’re exposed to what appears to be a scientific debate — but is n’t actually , because DT NN was settled a long NN ago — PRP feel PRP can say “ Oh , well , DT NNS do n’t agree on this — PRP do n’t have to do anything . ” Sign up for CD . text: DT real NN debate is not between “ believers ” and “ deniers ” . And not between Republicans and Democrats . DT real debate is certainly not over whether JJ NN , spurred by increasing greenhouse gases , is a serious problem WDT must be addressed . Both sides of DT real NN debate agree on DT . DT real rebate is between two groups : 1 . A confident , non-political group WDT believes technology , informed investments , rational decision making , and DT use of DT best scientific information will lead to a solution of DT JJ NN issue . An optimistic group WDT sees JJ NN as a technical problem with technical solutions . I will refer to these folks as DT ACT group ( Apolitical / Confident / Technical ) 2 . A group , mainly on DT political left , WDT is highly partisan , anxious and often despairing , self - righteous , big on blame and social justice , and willing to attack those WDT disagree with them . PRP often distort DT truth when PRP serves their interests . PRP RB see social NN as necessary for dealing with JJ NN , requiring DT very reorganization of society . I call these folks DT ASP group ( Anxious , Social - Justice , Partisan ) . EX is no better way to see DT profound difference between these two groups than to watch a video of DT testimony of young activists at DT recent House Hearing on NNP NNP , which included Greta Thunberg , Jamie Margolin , Vic Barrett , and Benji Backer . Jamie Margolin of Seattle talked about an apocalyptic future , with “ corporations making billions ” while PRP destroy DT future of her generation . Of feeling fear and despair . Of a NN where DT natural environment is undergoing collapse , where only a few NNS are left before PRP pass DT point of no return , and where only a massive political shift can fix things , including DT Green NNP Deal . Watch her testimony to see what I mean . Compare Ms. Margolin ’s testimony to DT of University of Washington senior Benji Backer . Mr. Backer , leader of DT American Conservation Coalition , a conservative / moderate group of young NNS supporting action to protect DT environment , approaches DT problem in a radically different way . Instead of despair , EX is optimism , recommending more scientific and technical research , a bipartisan attack on DT problem , a rejection of an apocalyptic future , DT building of JJ NN industries with potential benefits for DT American economy , and a dedication to follow DT NN and not political expediency . His testimony is here . Both Ms. Margolin and Mr. Backer care deeply about DT environment and VBP effective measures to deal with JJ NN . Both their approaches and attitudes MD not be more different . PRP see DT difference between DT optimistic ACT group and DT despairing ASP folks here in Seattle . On CD hand , EX is DT Clean Tech Alliance , which brings together technology companies , university researchers , and DT business community to develop and apply DT technologies WDT will produce DT carbon - free future PRP look for . Headed by Tom Ranken , DT Alliance does a lot , including a highly informative breakfast series where PRP can learn about fusion power , JJ battery technologies , DT future of solid waste recycling , and much more . Non-political , optimistic , and exciting . These are clearly members of DT ACT group . In contrast , EX is Seattle ’s 350.org group . PRP are into NN strikes , staging protests ( IN their recent blockade of a branch of Seattle Chase Bank ) , trying to muzzle NN NNS PRP do n’t VB , advocating political solutions to greenhouse NN ( Green NNP Deal ) , pushing divestment of NN companies , and even a Pledge of Resistance to stop NN exports by whatever means necessary . Their “ NN ” page has all kinds of extreme ( and unfounded ) claims regarding JJ NN impacts , IN a NN level rise of 10 feet in as little as 50 NNS . ASP group all DT way . I should note IN DT Seattle 350.org group and their “ allies ” oppose DT Tacoma Liquid Natural Gas ( LNG ) Facility WDT will help replace DT extraordinarily dirty “ bunker fuel ” used in ships traversing Puget Sound . LNG will RB reduce carbon NNS . NNS and regulators at DT Puget Sound Clean Air Agency support DT LNG facility . But facts and protection of DT NN of Puget Sound residents are not priorities for highly politicized groups IN 350.org . A good example of DT differences between DT ACT and ASP folks is found in Washington NNP ’s recent carbon initiatives . Initiative 732 was backed by Carbon Washington , a non-political group whose bi-partisan proposal MD have increased DT price of carbon fuels but was revenue neutral , giving all DT funds collected back to DT citizens of DT NNP . Carefully designed and impactful . DT work of DT ACT group all DT way . But DT ASP folks were unhappy . EX was no money for their NN justice and political initiatives , so PRP opposed PRP , and were joined by Governor Inslee and DT environmental left . Unforgivable , nasty attacks were made on Carbon Washington leadership by DT ASP folks . 732 lost . DT ASP collective decided PRP was their turn , so PRP created a Frankenstein carbon initiative ( 1631 ) , with a lowered ( less effective ) carbon fee , but CD in which NN justice groups and political allies on DT left MD have control , and were hardwired for much of DT funds . DT main advertising line of DT 1631 ads : catastrophe was around DT corner and DT big oil companies were to blame . 1631 was an election day disaster , losing by 13 points , and DT ASP folks have probably killed any hope for an effective carbon tax / fee in our NN . What about DT NN ? Which side are PRP on ? ASP or ACT or neither ? Much of DT “ mainstream ” NN parrots DT message of DT ASP side . DT Seattle Times is a great case in point , with headlines of massive heat related deaths ( 750 die per event ! ) and catastrophic wildfire seasons WDT have no basis in good NN . But EX are plenty of others , such as DT LA Times and DT NY Times . EX are some major NN outlets WDT are more balanced ( such as DT Wall Street Journal ) . A major issue for DT NN is DT hollowing out of NN reporting , with most NN stories being handled by general reporters with neither DT NN , background , or inclination to VB beyond parroting DT press releases of activist groups or evaluating DT claims of speculative research papers . PRP has gotten so bad IN a recent headline story in DT Seattle Times kept on talking about DT WRONG GAS ( carbon monoxide instead of carbon dioxide ) . A Religious Movement In JJ ways , DT ASP group appears to be a religious movement , not unlike DT JJ millennialist movements of DT past . As other groups in DT past , PRP predict an apocalyptic future ( including fire and brimstone ! ) and IN PRP must “ believe ” in their viewpoint or be rejected as a “ denier . ” DT ASP folks have a holy viewpoint WDT comes from authority ( PRP claim based on DT views of 97 % of NNS ) . EX is no debate allowed , DT NN is “ settled . ” Sounds IN religious dogma . DT ASP movement describes a NN WDT is teetering on DT edge , with mankind ’s days numbers ( 10 or 12 NNS according to several of their leading prophets ) unless immediate steps are taken . PRP constantly repeat IN DT threat is existential . PRP believe PRP is ok to distort DT truth to VB folks “ to do DT right thing . ” DT ASP group has well defined “ enemies ” WDT represent true evil ( NNP , Republicans , Big Oil , Koch Brothers ) and PRP support attacking and silencing those PRP disagree with ( my past blog gives PRP some documented examples of such behavior ) . ASP has their priests ( Al Gore , Bill McKibben , Michael Mann ) and even young saints ( Greta Thunberg ) . As in JJ such movements , members are guided to act in approved and enlightened ways , but DT leadership does not need to follow DT rules ( e.g. , JJ ASP “ leaders ” have huge carbon footprints from flying ) . Importantly , ASP sees their work VBG much further than a technical fix for technical problem , but as a “ social justice ” movement WDT will VB DT very organization of society . Disturbingly , DT ASP folks are against key technologies WDT MD really make a difference , such as nuclear power , and are relatively uninterested in working on adaptation and resilience to NN NN . JJ do not support dealing with our forests in a rational way ( e.g. , restoration with thinning and prescribed burning ) but MD rather blame PRP all on JJ NN . By pushing a highly political agenda DT ASP movement is undermining bipartisan efforts–and nothing important will be done unless both sides of DT aisle are involved . ASP folks love to say IN DT Republicans are unwilling to deal with NN NN , a totally unfair claim . I have talked personally to leading WA Republicans , IN Bill Bryant and Rob McKenna . PRP acknowledge DT seriousness of JJ NN and DT need to act . In my talks in highly Republican eastern Washington , growers and others accept DT problem and VBP to work on solutions . Under a Republican U.S. Congress , funding for NN research has been protected and increased . But partisan attacks by DT ASP group is seen as a way to promote group cohesion and DT “ evil ” of DT other side . Calling others names is not an effective way to secure their cooperation . A problem for DT ASP group is IN their message is so dark , pessimistic and depressing IN PRP tends to turn others off . And PRP has a terrible psychological effects on its adherents and those WDT listen . Fear , anxiety , feelings of hopelessness , despair , and rage . EX are even classes on dealing with eco-anxiety and NN grief . Greta Thunberg VBD IN DT worry ruined her childhood . And yes , EX is NNP NNP . Much of what he says on NN NN is simply nonsensical , and quite frankly he is not part of DT debate . Republicans in Congress do not follow his lead . But he is a convenient foil for DT ASP folks , who use him for their own purposes . DT Bottom Line Progress on NN NN is being undermined by DT efforts of DT highly vocal , partisan , and ineffective ASP group . PRP are standing in DT way of bipartisan action on NN NN , efforts to fix our forests , and DT use of essential technologies . PRP are a big part of DT problem , not DT solution . In contrast to DT ASP folks , DT ACT group generally tries to stay out of DT JJ eye , quietly completing DT work needed to develop DT technologies and infrastructure WDT will allow PRP to mitigate and adapt to NN NN . In DT end , PRP will save PRP . DT is , if DT ASP folks do n’t VB in their way . DT above article is from Wattsupwiththat.com . Visit Wattsupwiththat.com for more great articles .

text: DT path of future NN NN will depend on what courses of action are taken by society — in particular DT emission of greenhouse gases from DT burning of fossil fuels . A range of alternative NNS scenarios known as representative concentration pathways ( RCPs ) were proposed by DT IPCC in DT Fifth Assessment Report ( AR5 ) , which was published in 2014 , to examine potential future NN changes . DT scenarios depend on various assumptions concerning future rates of human population growth , JJ development , NN demand , technological advancement , and other factors . Unlike DT scenarios used in previous IPCC assessments , DT AR5 RCPs explicitly account for NN NN mitigation efforts . Graph of DT predicted increase in DT concentration of carbon dioxide ( CO 2 ) in NNP 's atmosphere according to a series of NN NN scenarios WDT assume different levels of JJ development , population growth , and fossil fuel use . DT results of each scenario in DT IPCC ’s Fourth Assessment Report ( 2007 ) are depicted in DT graph . DT AR5 scenario with DT smallest increases in greenhouse gases is RCP 2.6 , which denotes DT net radiative forcing by 2100 in watts per square metre ( a doubling of CO concentrations from preindustrial values of 280 ppm to 560 ppm represents roughly 3.7 watts per square metre ) . RCP 2.6 assumes substantial improvements in NN efficiency , a rapid transition away from fossil fuel NN , and a JJ population WDT peaks at roughly nine billion NNS in DT 21st century . In DT scenario CO concentrations remain below 450 ppm and actually fall toward DT end of DT century ( to about 420 ppm ) as a result of widespread deployment of carbon - capture technology . Scenario RCP 8.5 , by contrast , might be described as “ business as usual . ” PRP reflects DT assumption of an NN - intensive JJ economy , high population growth , and a reduced rate of technological development . CO concentrations are more than three times greater than preindustrial levels ( roughly 936 ppm ) by 2100 and continue to grow thereafter . RCP 4.5 and RCP 6.0 envision intermediate policy choices , resulting in stabilization by 2100 of CO concentrations at 538 and 670 ppm , respectively . DT differences between DT various simulations arise from disparities between DT various NN models used and from assumptions made by each emission scenario . Only DT lower - end NNS scenario RCP 2.6 has a reasonable chance ( roughly 50 percent ) of holding additional JJ surface NN by 2100 to less than 2.0 °C ( 3.6 °F ) — a level considered by JJ NNS to be DT threshold above which pervasive and extreme climatic effects will occur . DT greatest increase in near - surface air temperature is projected to occur over DT polar region of DT Northern Hemisphere because of DT melting of NN NN and DT associated reduction in surface albedo . Greater NN is predicted over land areas than over DT ocean . Largely due to DT delayed NN of DT oceans and their greater specific heat , DT Northern Hemisphere — with less than 40 percent of its surface area covered by NN — is expected to warm faster than DT Southern Hemisphere . Some of DT regional variation in predicted NN is expected to arise from changes to wind patterns and ocean currents in response to surface NN . Changes in precipitation patterns are expected to increase DT chances of both drought and flood conditions in JJ areas . Decreased summer precipitation in North America , Europe , and Africa , combined with greater rates of evaporation due to NN surface temperatures , is projected to lead to decreased soil moisture and drought in JJ regions . Furthermore , since anthropogenic NN NN will likely lead to a more vigorous hydrologic cycle with greater rates of both evaporation and precipitation , EX will be a greater probability for intense precipitation and flooding in JJ regions . Regional predictions of future NN NN remain limited by uncertainties in how DT precise patterns of atmospheric winds and ocean currents will vary with increased surface NN . For example , some uncertainty remains in how DT frequency and magnitude of El Niño / Southern Oscillation ( ENSO ) events will adjust to NN NN . For example , increased El Niño activity MD likely lead to more winter precipitation in some regions , such as DT desert southwest of DT NNP NNPS . This might offset DT drought predicted for those regions , but at DT same NN PRP might lead to less precipitation in other regions . Rising winter precipitation in DT desert southwest of DT NNP NNPS might exacerbate drought conditions in locations as far away as South Africa .

( AP ) — Maryland MD reduce greenhouse gas NNS by 60 % by 2030 , under an ambitious measure outlined Wednesday as DT coastal NN grapples with increasing concerns about NN - level rise . DT legislation sponsored by Sen. Paul Pinsky and Del. Dana Stein MD increase DT NN ’s current goal of cutting greenhouse gas NNS by 40 % , based on 2006 levels . Themeasure ’s goals includeplanting 1 million trees a NN in DT NN for a decade . PRP RB calls for requiring JJ commercial buildings with 25,000 square feet of rooftop to use solar panels . DT measure has powerful supporters in DT General Assembly , including Senate NNP Bill Ferguson , though Pinsky conceded EX MD be some changes due to cost , and DT goal for tree plantings “ MD be trimmed down . ” “ EX are VBG to be some amendments , ” Pinsky VBD . “ EX are VBG to be some costs PRP ’ll have to bring down . ” DT NN ’s vehicle and bus fleet MD become electric vehicles by 2030 , under DT measure , and a NN program MD be expanded to increase NN efficiency . DT measure RB MD create a work group focused on identifying communities affected most by NN NN . “ EX ’s a lot more WDT our NN MD be doing to benefit DT communities WDT are hardest hit , ” VBD Sen . Mary Washington , a Democrat from Baltimore , where flooding and heatwaves are rising concerns . text: Impact investing is an extension of socially responsible investing , which focuses on companies WDT promote ethical and socially responsible consciousness such as environmental sustainability , social justice , and corporate ethics . Impact investing goes a step further by actively seeking investments WDT can create a significant , positive impact .﻿﻿ Impact investing focuses on investing in companies or organizations to create a measurable societal benefit while still generating a favorable financial return . Impact investing is typically centered around addressing a social issue , such as poverty or education , or an environmental issue , such as clean NN . As of publication , DT top five impact investing firms on DT basis of assets under management are Vital Capital Fund , Triodos Investment Management , DT Reinvestment Fund , BlueOrchard Finance S.A. , and Community Reinvestment Fund , USA . Vital Capital Fund is a private equity fund with approximately $ 350 million in assets . DT fund invests in developing areas , principally sub-Saharan Africa , in businesses and projects designed to enhance quality of life , and RB offer substantial investment returns﻿﻿.﻿﻿ DT primary investment focus of DT Vital Capital Fund is on DT development of infrastructure , housing projects , agro - industrial projects , renewable NN , NN care , and education . Among DT fund 's investments are DT Luanda NNP Center in Angola and WaterHealth International .﻿﻿ Triodos Investment Management is a subsidiary of Triodos Bank , headquartered in DT Netherlands , which manages over a dozen sustainable investment funds . Triodos has been actively engaged in impact investing since 1995 and as of publication has approximately $ 5 billion in assets .﻿﻿﻿﻿ Primary areas of interest include renewable NN , sustainable food and agriculture ( including organic farming ) , NN care , and education .﻿﻿ Triodos is CD of DT founding members of DT NNP Impact Investing Network .﻿﻿ Its investments are spread throughout Europe , South America , Africa , India , and Southeast Asia . DT Reinvestment Fund , headquartered in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania , is a non-profit community development financial institution . With an estimated $ 1.2 billion in assets under management as of publication , DT fund finances housing projects , access to NN care , educational programs , and job initiatives . PRP operates primarily by assisting distressed towns and communities in DT NNP NNPS . PRP RB provides U.S. cities with JJ policy advice and data analysis services to assist in developing community programs .﻿﻿ BlueOrchard Finance , with principal offices in Switzerland , operates in more than 80 emerging and frontier markets around DT NN , including areas in Asia , Latin America , Africa , and Eastern Europe . Created as part of a NNP Nations initiative in 2001 , BlueOrchard Finance was established as DT first commercial manager of microfinance debt investment worldwide . As of publication , BlueOrchard has invested in more than 200 million entrepreneurs across DT globe . PRP provides both debt and equity financing to businesses and institutions , with an emphasis on alleviating hunger and poverty , fostering entrepreneurship , establishing food production and education programs , and working on NN NN issues .﻿﻿ BlueOrchard Finance has approximately $ 3.5 billion in assets under management .﻿﻿ Community Reinvestment Fund , USA was founded in 1988 , in Minneapolis , Minnesota , as a national non-profit certified community development financial institution . Its mission is to empower NNS to improve their lives and their communities . DT Community Reinvestment Fund partners with local private lenders to provide financing capital for community development projects . These include small business loans for DT purpose of growing a business , expanding staff or increasing NN efficiency .﻿﻿ But with more than $ 250 million in assets , along with access to additional long - term loan capital through DT Community Development Financial Institution Bond Guarantee Program , DT Community Reinvestment Fund RB provides funding assistance for community housing projects , NN care centers , charter schools , daycare centers , and small businesses .

text: NN Reviews Generic Laws as Set by NNPS and Finds Less Restrictive Regulations MD Result in Savings of More than $ 100 Million WOONSOCKET , R.I. , July 7 / PRNewswire / -- NNPS struggling to pay for increasing NN care costs through their Medicaid programs can save more than $ 100 million over DT next several NNS by changing generic substitution laws to permit easier and faster substitutions of generics for brand medications , a JJ CVS Caremark ( NYSE : CVS ) has found . DT NN , published in DT July edition of NNP Affairs , looked at DT generic substitution of simvastatin for cholesterol brand drug Zocor over six quarters beginning June 23 , 2006 , when Zocor 's patent expired . DT review looked at how quickly Medicaid recipients moved to DT generic equivalent medications under three different NN statutes – mandatory versus permissive substitution , with and without prior authorization , and with and without requiring patient approval for substitution . DT generic substitutions discussed in DT NN are for chemically identical generics for brand name drugs . " Requiring patients to provide consent prior to generic substitution led to an approximately 25 % reduction in generic substitution , " VBD Dr. William H. Shrank , DT NN 's lead author , an Assistant Professor of Medicine at Harvard NNP School in DT Division of Pharmacoepidemiology at Brigham and Women 's Hospital in Boston . During DT six consecutive quarters reviewed , DT NN determined IN NNS MD have saved almost $ 20 million if DT substitution from Zocor to DT chemically - identical simvatstatin were made more quickly for DT CD medication . " This NN has important implications . PRP determined NNS can stem DT rising cost of medications paid for by Medicaid programs by modifying statutes to make PRP easier to replace brand name medications with generics , " VBD Troyen A. Brennen , MD , MPH and Executive Vice NN and Chief JJ Officer of CVS Caremark . " EX are JJ brand medications WDT will lose their patent protection over DT next several NNS and , as a consequence , PRP will see DT introduction of generic equivalents for these brand medications . In particular , PRP can expect significant activity with DT upcoming patent expirations of Lipitor , Plavix and Zyprexa over DT next eighteen months . " DT NN estimates NN Medicaid programs can save more than $ 100 million on those three drugs alone by adopting regulations WDT allow pharmacists to make a NN following DT patent expiration , without requiring direct patient approval . This is action WDT policy makers can take immediately to save money without affecting DT quality of pharmacy care , " he VBD . Brennan VBD cost containment and finding ways to better manage increasing NN care costs is extremely important in DT face of DT current JJ NN and expected expansion of NN Medicaid programs resulting from federal NN care reform . DT NN involved a review of Medicaid claims data between June 2006 and 2008 in 48 NNS and DT District of Columbia . DT NN published in NNP Affairs is DT result of CVS Caremark 's previously announced three - NN collaboration with Harvard University and Brigham and Women 's Hospital to research pharmacy claims data to better understand patient behavior around medication adherence and appropriate medication use . In addition , earlier this NN DT company launched a Behavior NNP Research Partnership with academic leaders from Carnegie Mellon University , Dartmouth College 's Tuck School of Business and DT University of Pennsylvania 's NNP School and Wharton School of Business to develop insights into consumer actions around NN challenges through DT lens of behavioral economics and social marketing . CVS Caremark is undertaking these studies because patient non-adherence to essential chronic medications is widely recognized as a barrier to improving JJ NN and a cause of increasing JJ costs . Past studies show CD - quarter of NNS receiving prescriptions never fill their first prescription , and patients with chronic diseases such as diabetes and coronary artery NN adhere to their ongoing medication regimen about half of DT NN . Non-adherence to essential medications is a frequent cause of preventable hospitalizations and patient illness , with costs to DT U.S. NN care system estimated at about $ 300 billion annually . CVS Caremark is DT largest pharmacy NN care provider in DT NNP NNPS . Through our integrated offerings across DT entire spectrum of pharmacy care , PRP are uniquely positioned to provide greater access , to engage plan members in behaviors WDT improve their NN and to lower overall NN care costs for NN plans , plan sponsors and their members . CVS Caremark is a market leader in mail order pharmacy , retail pharmacy , specialty pharmacy , and retail clinics , and is a leading provider of Medicare Part D Prescription Drug Plans . As CD of DT country 's largest pharmacy benefits managers ( PBMs ) , PRP provide access to a network of more than 64,000 pharmacies , including approximately 7,000 CVS / pharmacy ® stores WDT provide unparalleled service and capabilities . Our clinical expertise includes CD of DT industry 's most comprehensive NN management programs . General information about CVS Caremark is available through DT Company 's Web site at http://info.cvscaremark.com.

text: NN NN is expected to affect every country in DT NN , but its impact will not be felt equally across all regions and some will be worse hit than others because of a range of different threats . Developing NNS , places with widespread poverty , and NNS with ineffective governments sometimes face DT gravest risks from DT changing NN , and are usually poorly equipped to find ways to prepare for and prevent environmental threats . Measuring DT future impact of NN NN is very challenging , because NNS ’ NN NN projections cannot be completely exact and because EX are JJ different factors WDT come into play such as DT risk of extreme weather events and rising temperatures . EX are other non-climatic factors WDT RB determine how severely a city or country will be impacted by NN NN . Niall Smith , who analyzes regions ’ NN NN vulnerability for DT JJ risk consulting firm Maplecroft , tells NN IN PRP ’s RB necessary to weigh in what ’s happening politically and socially in a region to figure out if DT country can prepare . “ DT places with DT least level of JJ development are certainly in line to feel DT impacts with DT greatest degree , partially just due to their geographic fate — or their location — but more so based on DT socio- JJ and governance factors , ” says Smith . JJ developing NNS are RB uniquely vulnerable , says Kelly Levin of DT NNP Resources Institute , “ their livelihoods are dependent on natural resources . And if those natural resources are affected by NN NN , their ability to feed their families and make a living is significantly impacted . ” To VB a sense of DT challenges different regions are facing , NNP spoke to experts about six NNS and cities will be be particularly affected by NN NN . Lagos is at “ extreme ” risk on Maplecroft ’s NNP NNP Vulnerability Index . This is especially concerning because its population is expanding rapidly , and PRP is considered to be a major JJ engine for DT region . DT governor boasted IN Lagos had reached a GDP of $ 136 billion in 2017 , which is about a third of DT entire country ’s GDP . DT city is RB a major transportation hub , with multiple ports and a major international airport and is a regional hub for high tech industry . Lagos has “ transformed ” over DT last 18 NNS , Lamido Sanusi , a former central bank governor , told DT Financial last NN In terms of roads , in terms of infrastructure , in terms of a general investment environment , in terms of security , DT NN has given NNS a greater opportunity to thrive . ” Lagos is RB at a disadvantage because PRP ’s considered to be CD of DT fastest growing cities in DT NN , which will put a “ strain on infrastructure and resources , ” according to Smith . Its population is projected to nearly double over DT next 15 NNS , growing from its current population of 13,463,420 to 23,418,770 . In DT future , Smith warns IN Lagos residents will RB experience more hot days and droughts . NN NN MD threaten DT city ’s economy . DT city is especially vulnerable because PRP ’s located on DT Gulf of Guinea , says Levin . As NN levels rise , PRP ’s likely to affect cause coastal erosion and contaminate potable NN . This MD harm local agriculture in DT countryside and damage DT country ’s fishing industry , which MD be dire in a country with “ tremendous ” poverty , Levin says . “ PRP MD see more and more NNS moving in from DT countryside because of loss of JJ opportunity into a city IN Lagos , which MD make DT whole situation more challenging , ” Levin says . If Lagos struggles , PRP MD seriously reduce JJ opportunity in DT region . NN NN can be a “ threat multiplier , ” says Christina Chan , DT director of DT NNP Resources Institute ’s NN resilience practice . This is especially true for Haiti . DT island nation is located in DT “ Atlantic Hurricane Basin , ” which means IN PRP is vulnerable to hurricanes . In comparison to other projections on NN NN , NNS are less certain about DT link between NN NN and hurricane frequency and intensity , but studies have suggested IN hurricanes are likely getting wetter and more intense due to NN NN . Since Haiti is a very poor country , recovering from natural disasters and preparing for future storms is especially challenging . DT devastation in Haiti after DT 2010 earthquake and 2016 ’s Hurricane Matthew was compounded by DT country ’s lack of disaster preparedness . DT disasters were major setbacks for DT country ’s JJ development ; DT $ 8 billion price tag of recovering from DT earthquake surpassed DT country ’s GDP , according to DT Council on Foreign Relations . DT landscape is RB heavily deforested and mountainous , which means PRP will be more susceptible to landslides . According to Levin , Haiti will RB struggle because DT population is dependent on agriculture , and rising NN levels mean IN salt NN MD contaminate freshwater . DT NNP Nations warns IN rising NN levels MD cause saltwater to permeate farmland and freshwater supplies . “ EX ’s certainly a large portion of Haitians WDT are dependent on agriculture for their livelihoods and income . And if PRP have overall patterns of rainfall declines as temperatures rise , certainly DT MD impact farmers , ” Levin says . NNS with weak institutions and governments are likely to find PRP especially difficult to adapt to NN NN , says Smith . Since civil war broke out in Yemen in 2015 , hundreds of thousands of NNS have been killed directly as a result of DT conflict , but RB due to DT subsequent famine , poor sanitation and a lack of clean NN , according to DT NNP Nations . About 1.6 million NNS in Yemen are living with malnutrition in 2019 , according to DT UN . Both war and NN NN will make NN shortages and famine more likely . According to a Untied Nations report , most contemporary famines result from armed conflict and are worsened by natural disasters . As DT report explains , “ Parties to DT conflict MD use food as a weapon , cutting off food supplies , destroying systems of food production and distribution , and stealing food aid . Agricultural production falls , which both limits DT availability of food and cuts off JJ rural houses from their livelihoods . And with higher levels of poverty , JJ families cannot afford DT food PRP need , especially at inflated prices . ” Malaria is RB becoming more common in Yemen , and MD be exacerbated by rising temperatures . As Yemen has a long coast , PRP ’s RB vulnerable to rising NN levels , according to Levin . An area to watch , says Levin , “ Whenever PRP ’re thinking about a country in DT region … [ is ] DT issue of rising temperatures impacting NN scarcity , especially when PRP ’s exacerbated by NN management challenges and expanding population . ” As other NNS work to curb their oil consumption , PRP MD be a mixed blessing for Yemen , according to Levin . While lower NNS are believed to be necessary to limit NN NN , PRP MD RB reduce demands for CD of Yemen ’s major imports — oil — which MD impact Yemen ’s economy , Levin says . DT Philippines faces a high risk of natural disasters , including earthquakes , tsunamis , floods , and especially hurricanes . Manila , which is located along DT coast , is RB densely populated , which makes PRP more difficult to evacuate , requires more social services and makes PRP more challenging to rebuild after a disaster . Poor infrastructure , including ineffective drainage and sanitation systems , has been blamed for DT toll of floods in DT city , including a 2009 flood WDT submerged 80 % of DT city . However , Chan says IN DT Philippines is in fact on DT “ forefront of adaptation ” to NN NN , and have designated part of their budget to making their country ’s agricultural sector and infrastructure more resilient , and preparing to respond to future disasters . For instance , DT NN launched a Flood Management Master Plan for Metro Manila in 2012 , which aims to manage future floods by modernizing and building JJ pumping stations and investing in other infrastructure along waterways , according to DT Asian Infrastructure investment Bank . DT Philippines have created a NNP NNP Commission , which implements programs such as DT National NNP NNP Action Plan , a long - term strategy for prioritizing “ food security , NN sufficiency , ecosystem and environmental stability , human security , NN smart industries and services , sustainable NN , knowledge and capacity development . ” Rising NN levels mean IN Kiribati MD be wiped off DT map entirely in DT coming decades . DT islands have even purchased 5,000 acres of land in Fiji in case PRP need to relocate . While Kitribati , IN JJ other NNS , is taking steps to prepare for NN NN , DT Pacific island nation must RB reckon with DT fact IN “ for their island , adaptation will have its limits , ” says Chan . DT islands are only six feet above NN level and sit upon a system of atolls and reef islands , which means IN rising NN levels are a threat to DT nation ’s existence . This vulnerability has RB spurred Kiribati to take serious steps in NN mitigation . Kiribati has allied itself with other vulnerable island NNS to advocate for action to fight NN NN , and taken other measures such as planting mangrove trees and building NN walls . Meanwhile , Levin says , rising NN levels are likely to contaminate DT island ’s freshwater and harm its soil , which is not especially fertile for agriculture to begin with . DT island ’s vital fishing industry is RB more vulnerable , as NN changes leads to shifts in DT ocean , including coral bleaching ; damage to DT structure of reefs ; marine “ heat waves ” ; and other conditions WDT force marine life to move north . IN JJ of DT other places on this list , DT NNP Arab Emirates is facing JJ risks due to its location . IN Yemen and other neighboring NNS , DT UAE is facing an “ extreme risk ” of NN stress , according to Smith , and will need to spend a lot more NN on cooling . Unlike JJ other NNS facing these threats , however , DT UAE is wealthier and is able to make sophisticated investments to blunt DT impact of NN NN . For instance , DT UAE is working to produce its own fresh NN , build temperature - controlled spaces , investments in green NN , and developing crops WDT can withstand hotter temperatures . However , according to Levin , PRP remains to be seen whether these adaptations will reach Yemen ’s entire population , because DT country faces rampant inequality . “ DT question is , will adequate investments be made in NN , and will DT poorest be able to enjoy DT same kind of comforts as DT rest of DT population , ” Levin says . “ PRP can look at DT face of a GDP of a given country . But DT really masks tremendous inequality . PRP ’s hard to necessarily say IN CD country ’s in such a better position to withstand NN impacts . ”

text: " DT NN PRP Need Today … For DT NN PRP ’ll Live In Tomorrow . " What PRP Are n’t Being Told About DT NN PRP Live In How DT “ NN Theory ” Label Was Conceived To Derail DT Truth Movement How Covert American Agents Infiltrate DT Internet to Manipulate , Deceive , and Destroy Reputations Shock Waves Echo Across NN After Catastrophic Polling Blunder Fails To Spot NNP Forces “ Miracle Win ” In By : Sorcha Faal , and as reported to her Western Subscribers A rather jubilant JJ Ministry of Foreign Affairs ( MoFA ) report circulating in DT Kremlin today celebrating DT “ miracle election victory ” of Christian evangelical Prime Minister Scott Morrison to lead DT southern Pacific Ocean continent nation Commonwealth of Australia comes fittingly on a weekend WDT sees our last Blue Moon appearance for this decade — WDT revives DT idiom “ once in a blue moon ” used to describe rare events — of which this NN has “ sent shockwaves echoing across DT NN ” after this nation became DT latest to succumb to NNP Donald NNP ’s populist wave sweeping DT globe — WDT , in turn , has Americans hailing “ DT NNP Effect ” — while at DT same NN , PRP ’re laughing at DT ” catastrophic blunder of pollsters ” who did n’t even see this shocking election victory coming straight at them . [ Note : Some words and / or phrases appearing in quotes in this report are English language approximations of Russian words / phrases having no exact counterpart . ] … while Australian leftists ( above , on CD NNP 2019 ) collapse in tears IN Hillary NNP supporters did when she lost to NNP . According to this report , with NNP NNP ’s populist wave having captured every nation PRP has rolled over — DT last two being Italy and Brazil , which means IN “ populists have now wrested control of DT NN economy away from DT globalists ” — panic stricken leftists within DT elite Western power structure built what PRP believed was an impenetrable wall to protect themselves during this Blue Moon weekend ’s Australian national election — DT bricks of which were every socialist policy PRP MD imagine them coming up with , and WDT ranged from promises to tax DT rich to death and redistribute their wealth , to enacting draconian NN NN laws to save DT NN from being destroyed in 2030 — or 2040 — or 2050 — or whatever date PRP ’ve finally decided on , but have yet to tell anyone about . Australian socialists in ( above ) march to celebrate their pending election victory on 17 NNP 2019 In DT days and hours leading up DT 18 NNP 2019 national election in Australia , this report continues , all of DT opinion polls , mass NN critics and bookmakers declared , without any doubt whatsoever , IN all of DT signs pointed towards a “ sweeping win ” for these socialists — but none of whom , apparently , had factored into “ their signs ” DT devout Christian Prime Minister Scott Morrison having declared IN he “ believed in miracles ” — and because of , saw him scoring a stunning surprise victory WDT was propelled by a populist wave — DT “ quiet Australians ” , he termed them — DT counterpart force against socialism WDT has upended politics in DT NNP NNPS , Britain and beyond — and whose leader NNP NNP called Prime Minister Morrison immediately after this shocking historic election victory to congratulate him , and further had his White House release a statement stating : “ DT two leaders reaffirmed DT critical importance of DT longstanding alliance and friendship between DT NNP NNPS and Australia , and PRP pledged to continue their close cooperation on shared priorities ” . NNP Donald NNP aboard Air Force NNP ( above ) accepts Prime Minister Scott Morrison ’s invitation to visit Australia With DT Australian NNS having awoken this Sunday morning to DT aftermath of their nation ’s socialist forces having “ lost DT unloseable election ” , this report notes , their beyond shocked and stunned leftist elite class have predictably begun lashing out — best exampled by former leftist Prime Minister John Howard slamming these socialists ’ approach to DT election as DT “ politics of envy ” WDT divided Australia on class — Griffith University in Queensland leftist law professor Susan Harris - Rimmer lamenting IN “ I VBP PRP ’re just getting used to DT politics of DT absurd … PRP ’s been a long NN since politics was normal anywhere ” — and radical leftist British NN activist professor Stephan Lewandowsky fearfully telling his socialist comrades “ PRP have lost Australia for now ” . Not being noticed , understood or considered by these leftists , this report explains , is IN Australia was neither “ lost ” to anyone nor were its citizens participating in “ DT politics of DT absurd ” — as all of them , in fact , are required under penalty of law ( A$ 20 fine for failure to vote ) to participate in their elections — and is a system WDT requires voters to nominate multiple candidates which means IN insurgent third - party campaigns have little purchase , because NNS can have their protest vote and still choose a mainstream candidate too — which is a preferential voting system where minor - party votes VBP redistributed to DT leading candidates in DT House of Representatives elections , resulting in so - called “ two - party preferred ” WDT should always sum to 100 % -- but whose stunning polling predictive failure was driven in part by DT decline of landline telephones making pollsters ’ task in finding a representative sample of voters “ all but impossible ” — and is an issue WDT ’s occurring across DT NN — thus causing polling organizations to benchmark against each other in a way WDT ’s led to “ herding ” , WDT produces overconfidence around what ’s turned out to be an utterly erroneous result . Most inexplicable , though , this report concludes , are why these socialist Western pollsters continue using DT same failed predictive methods which catastrophically blew up in their faces when PRP tried and failed to predict DT Brexit vote , failed to predict every single election in DT NN afterwards , and whose predictive failures now include Australia — CD of whose most expensive consequences of fell upon DT Sportsbet bookies in Australia who made an early payout of $ 1.3 million before yesterday ’s election to those who bet on a socialist victory , because DT polls VBD PRP MD n’t lose — an early payout , however , WDT collided with a “ miracle victory ” WDT was n’t supposed to happen causing these bookies to lose all of their money — DT humor of which PRP took in stride by hilariously posting “ this did n't age well ” — and was RB , beyond all doubt , relished by a NNP NNP who beat and smashed these socialist pollsters ’ predictions in 2016 — and is preparing to do so once again in 2020 . Due to our mission ’s conflicts with DT of those governments , DT responses of their ‘ agents ’ has been a longstanding misinformation / misdirection campaign designed to discredit PRP , and others IN PRP , WDT is exampled in numerous places , includingHERE . ] [ Note : DT WhatDoesItMean.com website was created for and donated to DT Sisters of Sorcha Faal in 2003 by a small group of American computer experts led by DT late JJ technology guru Wayne Green ( 1922-2013 ) to counter DT propaganda being used by DT West topromote their illegal 2003 invasion of Iraq . ] [ Note : DT word Kremlin ( fortress inside a city ) as used in this report refers toRussian citadels , including in , having cathedrals wherein female Schema monks ( Orthodox nuns ) reside , JJ of whom are devoted to DT mission of DT Sisters of Sorcha Faal . ] America Still Clueless About Bombshell Ready To Explode Over Washington In Coming Days America Is Tearing Itself Apart Because Of Two HistoriansThey Don’t Even VB TheNames Of Someone Wants NNP Dead — NNP Finds OutAnd Kills Assassin — Now France Wants War

text: " NN NN and sustainability were not easy topics back then , " remembers Hanno Franke , thinking back almost 25 NNS and almost sounding as if he ’s trying to defend himself . DT SC Freiburg marketing director has been at DT club since DT mid-1990s , a NN when DT Sport - Club from DT Black Forest became DT first Bundesliga club to begin taking measures to protect DT environment . " DT club was n’t sure of its own identity , its own DNA , " Franke explains . " But even then , DT city of Freiburg took sustainability very seriously so PRP seemed logical IN PRP as a football club should VB involved as well . JJ NNS advised PRP against PRP . Back then , some of our advisers warned PRP about being ' too green . PRP 's common measure by today 's standards , with JJ Bundesliga clubs producing their own solar NN , but in DT mid-1990s , Freiburg were ahead of DT curve and faced stiff opposition . " Looking back , DT club showed a great deal of courage and conviction and laid DT groundwork for everything WDT followed , " says Franke , with barely concealable pride . Today , all Bundesliga clubs are aware of their environmental responsibilities , which can be divided into four main areas : traffic and NNS , waste , NN and NN . But PRP 's taken some clubs longer than others , with some only becoming " greener " when environmentally friendly measures RB allowed them to save money . " But those days are over . " However , Fischer still thinks more can be done . " Clubs are great at implementing green policies when PRP do n't require any investment in infrastructure , such as using green NN or installing LED lights which save NN . " In recent NNS , clubs have begun to expand their NN protection portfolios more or less off their own backs , or in cooperation with local businesses . In March 2019 , DT 36 professional clubs in Germany ’s top three leagues came together to discuss environmental solutions , but EX is still no central coordination through DT German Football League ( DFL ) . " DT Bundesliga is still lacking a general NN plan , " laments Fischer , who MD VB to see clubs pool their activities for NN protection . " DT DFL needs to set environmental targets and provide instructions and guidelines to help clubs implement concrete measures . " In Hoffenheim 's defense , DT club compensates for its C02 NNS by running a reforestation program in Uganda in central Africa . DT project involves regularly educating local NNS and teenagers about NN NN and how PRP can live more environmentally friendly lives . Club employees are trained as well . " PRP had DT organizers of DT Freiburg branch of ' Fridays for Future ' for a visit , for instance , " he says . " And of course PRP supported them – out of conviction . "

text: DT NN 2017 was a record - breaking NN for extreme weather and environmental catastrophes since records started to be kept in DT 19th century . DT Arctic experienced temperatures up to 70 degree F above normal . JJ NNS were baked in unusual heatwaves killing thousands . Incidents of droughts , extreme typhoons in DT Pacific and hurricanes in DT Atlantic , flash floods , and wildfires erupted daily in international NN headlines . As recent as 2014 , DT NNP Meteorological Organization ( WMO ) , following an analysis of NASA satellite footage of carbon dioxide movement around DT NN , concluded IN our NN NN has entered “ unchartered territory at frightening speed . ” But 2017 was RB DT NN when DT statistical figures came in for 2016 . DT WMO reported IN CO2 concentrations in DT atmosphere rose at record speed . Currently PRP is at its highest level in 800,000 NNS . If anyone held any doubt IN NN NN is unreal , a fiction or fantasy , 2017 should have been wake up call to DT most obstinate denialist . NNS have warned about our current days of NN for several decades . For those who jumped on DT bandwagon NNS ago when atmospheric and geological NNS voiced serious concerns about JJ NN and its dire consequences , PRP was a NN with no huge surprises , except for DT rapid acceleration of NN trends . PRP is NN IN NNS , and more crucially our entire species , to accept DT fact IN NN NN is DT single most important threat to humanity ’s survival . Certainly , a nuclear confrontation with North Korea or Russia is a horrifying scenario WDT MD eliminate tens or even hundreds of millions of NNS . However , PRP is within humanity ’s means to avoid nuclear war . On DT other hand PRP is highly improbable whether PRP can do much to deter NN NN . Natural forces are far beyond our technological NN - how and methods to control powerful planetary forces regardless of how JJ efforts to advance geoengineering or a dramatic shift to renewable energies are made . Perhaps PRP will slow DT pace of JJ NN a little , but PRP too has its own destructive blowback . DT NNP ’s history is a long story of numerous species birthing , evolving and eventually VBG extinct . EX is no manifest destiny for our species . EX is no divine promise IN humanity MD not in DT future follow in DT footsteps of DT dinosaurs . Our lives are not transcendent to Nature nor DT multitude of other natural forces , animals , plants , microbes and other life forms and molecules upon which our existence depends . This is a simple truth PRP must learn . And PRP must be learned quickly and without further delay . In a July issue of NNP York Magazine , journalist David Wallace - Wells published a worst case , doomsday scenario of NN NN ’s impact upon human society and DT environment before DT end of this century . His essay , “ DT Uninhabitable NNP , ” was based upon JJ private interviews with unnamed NNS who were willing to voice their deeper concerns about catastrophic events and eroding conditions humanity will face unless a concerted JJ response to reduce greenhouse gases is not launched immediately . Aside from several of Wallace - Wells ’ factual errors , this was DT first featured article to appear in a mainstream publication WDT focused on NN NN ’s darker side . PRP became DT most read article in NNP York Magazine ‘s history . However , earlier in 2003 , Cambridge University astrophysicist and philosopher Martin Rees released his influential Our Final Hour warning IN DT pace of humanity ’s destructive activities presents a 50:50 chance for our civilization to survive past DT end of DT 21st century . Carcinogenic and unhealthy foods and high levels of deadly toxic chemicals in common everyday products are only minor risks compared to JJ other postmodern technologies impacting our lives . NN NN , combined with DT genetic engineering of JJ viruses , synthetic biology , artificial intelligence , and rape of DT NN for its last remaining natural resources , according to Rees , is a recipe for certain disaster and will likely end in DT extinction of our species . While JJ NNS and most of DT general NN who acknowledge DT facts about anthropogenic NN NN continue to hold enormous blind faith on human ingenuity and modern technology to prevent JJ NN ’s “ end game , ” Rees and a distinguished , multi- disciplinary consortium of NNS at DT Cambridge Center for DT NNP of Existential Risks acknowledge a darker side behind our over - reliance upon technological solutions –nuclear power , geoengineering , genetic manipulation of nature , etc . Rees ’s 50:50 survival prediction was largely ignored after its publication over a decade ago . Nobody wants to accept IN our survival is predicated upon a flip of a coin . Today , his predictions are being reevaluated and his supporters are increasing . And this is why Wallace - Wells ’ NNP York Magazine ‘s article is so important . EX are more than ample reasons to fear DT consequences of NN NN on our NN , food security , our livelihoods , well - being , and DT survival of future generations , including our NNS . Extinction is forever , whether PRP be in a hundred , as DT more pessimistic NNS suggest , or a thousand NNS or more . PRP is only a matter of NN before killer heat waves become DT norm , chemical - based industrial agriculture collapses , national economies are devastated , JJ plagues and NN epidemics emerge , and NN and resource conflicts and wars increase . All of these have been previously predicted over DT NNS , and each is already starting to cast its shadow over DT NN . Fear combined with hope is a powerful motivating factor to embrace NN in personal habits and lifestyle . Therefore , PRP is critical today for humanity to become afraid , to become intensely afraid without becoming paralyzed . PRP condemn ourselves only by our failure to wake up while clinging to faux optimism , and by refusing to take upon ourselves DT appropriate actions when confronted with an immediate emergency . NN NN NN poses certain obstacles difficult for DT average person to accept . Perhaps most evident is IN DT NN and predictions appear too abstract . PRP can seem too foreign and impersonal . DT calving of an enormous NN sheet in Antarctica or rapid Himalayan glacier melt do not set off alarm bells WDT threaten our cozy lives in American and European cities and suburbs . DT events are too distant . PRP VBP IN NN levels are rising . Everyone in Miami is aware of this fact because flooded areas in DT city are now commonplace . DT citizens of DT Maldives and Solomon Islands certainly VBP this because their nations are already sinking under rising NN levels . But to imagine PRP ’s home or condominium along DT coast being partially submerged permanently in DT Atlantic Ocean is a NN too far off to VB about . Consequently , real estate developers continue their frenzy to build more residences up and down DT Florida coast , and NNS continue to flock to DT Sunshine NNP to purchase a sunny place to retire . PRP is almost obscene to imagine IN four of DT top ten cities witnessing DT largest influx of migrants within DT NNP NNPS are RB DT most compromised by more immediate NN NN and extreme weather conditions : Houston ( No. 1 ) , Miami ( No. 2 ) , Phoenix ( No. 7 ) and Orlando ( No. 10 ) . In August 2017 , Hurricane Harvey submerged over 100,000 homes throughout DT greater Houston metropolitan area . While DT storm itself cannot be attributed to humanity ’s contribution to JJ NN , DT hurricane ’s intensity and power is certainly related . Rising NN levels and warmer NN surface off DT Texas coast — 7.2 degrees F above average making PRP DT hottest spot of ocean surface in DT NN — are DT two major factors WDT made Harvey so catastrophic and deadly . And similar extreme tropic storms are only VBG to increase as DT NNP gets warmer . As DT NN ’s surface heats further and NN levels rise , climatic events become increasingly more extreme . Consequently our lives become more stressed , miserable , insecure and uncertain . Individually , nobody can initiate DT kind of grand massive NN in collective humanity ’s relationship to DT environment being demanded today . However , each of PRP can make determined and immediate changes in our personal lives and repair our personal rapport with DT NN , nature , DT ecology around our homes , neighborhoods and towns . No honor is gained by sitting and waiting for NN to take concerted action to lessen greenhouse gas NNS and overhaul DT federal regulatory system to hold private industries and polluters accountable . DT corruption of Washington is beyond reform because NN has itself become a private enterprise . Likewise , Americans are waking up to DT realization IN their votes are useless . Those who need to VB DT most–elected officials and legislators , corporate CEOs and Chairmen , professional institutions – will not find DT solutions until PRP is too late . In DT meantime , PRP refuse to see DT problem . And this is clearly evident by DT fact IN DT fossil fuel industry is expanding rather than receding . This chapter will lay out DT fundamental problem humanity faces as NN NN and JJ NN accelerate . Although a popular awareness of NN NN is growing rapidly , most NNS still have difficulty connecting DT dots between dramatic NN - related crises and calamities happening in far off regions of DT NN and DT impact these very same events have upon their personal lives . Therefore , I will be presenting DT NN NN in simple lay language , providing crucial examples , in order to make JJ NN a more personal affair . Unless DT threats DT NNP faces are understood and perceived as a threat to our personal well - being and IN of our immediate families , loved ones and friends , DT constructive , necessary NN so direly needed will not unfold . Nevertheless , PRP must begin with ourselves because each of PRP possesses in her or his power DT capacity to live in harmony with life and DT greater whole of Nature . And then PRP must serve as an example of a conscientious , ecological lifestyle to those PRP meet . In August 2017 , DT 900 - plus foot tanker Christophe de Margerie set sail from Russia ’s North NNP to South Korea . DT cruise ’s novelty was IN for DT first NN in recorded history a sailing vessel crossed DT Arctic ’s Northern NNP Route without DT need for icebreakers . DT ship traveled freely , unencumbered across DT broken , melting NN fields . This small incident regarding a tanker carrying natural gas half way around DT NN MD seem incidental and insignificant , barely newsworthy . But for climatologists and Arctic ecologists PRP was an unexpected and disturbing event . PRP was another indication IN DT NN is racing faster towards an NN free Arctic . PRP was RB a warning IN JJ NN is accelerating beyond expectations . Back in 2013 , DT University of California was predicting IN ships MD be incapable of traveling freely across DT North Pole before 2050 . However , DT Christophe ’s passage over DT Arctic ’s southern frontier in under seven days holds a record . And this voyage MD have never been possible without DT acceleration of anthropogenic NN NN . As DT Russian vessel made its way across DT crown of DT NN , at DT opposite pole another surprising event occurred . On July 12 , 2017 , an iceberg , approximately 2,200 square miles or roughly DT size of DT NN of Delaware , broke free from DT Larsen C icesheet in Western Antarctica . This was DT third gigantic Antarctic icesheet to collapse since 1995 , and DT largest to date . Glaciologists were startled because DT speed of DT sheet ’s disintegration was miscalculated . Although DT break , commonly known as “ calving , ” had been predicted several NNS prior , PRP was DT suddenness WDT was disturbing . A week later , glaciologists ’ predictions were proven wrong a second NN . PRP had not been a clean split as calculated earlier . Instead , IN a stone hitting an auto ’s windshield , DT break triggered a network of fissures indicating IN DT entire icesheet was quickly fragmenting and more sheets MD be calving in DT near future . Antarctica is often viewed as DT last place on NNP WDT will be touched by JJ NN due to human activity . However , 2016 observed a record low of NN NN , according to DT University of Washington , and 2020 is now targeted as DT turnaround point when DT degradation of DT southern polar icesheets will be directly DT result of human activity . Already , atmospheric temperatures in DT Antarctic have been rising annually by 4 - 6 C . As NN seasons lengthen , NN sheets melt and calf faster and eventually DT shelves thin further and disappear . For DT twenty - first century , these two geological events , and JJ others , are indicative of DT greatest threat to humanity : JJ NN and NN NN . For DT first NN in human history , our species has entered an era of extraordinary and anxious uncertainty . JJ are bewildered when PRP hear about DT loss of an Antarctic NN sheet , prolonged droughts , temperatures reaching above 50 degree Celsius , flash floods , and uncontrollable wildfires . An aberration in DT usual NN patterns PRP have become accustomed to ? Will PRP continue or end ? DT international scientific community is nearly unanimous in confirming IN JJ NN is accelerating and human activity is its primary driving force . EX is RB near unanimous certainty DT course PRP are following to reach catastrophic benchmarks is inevitable and completely outside our civilization ’s control . Those NNS who resist DT international consensus are far and few between . DT majority of dissenters lack a professional background in DT NNP and Space sciences , climatology , glaciology and other disciplines directly associated with measuring and observing changes in DT atmosphere and DT NNP ’s geology . For several decades , NNS DT NN over have been running simulated NN models repeatedly to determine whether increased NN is anthropogenic or caused by human activity . And repeatedly whenever human - generated greenhouse gases –CO2 , methane , nitrous oxide , NN vapor , dust , etc. – are removed from their equations , PRP are unable to account for DT sudden rise in DT NNP ’s temperature as DT result of natural phenomena alone . Already DT NNP is warmer than PRP has been for DT last 120,000 NNS . However , when these same models introduce greenhouse gases into their equations , PRP accurately correlate with DT actual temperature trends being witnessed . Long - term , 90 % of planetary NN is linked to DT actions of our species . DT remaining 10 % , according to Konrad Steffen , director of DT Swiss Polar Institute , is “ unexplained . PRP is not uncommon for climatologists to underestimate DT swiftness of NN - related events . DT statistical and computational models to portend timelines for certain NN tipping points , although highly sophisticated , are unable to account for all variables and trends , particularly unforeseeable catastrophes such as mammoth biomass NNS from wildfires and other natural and human calamities . For example , researchers MD not predictable calculate DT explosion of BP ’s Deep Horizon facility WDT discharged up to 520,000 tons of methane into DT atmosphere , DT equivalent of burning upwards to 3.1 million barrels of crude oil . Consequently dire findings are either found wanting or too sober as JJ observations upgrade earlier forecasts . Very soon DT Arctic region will be NN free throughout DT NN . Conservatively DT Arctic will lose all its NN during DT warmest months before 2030 . PRP still do n’t VB precisely JJ of DT long - term consequences to DT polar region and DT NN ’s biosystems once this tipping point is reached . However , EX are approximately four million NNS living along DT Arctic Circle , including hundreds of thousands of indigenous NNS . Very likely , most of DT coastal communities will be forced to migrate in DT near future as shorelines dependent upon NN , freezing temperatures and colder seasons start to crumble and disappear . Acceleration is RB exasperated by DT thawing permafrost and tundra , and DT massive release of methane and nitrous oxide , in DT Arctic North . In point of fact , DT polar North is collapsing . DT loss of DT Arctic ’s albedo , DT white NN of NN WDT reflects DT Sun ’s radiation back into space , has already passed its tipping point . As if a warhead missile had already been launched , PRP can only sit and wait to experience DT consequences befalling PRP upon impact . CD of DT causes DT university NNS identified was a NN in El Nino patterns WDT are now reaching DT Antarctic . DT majority of DT loss MD be in DT southern NNS but RB a third in NNP York and NNP Jersey . DT complete loss of 5 million cubic miles of NN now blanketing DT NNP , including large mountain glaciers , MD raise NN levels by 216 feet . San Francisco Bay Area MD be a cluster of small islands .
