Unpredictable events and catastrophes affecting feedback loops , such as wildfires , volcanic eruptions , oil fires or industrial plant explosions — such as DT Arkema chemical plant explosion near Houston after Hurricane Harvey — and DT numerical increase in extreme weather events cannot be accurately calculated into greenhouse gas simulations . text: DT 2021 NNP Conference on NNP & NNP NNP with a special focus on NNP Justice , will convene at DT margin of DT COP26 UN NN NN conference . DT aim of DT conference is to support and showcase Nationally Determined Contributions ( NDCs ) to DT Paris Agreement which are ambitious , based on DT principles of justice and equity , and promote and protect NN . PRP will RB mobilize DT rapidly growing movement of NN professionals around DT NN who are now driving ambitious NN action . DT conference will be organized by DT NNP NNP Organization ( WHO ) and by DT NNP NNP and NNP Alliance ( GCHA ) , in close collaboration with Glasgow Caledonian University and its Centre for NNP Justice , with DT UK NNP Alliance on NNP NNP , and other partners . DT NN 2020 will see DT Paris Agreement come to life . At its heart , DT Paris Agreement is about caring for NNS and protecting them from an uncertain and increasingly unsafe future . Everyone has DT right to a healthy environment , free of pollution and its harmful consequences . Over 100 governments have already indicated PRP will update their national NN plans to DT Paris Agreement ( known as Nationally Determined Contributions , NDCs ) , and these enhanced NN plans aim to include all vital sectors , including DT NN sector . DT same human activities WDT are destabilizing DT NNP ’s NN RB contribute directly to poor NN . For example , DT main driver of NN NN , fossil fuel combustion , RB contributes about 2/3 of human exposure to outdoor air pollution , which causes over 4 million deaths a NN . Including indoor air pollution brings DT total to over 7 million deaths worldwide every NN – about 1 in every 8 deaths . DT overall cost to human wellbeing , and to economies , is enormous . Air pollution alone costs an estimated NNP $ 5.11 trillion in welfare losses globally each NN . In DT 15 NNS with DT highest greenhouse gas NNS , DT NN impacts of air pollution are estimated to cost more than 4 % of their GDP . JJ concern over DT NN impacts of air pollution is an increasing driver of social movements for action on NN NN and overall environmental protection . Meeting DT Paris goals MD result in NN gains which are twice as large as DT costs of DT mitigation measures from improved air quality alone . DT NN gains of NN action VBP well beyond air quality . PRP range from more sustainable diets and food systems addressing DT rising burden of NN associated with overweight and obesity , to urban transport systems WDT facilitate walking and cycling , and bringing NN gains from increased physical activity . Weighing in both DT impacts of NN - damaging business - as - usual policies and DT massive NN co-benefits of ambitious NN policy , drives NN policies WDT are more ambitious and NN - promoting . DT NNP Conference on NNP & NNP NNP will bring together a range of key actors in JJ NN and NN NN policy in order to incorporate JJ NN and NN justice considerations in DT UN NN negotiations . PRP will highlight DT initiatives , policies and cross-sectoral collaborations WDT are driving ambitious and healthy Nationally Determined Contributions to DT Paris Agreement in DT lead - up to COP26 . DT conference will be organized by DT NNP NNP Organization - convening its 4th NNP Conference on NNP and NNP - and by DT NNP NNP and NNP Alliance - convening its 8th NNP NNP and NNP Summit - in close collaboration with DT Glasgow Caledonian University and its Centre for NNP Justice , DT UK NNP Alliance on NNP NNP and other partners . DT overarching theme of DT Conference will be Healthy and Ambitious Nationally Determined Contributions to DT Paris Agreement , and will include sessions on DT NN co-benefits of a broad range of NN policies , including clean NN policies ; air quality measures ; subsidy reform ; smart agriculture and sustainable food systems ; educational and civil society involvement ; nature - based solutions and others . A series of WHO - led initiatives , case - studies and workshops throughout 2020 will feed into DT outcomes of DT JJ NN & NN conference and DT COP26 UN NN conference . • Publication : NN in DT NDCs - a WHO Review

text: In eosinophilic esophagitis ( e- o - sin - o - FILL - ik uh - sof - uh - JIE - tis ) , a type of white blood cell ( eosinophil ) builds up in DT lining of DT tube WDT connects your mouth to your stomach ( esophagus ) . This buildup , which is a reaction to foods , allergens or acid reflux , can inflame or injure DT esophageal tissue . Damaged esophageal tissue can lead to difficulty swallowing or cause food to VB stuck when PRP swallow . Eosinophilic esophagitis is a chronic immune system NN . PRP has been identified only in DT past two decades , but is now considered a major cause of digestive system ( gastrointestinal ) illness . Research is ongoing and will likely lead to revisions in DT diagnosis and treatment of eosinophilic esophagitis . • Food getting stuck in DT esophagus after swallowing ( impaction ) • Chest pain WDT is often centrally located and does not respond to antacids • Food getting stuck in DT esophagus after swallowing ( impaction ) When to see a doctor Seek immediate JJ attention if PRP experience chest pain , especially if PRP RB have shortness of breath or jaw or arm pain . These MD be symptoms of a heart attack . Make an appointment with your doctor if PRP experience severe or frequent eosinophilic esophagitis symptoms . If PRP take over - DT - counter medications for heartburn more than twice a week , see your doctor . Eosinophils are a normal type of white blood cells present in your digestive tract . However , in eosinophilic esophagitis , PRP have an allergic reaction to an outside substance . DT reaction MD occur as follows : • Reaction of DT esophagus . DT lining of your esophagus reacts to allergens , such as food or pollen . • Multiplication of eosinophils . DT eosinophils multiply in your esophagus and produce a protein WDT causes inflammation . • Damage to esophagus . Inflammation can lead to scarring , narrowing and formation of excessive fibrous tissue in DT lining of your esophagus . • Dysphagia and impaction . PRP MD have difficulty swallowing ( dysphagia ) or have food become stuck when PRP swallow ( impaction ) . • Additional symptoms . PRP MD have other symptoms , such as chest pain or stomach pain . EX has been a significant increase in numbers of NNS diagnosed with eosinophilic esophagitis in DT past decade . At first , researchers thought this was due to an increase in awareness among doctors and greater availability of tests . However , studies now suggest DT NN is becoming increasingly common , parallel to DT increase in asthma and allergy . DT following risk factors are associated with eosinophilic esophagitis : • NN . NNS who live in a cold or dry NN are more likely than those in other climates to be diagnosed with eosinophilic esophagitis . • Season . PRP 're more likely to be diagnosed between DT spring and fall , probably because levels of pollen and other allergens are higher and NNS are more prone to be outdoors . • Sex . Eosinophilic esophagitis is more common in males than in females . • Family history . Doctors VBP eosinophilic esophagitis MD run in DT family ( have a genetic component ) . If your family members have eosinophilic esophagitis , PRP have a greater chance of being diagnosed . • Allergies and asthma . If PRP have food or environmental allergies , asthma , atopic dermatitis or a chronic respiratory NN , PRP 're more likely to be diagnosed with eosinophilic esophagitis . • Age . Originally , eosinophilic esophagitis was thought to be a childhood NN , but now PRP is known to be common in adults as well . DT symptoms differ somewhat between NNS and adults . In some NNS , eosinophilic esophagitis can lead to DT following : • Scarring and narrowing of DT esophagus . This makes PRP difficult to swallow and more likely IN PRP will have food VB stuck . • Damage to DT esophagus . Because of inflammation of DT esophagus , endoscopy can cause perforation or tears in DT tissue WDT lines DT esophagus . Tearing can RB occur in connection with retching IN some NNS experience when PRP VBP food stuck in DT esophagus .

text: Panel : Anunnaki religions , Zionist - Jesuit - Hidden controller governments , NN military - industrial complex end in defeat by Lamb ( Messiah ) and Universal fleet VANCOUVER , BC – In this NewsInsideOut.com Panel , author and hermeneuticist Peter Kling and futurist Alfred Lambremont Webre explore DT impacts of DT Pope Francis Bergoglio ’s September 23 - 28 , 2015 Yom Kippur / Tetra Lunar Eclipse Psyop delivery of DT NNP Nations post 2015 Development Agenda and its planned JJ implementation in DT context of hermeneutic analysis in DT Book of Revelation . My Journey Landing Heaven on NNP by Alfred Lambremont Webre • DT Final Test – Pope Launches DT NNP NNP Order “ On September 26th Pope Francis ( aka Jorge Mario Bergoglio or Petrus Romanus ) will meet with DT UN to launch an agreement known as “ DT Road to Dignity by 2030 . ” This document is simply a sugar coating of Agenda 21 and relies on DT myth of man-made NN NN to lock down humanity in a dystopian nightmare of total control , total surveillance and a CD NN NN . Some Christians are calling this DT beginning of DT Tribulation . ” Top Picks on July 5 , 2015 at 11:07 am · No Comments “ Yet PRP must RB be recognized IN nuclear NN , biotechnology , information technology ; knowledge of our DNA , and JJ other abilities , which PRP have acquired , have …given those with DT knowledge , and especially DT JJ resources to use them , an impressive dominance over DT whole of humanity and DT entire NN … . In whose hands does all this power lie , or will PRP eventually end up ? PRP is risky for a small part of humanity to have PRP . ” ( p.77 ) ~ Pope Francis A Papal Encyclical is a letter concerning Catholic doctrine which is circulated by DT Pope . This week , Pope Francis published a JJ Encyclical : Laudato Si ’ of DT Holy Father Francis – Care for Our Common Home . DT 180 + page document sounds DT alarm regarding DT JJ degradation of living things : NNS , animals and our environment . If this document had been authored by a professor of theology , EX MD be much room for common ground . However , PRP has been written by DT leader of an institution which has been DT single most powerful in DT Western NN for DT last 500 NNS – a period during which DT central banking - warfare model has been busy harvesting our common home . EX is a profound disassociation from DT nuts - and - bolts of what DT Catholic Church ( and its networks and investment syndicates ) have been doing and DT sources of their wealth . This Encyclical is , if PRP will , a concept piece independent of DT financial and political realities of DT Vatican , DT Catholic Church and its allies . Assuming IN Pope Francis first and foremost addressed DT Encyclical to bishops , patriarchs , primates , archbishops as well as to DT general population , I MD VB to propose several steps which DT Pope , DT Vatican and DT leadership of DT Catholic Church ( collectively , DT “ Church ” ) might take to integrate some of DT best ideas in this document into DT power lines controlled and influenced by DT Church . DT NN is struggling with propaganda , disinformation , and significant suppression of DT truth . DT JJ Pope ’s efforts to provide digital access to works in DT Vatican Library on a selective basis are a good start . In DT meantime , EX is a great deal of knowledge which DT Church , its libraries and networks can share : • DT Church can accelerate access to both DT Vatican Library and Archives . • DT Church can publish all its information regarding JJ “ black budgets . ” This MD include any information related to invisible weaponry and technology driving DT real governance systems operating on NNP NNP . • In DT context of understanding what is happening to our environment , DT Church can publish all its information on JJ geo-engineering and weather control programs as part of an open discussion to ensure IN DT JJ population and scientific community has accurate data on what is happening to our NN . • DT Church can provide open access to its financial information and persuade its affiliates , endowments and churches to do DT same , including detailed disclosure on a place - based basis . • DT Church can encourage JJ governments to publish their budgets and credit information on a place - based basis . Place - based financial disclosure will permit DT alignment of financial ecosystems with environmental ecosystems – a critical step to ensuring a healthy environment . This will create incentive systems which reward DT NN and well - being of all living things . • DT Church can disclose all information on its direct and indirect involvement in any illegal activities , including vote rigging , narcotics trafficking , and money laundering . • DT Church can use its shareholdings and ownership positions in NN companies to insist on integrity in JJ information . • DT Church can use its shareholdings in pharmaceutical and food companies to insist on integrity and independence of scientific research . • DT Church can provide a safe haven for NNS , journalists and other professionals who are targeted for upholding high standards of integrity in NN and information . Slavery contributes significantly to DT degradation of NNS throughout our NN . • DT Church can withdraw from supporting governments , corporations or any other organizations WDT support any form of slavery . • DT Church can destroy DT “ control files ” of prominent businessmen and politicians created through DT use of its networks . • DT Church can complete restoration efforts related to its pedophilia activities and publish complete figures on how much DT Church has spent on all restoration efforts . • DT Church can use its shareholdings and ownership positions in NN and corporate securities to insist on a withdrawal of corporate and NN support for mind control , torture and slavery and DT compromise of individual privacy and sovereignty . DT primary source of environmental damage does not result from market economics – quite DT opposite . PRP results from DT lethal combination of organized crime operating powerful and invisible weaponry coupled with invasive digital systems and sophisticated financial tools on scale . In short , those with DT ability to kill , to destroy and to steal with impunity combine such force with fiat currencies , unsustainable debt , resource extraction , financial fraud , war and genocide in order to centralize wealth and power in a manner which shrinks total wealth . Lawlessness on a JJ scale must be dealt with before PRP destroys our NN . • DT Church can divest its holdings in governments and corporations which engage in these practices . PRP should encourage its affiliates and members to do DT same . • DT Church can RB disassociate from foundations and not - for - profits WDT engage in these practices or WDT launder profits for those who do . • DT Church can make clear IN DT ten commandments apply not just to what PRP do , but to whom and what PRP finance . • DT Church can stop any and all participation by itself and its networks in narcotics trafficking and disgorge DT profits of DT same to DT NNS harmed . No less than DT Economist has rightly pointed out IN PRP are chocking on debt , in part because PRP provide enormous tax subsidies which encourage debt ( see DT Great Distortion ) . Debt throws NNS out of alignment with CD another and with DT environment around them . Ditto fiat currency which is used in a manner to debase JJ populations and economies . PRP must shift to an equity - based financial system which facilitates DT free flow of equity unencumbered by DT intervention and control of organized crime . An equity - based system – which includes DT financing of small businesses , small farms and local economies with equity – will permit PRP to evolve a financial system in which PRP can generate wealth from healing our environment and reducing consumption . • DT Church can encourage these changes by shifting DT significant funds PRP manages as well as those managed by its networks . • DT Church can encourage governments to reduce laws and regulations WDT prevent DT local circulation of equity or WDT prevent DT creation and success of local currency systems . A JJ culture is CD which respects DT sovereignty of every individual . PRP respect human rights . PRP respect property rights . PRP respect privacy . PRP respect DT right of each human being to make up their own mind . • DT Church can withdraw its investments from all governments and corporations ( including NN ) which compromise NNS ’s privacy or which manipulate them via mind control techniques , entrainment technology , subliminal programming or electronics . • DT Church can actively encourage its priests and networks to bring transparency to mind control techniques or any efforts to mislead NNS globally . • DT Church can offer sanctuary to NNS , NN personnel or journalists who bring transparency to these efforts . Before PRP dismiss capitalism , PRP should try PRP . Organized crime is not capitalism . PRP is DT application of force to control and to VB PRP ’s way . Market economics can solve JJ of DT problems before PRP – but PRP have to unleash markets to work rather than prevent them from operating and then blaming DT subsequent “ mess ” on them . • DT Church can call for all monies stolen by illegal means in DT last two decades to be returned , including trillions which have disappeared from DT NNP NN or which have been accrued as a result of financial frauds prior to DT bailouts . • DT Church can refrain from blaming our current situation on DT NNS who have been harmed by these thefts or from insisting IN DT subsequent JJ damage is a result of DT victims ’ poor values or “ consumerism . ” • DT Church can withdraw its investment from financial institutions , governments and corporations WDT : • Provide unlawful or unethical support to cartels and monopolies . • Engage in DT purposeful suppression of technologies which MD ease DT harm PRP are doing to DT environment . DT Church and its affiliates and members manage trillions in real estate and financial assets . As CD of DT most significant capitalist organizations / investment networks on our NN , PRP can institute policies to ensure IN PRP does not invest in companies or governments which behave in DT manner described in DT latest Encyclical and IN its real estate is not used to support such activities . During Vatican II , DT Church forced DT sale of significant real estate holdings which were serving communities . DT proceeds from these sales were reinvested in corporate securities . DT Church can ensure IN DT Orders for whom these funds are managed have access to full transparency about these investments and are permitted to institute policies which ensure IN these investments are managed in accordance with DT goals of this Encyclical . Published JJ military expenditures were $ 1.7 trillion in 2013 . Add secret black budget expenditures and DT total was likely much more . These funds – combined with savings from destructive behavior such as gambling , narcotics and alcohol – MD be shifted into investment in healing our environment , our education systems , our NN care systems and revitalizing JJ infrastructure . • DT Church can bring transparency to all worldwide resources which are related to killing . PRP can invite its members to pray IN these resources be shifted to investments which increase productivity rather than enable a small group of NNS to own and control DT NN . Both DT Church and our NN are dynamic living systems . Moving to a healthy JJ culture and aligning our financial ecosystems with our environmental ecosystems is a journey . • DT Church can encourage its entire network to adopt these goals in their lives so IN achieving them is a partnership of DT JJ for DT benefit of all . • DT Church can publish an annual report on its efforts to take responsibility and to achieve these goals internally in its own operations , asset managements and investments and to invite feedback from all of its constituents to help PRP do so . EX is often a risk IN any important policy will be misunderstood or misused by those who are centralizing control and power . DT G - 7 nations have experienced a financial coup d’etat . A great deal of money and assets have been shifted out of sovereign governments into private hands – either illegally or under DT guise of trillions in bailouts and quantitative easing – while liabilities have been shifted back into governments . Now IN these transfers are complete , PRP MD be convenient to blame DT victims and to abrogate their pensions and other savings plans and promises . PRP MD be unfortunate if this Encyclical were used to justify DT value of doing so in DT name of “ reducing consumerism ” or to politically outmaneuver DT victims by accusing them of being “ selfish . ” Economies function on trust and such trust must come from honoring our agreements . As Pope Francis understands , PRP is easy to blame DT victim and to take from DT powerless . Utah Phillips once VBD , “ DT NNP is not dying , PRP is being killed . And DT NNS doing DT killing have names and addresses . ” PRP commend DT Pope for calling out for a cessation of DT debasement of all living things . Let PRP hope IN his latest Encyclical starts ringing doorbells – beginning with DT opportunity to do so in DT Church and in DT Church ’s asset and investment portfolios .

text: ROCHESTER , Minn . — A longitudinal NN of 3,756 U.S. JJ students provides evidence IN racism in JJ schools influenced their decisions on whether to practice in minority or underserved communities . " Structural racism is deeply embedded in all areas of society , and JJ education is no exception , " according to DT NN in DT August issue of Academic Medicine . To examine DT effect of racism in JJ school , researchers surveyed students at 49 unidentified U.S. JJ schools in their first semester and again in their final semester . " This NN provides evidence IN racism manifested at multiple levels in JJ schools was associated with graduating students ' decisions to provide care in high - need communities , " DT article concludes . " Strategies to identify and eliminate structural racism , and its manifestations in JJ school are needed . " DT publication is DT latest of more than 30 articles to present findings from DT NNP Student Cognitive Habits and Growth Evaluation NNP ( CHANGES ) , DT first longitudinal survey NN of DT effects of JJ education on students ' biases and attitudes over NN . DT national NN is being conducted by Oregon NNP & NNP University in collaboration with Mayo Clinic 's Research Group on Equity and Inclusion in NNP Care , Yale University and DT University of Minnesota . To limit DT scope , DT NN focused on attitudes toward African Americans , although CHANGES explored attitudes about other groups , as well , explains first author Sean Phelan , Ph.D. , a Mayo Clinic NN sciences researcher . " I hope DT NN will spark NN , " Dr. Phelan says . " I MD VB to see more conversation about diversity and inclusion in curriculum and DT need to make changes in JJ training to minimize racism and bias . " DT multidisciplinary team hypothesized IN three factors might reflect bias in JJ education , and DT results indicate IN all three predicted whether students changed their minds on wanting to work in an underserved area or in a primarily minority community : • School curricula and policies can create an unintended , structural type of racism if PRP lack or do n't require content on cultural awareness , racial disparities and bias , or provide experience with service learning . " PRP suggest IN , within JJ education , DT types of courses WDT JJ schools require and DT information WDT PRP prioritize for training JJ physicians can critically shape students ' interest in practicing in underserved areas , " Dr. Phelan says . • School culture and NN , including behaviors exhibited by faculty and attending physicians , represent a hidden curriculum on acceptable or normal ways to interact . • Individual student attitudes and behaviors tended to VB over four NNS of JJ school . Students ' negative racial attitudes at matriculation were associated with decreased intention to practice with underserved or minority populations at graduation , while students who had more interactions with black students , faculty and allied NN staff , and considered those interactions favorable , were more likely to choose to practice in a black community . DT team found IN racism at DT structural or cultural level MD reinforce a belief in social hierarchy and dissuade students from a career focused on caring for those perceived to be lower in DT hierarchy . However , among students who initially intended to work with minority populations , those who witnessed examples of discrimination in JJ school were more likely to stay committed to DT path . • Service learning experiences and a curriculum focused on improving minority NN were associated with increased intention to practice in underserved communities . • A curriculum focused on minority NN and disparities , students ' perceived skill at developing relationships with minority patients , a higher proportion of minority students at DT school , and awareness of interracial tension in DT JJ school environment were associated with increased intention to care for minority patients . " PRP 've been following this cohort for a long NN to understand how their experiences in JJ education influence DT predictors of potentially biased care , " says Michelle van Ryn , Ph.D. , DT principal investigator . Dr. Van Ryn is DT distinguished professor at Oregon NNP & NNP University 's School of Nursing and former director of Mayo Clinic 's Research Program on Equity and Inclusion in NNP Care . " These findings suggest IN JJ education leaders can take action to affect students ' decisions to work with underserved populations . " CHANGES began nearly 10 NNS ago . Additional surveys were conducted in DT second and fourth NNS of residency . DT final survey will be administered five NNS after JJ school . To avoid influencing responses , DT team delayed publication of findings until after students graduated from JJ school . Other co-authors from Mayo Clinic are Liselotte Dyrbye , M.D. , Richard White , M.D. , and Kristin Harden . DT research was funded by DT National Heart , Lung , and Blood Institute . DT authors report no conflicts of interest .
